I had read a lot of the reviews so I knew that I would not be getting a charger but that wasn't a big deal for me because I already have one with my kindle keyboard. I am a huge fan of Kindle.A very awesome great friend  sent me the money to purchase the Kindle HD as a late Christmas present. I just received it this afternoon. I have tried out Facebook, scored big in words with friends. I was able to see what everyone is up to on this New Year's Eve.I needed to hear the sound so picked up a free song to try it out.The sound is better than my laptops.My books that are on my other kindle are now on this one too. Awesome because I plan to continue to use my old one I love it to much to part with it.Ads? what is the big deal? not one for me anyways.And as for help. You can find plenty of it online. Great getting started video. I had no problem registering the Kindle HD very painless.Now to Skype with my son and wish him a Happy New Year.You want it buy it it is awesome. It took me longer typing this than it did to get up and running on the Kindle HD.

Reviews.Title: Almost completely love
Reviews.Author: Jules
Reviews.Content: First let me say that I'm coming to the Kindle Fire HD from the Kindle Fire; and I very much loved my original Fire. My upgrade came about because my daughter has taken over my original. So there was a little bit of an adjustment period for me with the upgrade to the HD.OK, that being said, there's good and bad to the HD. Let's start with the BAD:* The power and volume buttons. This is absolutely my biggest complaint with the HD. The earlier Fire had a power button very easy to find and click. On the HD I can't seem to turn it on or off without first visually finding it (which is annoying as I tend to read in the dark at night), and even then, it can be tricky. I wish they'd stuck with the power button on the original Fire.* The Favorite section. Because the Kindle Fire & Fire HD don't have a way to organize books into collections, I've previously used the Favorite section to organize books I've read, allowing me to remove them from my carousel while still keeping them downloaded to my device. The Favorite section now is more awkward than on the earlier Fire. In terms of being able to use it as a way to organize a large collection of books, I'm not a fan. Really, though, I'd love to see them add a way to organize books into collections and off the main carousel.* The ads before the lock screen. Of course, this is something practically everyone is mentioning, but I will say that it doesn't bother me too much ... I just miss the beautiful screen savers that could be found on the earlier Fire.* The charger. I hate that it only came with a USB cord. You really don't want to be reliant on connecting to a computer to charge your device. At the very least, they should've included an adapter to be used with the USB cord, so that you can connect to a computer (which you sometimes have to do to download books ... especially those you download from your library) but also attach the adapter and be able to charge the old-fashioned way, through a power outlet. Still, this is something easily rectified by purchasing an adapter yourself.The GOOD:* The screen is absolutely beautiful (magnifique!). Especially if you plan to watch a lot of movies or TV shows on your Kindle, this alone should make the HD tempting.* The speakers are awesome. They're good on the earlier Fire, too, but it's a definite upgrade on the Fire HD. Especially at full volume, when sound often gets distorted on the small speakers you find on devices like this.* The main menu. Normally I wouldn't think of a menu as being something that would matter to me, but I really like the options and the way the main menu is organized on the Fire HD.* The camera. It's nice having a camera, but also nice being able to import pictures. This was something I regretted the lack of on the earlier Fire.* Social media options. The Fire HD seems to have been made taking into account how much people rely on social media these days, so they've made it easy to access and integrate with sites like Facebook and Twitter, as well as your email accounts.* End page of books. When you reach the end of a book you're now taken to a page that makes it easy for you to rate/review the book you've just read, but also shows you similar books to the one you've just read. As someone who will often be in the mood for something similar to the good book I've just read, I love this, especially as Amazon does a really good job with its recommendations.* Swipe down to access settings menu. On the earlier Fire you would have to press at the top of your screen, and then press again, to access the settings menu -- now you just press and slide your finger down the screen and it drops the settings menu down. It's an easier, cleaner way to access that particular menu.* It seems to hold large amounts of content better than the earlier Fire. On the Fire, once I clicked on the book menu and all of my books would pop up, the books would blink and occasionally layer one on top of another. The HD doesn't seem to have issues with this.* One thing I have to say about both the Fire and the Fire HD is that they are built durable. My daughter has dropped our Fire on more than one occasion without any damage to it, and the HD seems to be built just as well (though this hasn't been tested yet, and hopefully won't be, lol). The rubber back keeps the device from slipping, and I also think it adds a layer of protection to the device.* Like on the earlier Fire, it's so easy to search for books, apps, music, and videos to purchase. And the one-click option just makes doing so super convenient.* There are other little things to enjoy about Fire HD -- more options and extras for books, slightly larger screen, slightly thinner, easy to hold, etc.My likes far outweigh my complaints. The few things I would like to see changed aren't enough for me to not recommend this to people. It's a great little device, one I've yet to encounter any problems with. It's made well, runs well, is organized in a way that makes sense, is easy to hold, and has a beautiful screen and excellent speakers. Not to mention, it's price helps make it a great (and smart!) buy.There's two other things I'd like to comment on. First, I find that people often ask Fire, Nook, and iPad owners what they love and hate about their devices, and what they'd say to recommend their devices to others. And the one thing I always mention is customer service. Amazon has fantastic customer service, especially when it comes to their Kindles. I was having issues with my earlier Kindle and contacted customer service. They had me try a couple things (turn my device off and on, deregister and reregister my device), and when that didn't solve the problem they sent me out a new device, no hassle. It arrived in two days. They also sent a pre-paid shipping label out so that I could box up my old device and easily send it back. Simple and painless. From everything I've heard/read, this is an area where Amazon really stands out compared to other companies. If you're torn between one of the Kindles and a similar device, I recommend you take this into consideration.And, finally ... when pairing with Amazon Prime, this device goes to a whole new level. Having access to the Prime Instant Video library has made me fall in love with my Kindle in a new way. It's so easy to just access their large video library and watch movies or TV series on my device. Not to mention, you get a free monthly loan from their Kindle Owners' Lending Library. This is one area in which Amazon truly distinguishes itself from its competitors, in my opinion.Overall, I'm once again a satisfied Amazon customer!Edited Jan 05, 2013:Still pretty much love the device but wanted to add another point each for the Good and Bad column.* Bad -- I miss the charge indicator on the outside of the Kindle. On the earlier device it would light up red when the device was plugged in and charging, and green when it was plugged in and the charge was complete. Not only did this let you know when your device was charged, it also allowed you to see that it was properly plugged in and actually charging. Nothing more annoying than going to grab your Kindle Fire HD, only to realize it wasn't properly plugged in and you have no charge left.* Good -- I love that it now shows you exactly what percentage you are in your book, right on the page. On the earlier device you would have to bring up the lower menu to see how far in the book you are. Now it's listed right there on the bottom right-hand corner.

Reviews.Title: Graphics great
Reviews.Author: Teresa Banks
Reviews.Content: Nice size, has everything I need and more, for work or personal time, graphics are great and very easy to see when reading, and love all the apps that it came with.

Reviews.Title: Buy it!! You'll love it!
Reviews.Author: carolyn
Reviews.Content: I totally love my Kindle Fire HD what an amazing device- so user friendly, the picture is fabulous and the sound as well, so worth the money! Easy to set up and download one step purchasing of books and love Prime membership with it

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD.
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I can only add to the many great reviews already put out about the KFHD. It's just a great all around tablet. The resolution on the screen is impeccable. It's also easy to navigate.Don't fall for the Nexus7 or iPad being better bit. Most of those folks are hard core techies or developers. I have a laptop to do my work on. It's bulky and a pain to take away from home though. My Kindle Fire HD is great for travel or around the house for when I want to surf the net, read books, play games, watch a movie and many other fun things.I have Google Chrome browser, Dolphin Browser that runs Adobe Flash Player, you can read nook books with the nook app, Skype, FB, Twitter and Tube Mate (great for watching as well as downloading YouTube vids right to your Kindle Fire HD.)The point is that this is the best tablet that covers the most bases. In no way is the KFHD short on apps or capabilities. The KFHD also has dual antennas and also has a great sounding, dual, Dolby digital speakers.

Reviews.Title: My first Tablet
Reviews.Author: Douglas Terry "Doug Terry"
Reviews.Content: My wife and I both got Kindle Fire HD's around the end of November and we both really like them.  I think I have probably used mine certainly as a reader more than she has.  I don't use a lot of apps but I downloaded a few utility apps such as a scientific calculator, unit converter and the like to make it more useful.  I enjoy reading on the Kindle more than I expected.  A primary reason for getting them was for being able to take several books along when flying off on vacation.  With the purchase of a Kindle you get a month of Kindle Prime free (I'm going to continue with Prime) and that gives you a free down load of some Kindle books, one per month.  It's on a calendar month basis so we could down load one for November and just a few days later one for December.  And I've just down loaded one from our county library system.  So I've read two books and I'm well into the 3rd.  I love the X-Ray feature.  For example a character comes up and I've forgotten just who they are.  I use the X-Ray feature and it will show up all instances of that character by page, chapter or the entire book.  Go back to the first instance and it will remind me who the character is.  Not all down loads have this feature.  The one from the county library does not. Obviously it lays flat.  So if I'm reading the book while eating lunch at work, I don't have to manipulate a sandwich while keeping the book open at the same time.  And yes that's lazy.  I'm OK with that.  I can read for hours with no eye strain.  It's at least as easy as reading a paper copy.  There is some glare outside.  I've read quite a bit outside while at deer camp.  It's not bad but it is not without glare.  For me the screen is a comfortable size for reading.I've used it quite a bit for searching the web.  If you're used to the Apple format such as the iPhone, it's different on the Kindle.  Not in a bad way, just different.  The spell check including the anticipation of what you are going to type is differnt but once I've gotten use to it, I think I really like that feature better than on the iPhone.  It puts up several choices and you tap one to select it.  Sometimes it will anticipate a word based on the previous words before you've even started typing the next word.  For some things such as getting to bookmarks or searching the web, it's probably not as intuitive as the Apple format (tap the menu icon, starter page and then enter a search string, tap bookmarks etc) but once you get use to it, it works just fine.  And aplogies for referring to the Apple format several times but many people are already familiar with that and it seems a valid point of reference.We have had no problems with them, no freezes or hang-ups.  One time mine was not going into landscape.  I powered it down and restarted it and the landscape feature returned.  I try to remember to do that about once per week for all my portable devices just like I do for desktops and laptops to get rid of computer "fuzz".In short my wife and I are both enjoying them and are glad we made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: B. Atchley
Reviews.Content: Purchased one for myself and my wife.  My first "tablet" and I love it!  Big Bonus if your an Amazon Prime member.  10 stars If I could!

Reviews.Title: new to the kindle world
Reviews.Author: Pebbles "Pebbles"
Reviews.Content: I am new to the kindle fire world, I had to ask someone what I wanted because I love to read! Takes a little to get used too, but REALLY love my kindle fire! I would recommend this to people who are like myself & new to this. I have already read more than I have in a long time & I can`t  wait to turn it on to read my next chapter of the many free books that are available to read. I don`t use this much too surf the net as I have my laptop to do my surfing with. I would highly recommend purchasing this!

Reviews.Title: I love My Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Nancy Howlett
Reviews.Content: My second Kindle Fire and I love the HD and Dolby Audio.  Now listening to Pandora is even better and the volume is louder.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Niurka Diaz
Reviews.Content: I seldom write reviews but I NEED to say this is a great device easy to use and the picture quality is amazing

Reviews.Title: A Great E-Reader With Fun Extras
Reviews.Author: in the Berkshires
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire as an early Christmas gift.  I've been having fun with it ever since.This is my second Kindle.  My old faithful travels with me to work, making it easy to read during my lunch hour.  I've found my new Kindle to be just as portable and readable, though I think the original Kindle screen will be easier to read in daylight while the lit screen on the Kindle Fire makes reading in bed at night without another light source not only possible, but comfortable.While I'm still exploring its various functions, I do like the larger screen on this Kindle as compared to my older model and I am enjoying playing games on it as well.  The touch screen did take a little getting used to, but it's second nature now.One feature I'm finding very useful is the sync to furthest page read option, since I am using both my original Kindle and the Kindle Fire.  It's very convenient to keep one in my purse and the other at my bedside and simply sync to the last page and start reading where I left off without having to bring a book with me where ever I go.  This feature also works between the Kindle apps available for download for use on a computer to sync reading between laptop and Kindle.As with my original Kindle, I love the ease of downloading books from Amazon and being able to preview books I'm considering by downloading a sample.  I like being able to start a new book as soon as I finish the last one without having to carry two books with me.  With my Kindle, I can carry an entire library of books with me.  I'm looking forward to exploring what else my new Kindle Fire has to offer.The Kindle Fire is available with or without "special offers" ($15 extra to be advertisement free).  I much prefer the pretty cover screens when the Kindle is idle to any ads that might have appeared there.I do recommend getting the quick charge adapter to use with the USB cable provided to be able to charge the Kindle Fire using an electric outlet rather than through the computer's USB port.  A cover also makes a useful addition.

Reviews.Title: GREAT MEDIA
Reviews.Author: Josephine Eckert
Reviews.Content: First, let me say this is a wonderful media.  I'm not very techy but the KINDLE FIRE HD 7 is so easy to navigate.  There are a couple of issues though.  First, when taking pictures with the camera, you kind of have to judge the position of your subject because there is no view finder and second, the speakers are in the back.  The sound is great, but it would be fanominal if the speakers were in the front.  All in all though, I'm happy with my Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: PATTI
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is quite nice and I am still working my way though it all.  I am however very disappointed that the Kindle Fire screen is not glareproof.  I was trying to read in my automobile and the glare is unbelievable.  Kindle is the iPad that advertises with a woman reading on the beach and claims "IT'S A kINDLE"  It seems that the Kindle fire should have a glareroof screen without additional purchase.

Reviews.Title: Yes, my grand daughter will love this!
Reviews.Author: Tony "Tony"
Reviews.Content: I have a 1st generation iPad, which I still will use often and like it very much. I was considering the latest iPad, but the cost was a little too high for me to purchase it. Then I thoroughly researched the other various tablets available. I was at a crossroads between the Nexus and the Fire HD.  I purchased the Fire HD due to the very good reviews and how good Amazon's customer service has been for me through the years. And since I've been an Amazon Prime member for the last 6 or so years, I decided to get the Kindle Fire HD.  This 7" Kindle Fire HD is for my grand daughter as a Christmas gift. When it arrived here to my home, I wanted to thoroughly familiarize myself with it before presenting it to her. I'm very much satisfied with it.  The Kindle promptly arrived and I'm extremely satisfied with it and I know my grand daughter will be as well!  Great job Amazon! There are some minor things which I would like, such as a front facing camera, more apps available (which will come in time). But other then those two items, I'm a very satisfied to be giving this as a Christmas gift!Also.... I bought myself the 8.9" Kindle Fire HD!  I was so pleased with the 7" Kindle Fire HD that I got for my grand daughter after having ample time to familiarize myself with her Kindle, that I bought one for me! Great job Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great product!  Awesome picture.  The browser is great.  I have a Nook Color also and think the Kindle is easier to use and has better apps available.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Naurita
Reviews.Content: I was hesitant about owning one for reading books because I'm an avid book reader, but I really love it.  Very easy to use. I also have played some of the games and watched a few movies on it.  I would say it's on-the-go entertainment.  I take it with me most of the time.

Reviews.Title: love m'kindle
Reviews.Author: N. Gordon
Reviews.Content: I'm loving the Kindle HD.  I bought an hdmi cable for it and can hook it right up to my tv to watch free movies with Amazon Prime.  I couldn't find another device that has an hdmi output beside the Kindle.  The screen looks awesome, I have lots of fun with it, love reading on it and the battery life is great!  I'm so glad I picked this tablet.  No regrets!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Tablet
Reviews.Author: Miss La
Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire exceeded my expectations. It is an excellent tablet.....and the price mskes it.even better. Its is fast on my wireless network..great for reading books....surfing the web...glad I purchased this product.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Connie Dougherty
Reviews.Content: I love my  my new Kindle Fire HD. Got it along with the Kindle Fire charger and cover in 2 days!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Ursula Jablonski
Reviews.Content: The definition of this kindle far exceeds my expectations. Well worth the money and look forward to using all the apps that are in it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Most of my friends have tablets, but I was holding out. Talking to a good friend who has one, he told me all the cool things this does and how you get so much for your money. I have a desk top with a 24 inch HD flat screen, but it isn't portable. This is. The speed is super fast and the sound is great. Duel antennas and duel speakers make it fantastic. I'm so glad I bought this one instead of shelling out 6 to 8 hundred dollars on a tablet. This is the best deal on the market. I also read on line that the 7 inch tablets are the most popular because of size and ease of carrying around. The picture quality is amazing. It is so clear you see everything! I would highly recommend this to anyone who wants a high quality tablet at a fantastic price!!

Reviews.Title: get it
Reviews.Author: Robert T Blair
Reviews.Content: i love the kindle fire it is fun, entertaining, helpful, and awesome i recommend it entirely if you are looking for any of those things

Reviews.Title: a great product
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: I love it even at my first glance and will recommend it to my friends. a very Good deal. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: total fun!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: The first Kindle Fire had as many weaknesses as it did strengths. My original fire froze, lagged, and was not dependable to stream tv shows, and movies.That is all fixed with the Kindle Fire HD. I have had it for over a month and have not had to reboot it one time. The screen looks terrific and is very responsive. Movies look and play great along with a loud, crisp sound. Reading books is a lot easier on the eyes and I much prefer the new book layout.I am very happy with the fire and I am glad to have stuck with Amazon. I look forward to their future products.

Reviews.Title: VERY HAPPY!
Reviews.Author: jrdroth2
Reviews.Content: I am by far a techno geek, but I love, love, love my Kindle Fire HD! I appreciate good quality and the Fire HD comes through for me. The Dolby sound is great! I read through a user guide but the Kindle seems to just take me through the steps automatically to so much that is accessible on this little gem. Can't wait to see how the HDMI cable works with streaming through my TV (I need my son to help me with that though, haha!). I am very excited about all the Documentaries available for free with the Prime membership (for me a Prime purchase was a no-brainer).  My only complaint is that now shopping is a little TOO easy! I have found some great accessories at affordable prices through the Amazon Shop.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: I am one of those people who really didn't understand why anyone would want one. My kids kept wanting to get me one and I resisted until they broke me down. Now I am so glad I did. I bought a cover with it and it really feels like I am reading a regular book. I get the free books from my library without going out. I also have the prime membership so I can order books quick. I did get the kindle without the ads and am glad I did. The only con I have is the power button is very hard to see, I did fix that by putting a small dot on my kindle so it is easier to find. That is one thing I wish kindle had done, built in a small arrow on the front of the kindle so you know where the button is. Battery life is really good. My daughter just ordered the nook so I am curious to compare the 2.Wanted to add that it is now April 2013 and have to say I am a little disappointed in the battery life of my kindle, it has to be charged much more often than when I first bought it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" 16GB with ads
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: Let me start off by saying this is the first tablet I have ever owned or used so you can take this review as you will. I chose this kindle based on product reviews and feature comparisons. In my opinion, the kindle is the best buy. I have had this tablet about a month now and it does everything the description says it will. It is user friendly and fairly self explanatory. If you can use a smart phone, you can use this tablet. The only thing that I found did not meet expectations is the battery life. But this is common among chargeable devices and didn't inhibit the experience of using it so I didn't dock any stars. If you're on the fence about buying this deivce, buy it. You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" is Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: O. J. Gottardi II
Reviews.Content: Kindle Fire HD 7" is Awesome!!!  I love just about everything about this tablet.  The Kindle is a real nice step up for Amazon and you can't beat the price.  It's easy to use apps, browse with it, and oh yeah you can use it to read books.  Watching video images and looking at pictures is amazingly clear.

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Great screen resolution.Awesome selection of apps, books and movies. Very easy to use, can't put it down.I would buy it again!

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love the Kindle Wildfire HD!!!
Reviews.Author: Jackie Jameson "Book Maven"
Reviews.Content: I am blown away by all of the things you can do with it!  It is amazing!  Check email, shop on- line, browse eBay, watch movies & TV shows, listen to music, play games - the list goes on & on.  The price is great!!!  Dolby audio is really nice & so is the picture or screen.  Small & light weight, you can take it with you - easily!  LOVE IT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this tablet
Reviews.Author: Lucy Mayren
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this tablet after having owned a Barnes and Noble Nook Tablet. I was unhappy with my Nook for many reasons, so I decided to purchase a Kindle Fire. I love this tablet so much. The Amazon app store has so many fun apps, games and TV shows. Also the screen is beautiful, and the quality of video and pics is amazing. Another thing I really like is the Kindle Free Time app. I have a 3-year old and she loves playing "games" and watching shows but it's always so costly to buy them. With Kindle Free Time, she has unlimited access to thousands of TV shows, apps and books specifically for kids age 3-6. It's so awesome and she loves that she can pick out new items whenever she'd like. I have the free one-month trial, but for $4.99/month afterwards, I'll definitely be keeping it. Another thing I really like is the internet browser is really good, and the keyboard is easy to type on. This is really a very nice tablet. I'm quite happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Lack of customization is a bummer but the Kindle still gives you the most for your money!
Reviews.Author: J. Rexroat "The one and only"
Reviews.Content: This device gives me everything I need from a tablet. I'm not an IT guy but at no point have I needed directions or instructions of any kind. It is so simple to use it's almost funny. The quality of the build, the screen and software are way above my expectations. My only minor complaint would be the lack of ability to customize things. Of course, I knew of that issue prior to my purchasing the Kindle. I just didn't know to what extent it would be. For mn, its a minor issue and by no means a deal breaker. Simply put, Amazon has sold me an excellent tablet that I love. I wasn't expecting an IPad for $200......

Reviews.Title: Exceeding Expectations
Reviews.Author: Troy
Reviews.Content: This does so much that it would be hard to review all of the functions individually. It does everything as advertised and seems to be a bargain compared to the other tablets out there. I just tested the HD output and only expected 720p since that is the advertised display resolution advertised, but was surprised to see that it is a full 1080p. The TV display for the input line was showing 1080p. I and another person visually confirmed that it looked 1080, not just 720 using a Sony Bravia 42" TV. Also, the sound quality was at least dolby 5.1 surround, confirmed using an add on surround sound system. This had been a question I had and tried to get the info on from other reviews that only confirmed HD input, not exactly what resolution it was and they seemed to say it was OK, but they wouldn't use it for HD TV viewing. Why exactly that is, I have no idea because it works extremely well, as long as you have a 1080p source I guess - I tested using Netflix.It browses the web fast and I think the dual wi-fi antennas are helpful in that.The only complaint I currently have is the magazine selection available for kindle is extremely limited and that was something I wanted to use it for. Hopefully, publishers will catch up and start providing their magazines with full content and illustrations for kindle HD.There were more apps than I expected but I realize it's not the full Android selection, but I've found everything I want for now including some cool games.I mainly wanted an e-reader that did more like movies and web browsing. It does all of that really well. The e-reader has different lighting settings and has been easy on the eyes in light or complete dark.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Linda M. Carrington
Reviews.Content: Love it.  It was exactly what i needed since my laptop went down.  I love reading and i read a book every two day.  I would recommend this to any and everyone. This is the best purchase i have made in years.

Reviews.Title: Great video-watching experience
Reviews.Author: Solomon Kim
Reviews.Content: I'm five days into my ownership period and have very little to complain about... The screen and speakers are phenomenal for videos, which has been my primary use of the Kindle Fire HD so far. I get a good WiFi signal in parts of my house where my Macbook Air doesn't. The battery life is satisfactory.I think an important thing for a prospective buyer to keep in mind about the Kindle Fire HD is that it isn't meant to cater to a poweruser, like a lot of other Android tablets. The app selection doesn't seem as comprehensive as the Google Play Store (or at least there are certain key apps that you can't get from Amazon) and the interface feels designed to keep you within the boundaries of Amazon's ecosystem--I deduct about 3/4 of a star for this. This feels like it was made to sell you content from Amazon, but if you're nerdy enough, there are ways to work around the things that you can't readily do. As long as you understand what you're getting into, it's a great tablet to own and use.One advantage it has over the other tablets is that if you have an Amazon Prime subscription, there's a lot of free content that you can't access on other tablets.My only other gripe is minor--I wish the USB port was somewhere other than the bottom edge--If used with the leather cover, it can't be charged and stood up at the same time. I'm knocking off another 1/4 star for this.

Reviews.Title: Fabulous, but......
Reviews.Author: I Read Anything
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire 8.9 is my fourth tablet, replacing a Verizon Xyboard 8.2 whose contract is up.  I also owned a Samsung Galaxy 10.1 and a Motorola Xoom 10.First look after three days: the tablet is as gorgeous as they claim.  It runs Android ICS 4.0 rejiggerd by Amazon. It is a little smoother than my Motorola tablet in terms of getting from App A to App B.  I like the carousel, though it takes a a bit to get used to it.  Books and video are great and I have no complaint. The size is perfect to fit in a purse, unlike the 10 inch tablets.Complaints:I am sure everybody complained about the power button. Ah, the power button.  Comeon guys, we are not hobbits and some of us, even women, have fat fingers. Give us a relief!!Apps: you have to take apps from the Amazon store.  I don't mind it, but they lack a bunch of useful ones such as Dropbox and Youtube and a few others I used daily on my other Android tablet with apps from Google Play.  Unless I am wrong that Youtube is missing, Youtube is a must.I will write an update after I have used it for a while.  But so far, so good.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: bugbees
Reviews.Content: Wow, I'm so surprised how much I'm using this little guy.  I bought it for reading after trying to read books on the Ipad.  Love the size and convenance. I was so pleased to discover all the things I can do with the Kindle.  Reading at night is so easy given how light and easy to hold it is.  This is simply a great little device.  It does it all. Just started the Hobbit again and can't put it down. I plan to get my email setup and give my husband back his Ipad.

Reviews.Title: I am sold
Reviews.Author: amuser
Reviews.Content: I am sold on some of the unique features on this tablet (unique at the time of reviewing anyway).* HDMI output on 7 in tablet* Duel wifi antenna (it is the only device I can pickup signal through my house.  I have Thinkpad w520, Samsung Galaxy SIII, IPhone 3S and 4).  I have no problem streaming HD video when other device can't load a web page.* Stereo sound on 7 in tablet* OK parental controlI mostly use it to stream movies from Amazon Prime and gaming for kids.  If you are looking for a powerful tablet to run Android apps, you should look elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Aurora
Reviews.Content: Quick and easy to use. Good Wifi connection. Love all the books available to download. Just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet and awesome display
Reviews.Author: Tanya
Reviews.Content: So happy I paid the few extra bucks for the HD. I am so addicted to my Kindle. I've seen a lot of reviews with things people think could be improved but I've had mine for over a month and as I've learned more (it's really easy and intuitive) I just keep finding more things I like about it. I know more apps will be coming, but I am happy with the quality of the device and love discovering new things every day!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Patricia F. Roldan
Reviews.Content: I have a Ipad 2 but I wanted the kindle because of the HD and I am not disappointed. The screen is so clear and I just love watching movies on it. the price is great.

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Castaneda
Reviews.Content: SUPER FAST, GREAT SOUND, WHAT MORE COULD I ASK FOR? BOUGHT THIS GIFT AS A PRESENT FOR A MALE. TOO BAD I COULDN'T WAIT TIL CHRISTMAS TO GIVE IT TO HIM!

Reviews.Title: The more I use it, the more I love it!
Reviews.Author: Carol Trees
Reviews.Content: What fun!  The Kindle Fire HD is more versatile than expected--loads of apps are available.  For the money, I believe this is the best!

Reviews.Title: better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "ZED"
Reviews.Content: Easy and pleasant to use, especially for the price. The HD screen provides excellent images and the sound is unexpectedly good.  It was a welcomed gift.

Reviews.Title: So much fun!
Reviews.Author: Solstes
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle fire! It can do much more than I ever anticipated and it's sooooo much fun!

Reviews.Title: loving it so far
Reviews.Author: Bfox
Reviews.Content: Spent a lot of time reviewing this device. I have an ipad, which is great, but I feel its too big for reading.  Bought it about a week ago and haven't put thething down since...the screen is bright and the battery lasts a long time. Also enjoy the prime trial with it, just wish you could get more free book downloads..... oh well. So far, so good!

Reviews.Title: Loving my KIndle
Reviews.Author: mamag
Reviews.Content: I just got the Kindle Fire HD 32gb and i am just loving it.  It's for my son's birthday gift.  He is turning 11 on December 18th, but I want to loaded up with everything with all the apps.  I want one for myself.  I don't think we are going to be able to share it.  It is so easy to use.  It's just fantastic, awesome.  Loving my Kindle I mean my son's Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a Gift
Reviews.Author: TerisaC
Reviews.Content: I bought this Kindle Fire HD 7" for my daughter's birthday.  It has a very clear screen and easy to view.  It worked great for the first few weeks, but now it times out even while she is watching a video.  Very frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Love this!
Reviews.Author: Coffee lover
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD!  I've gotten a couple of other small tablets and ultimately returned them but this is a keeper!  I love the ease of use, the portability of being able to pop it into my tote bag. Love the Cloud feature to store books and pictures. The endless supply of free books is amazing! The apps are good,too.The only thing that bothers me about this is that sometimes it drops the wi-fi connection temporarily...but just long enough to interrupt what I'm doing. I wish it had  a more comprehensive manual of operation,too. I'm learning about what all it can do but I'm sure there is more that I'm not even aware of.Overall, this is one magnificent little tablet! Love it!

Reviews.Title: Moved up from old Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kris
Reviews.Content: Was surprised how much I liked it!  Moved up from the old Kindle, and was worried about the brighter screen for reading, as I work on a computer for a living. Was thrilled to find that it doesn't bother my eyes at all!  Am absolutely amazed at the quality for videos as well.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: B. Bertini "Sisterwolf"
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HD am so glad I bought it.  I arrived quickly and in good shape.  No problems getting around it it.  There are alot of avertisements but I can live with them not worth the $25 to get them removed to me.  I will use that money for others things for my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: for what it does, it does best
Reviews.Author: Boo Blanco
Reviews.Content: the Kindle Fire HD strikes an excellent balance between the ease of use and ecosystem of an iPad and the versatility of Android at a price that can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: (bwags)
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.  Even the grand kids love it.  Very fast with a great picture and amazing sound.  Now going to get one for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: It is GREAT
Reviews.Author: Brigitte
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy my kindle fire. It is straight forward and easy to use. No issues with it at all. It is a joy to have

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Lisa R Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought the Kindle Fire as a gift for a friend. She had been researching the Apple Ipad and was set on buying one. Upon receiving the Kindle she was amazed and impressed at how much better it was than the Ipad, it was love at first use! Thank you Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Machine
Reviews.Author: KokaPGI
Reviews.Content: I have owned a Kindle Fire since the release of the original.  This machine is a major upgrade to the original model.  The inclusion of Bluetooth allows me to use an external keyboard (among other peripherals).  This alone makes this tablet a worthy replacement for my laptop, at lease when space is tight.The improved speakers and screen are added bonuses.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money!
Reviews.Author: Precious
Reviews.Content: It's does so much and I'm lovin it. I also view YouTube without a problem by typing it in the browser instead of side loading. Love it!

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it
Reviews.Author: V
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle; it does just about everything.....the resolution is great and its easy 2 use. Apps are easy 2 download and ebooks as well. Very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Loving My Kindle!
Reviews.Author: LouiseLou
Reviews.Content: I choose this rating" I Love It" because I really love it! I own 2 more kindles,but with this one I can read  without additional light as with my other two I have to have lighting because they have no back light.I also love the HD it had great picture quality.Yes I would recommend this Kindle to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent, better than original, better value than pretty much anything on the market
Reviews.Author: Conscript
Reviews.Content: First the criticisms:-Reading in low brightness on Sepia makes the screen green rather than yellow. Fairly annoying-Brightness doesn't seem to go low enough really. It is still quite bright in a dark room even on the lowest possible setting-The reduction in glare is drastically overstated. It is better, it is not even remotely close to being readable in sunlight on anything but the highest brightness settings. Even in my poorly lit office it requires mid-brightness settings to be visible.Okay the good stuff:-The new design is fantastic. The new speaker system and placement is worlds better than the Fire's horrible speakers.-The responsiveness of the screen is downright shocking. I honestly couldn't believe how easy it is to type on the new screen with zero errors or lag.-Speaking of lag, the new processor is much quicker.-Streaming quality is vastly improved. The difference between the Fire and HD is noticeable right off the bat.-The ads aren't nearly as intrusive as I was expecting.Haven't delved too deeply into the other features like the camera, but if they are as good as everything else I'm sure they won't be an issue at all.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Dutchie
Reviews.Content: I got a kindle touch with 3G and wifi last year for Christmas. I absolutely loved it, but my husband decided he wanted a kindle as well, and I really also wanted an tablet. So we decided that this year I was getting the new Kindle Fire HD, and he was going to use my "old" kindle. I absolutely LOVE this kindle fire HD!!! I wish it had 3G, but I also understand it would probably cost more and require a monthly fee if it did. Most places nowadays have free wi-fi, so I can still use it almost everywhere, and when I don't have wifi I just read my book or play games :) It's amazing what all you can do with it! The design has broad enough edges to hold on to it comfortably, has smoother edges and not the boxy design of the regular kindle fire, and the quality is wonderful. I watched a tv show through instant streaming from Amazon (with my prime membership) and the quality was just as good as it would have been on my HD tv. I expected to need my headphone to get the sound loud enough, but even with the sound only halfway up it was plenty loud enough. I got a cover with it so that I can stand my kindle up at an angle for easy watching of shows and movies without having to hold it. I also got a screen protector, which I'm happy I did because I can already see all the fingerprints from where I've used it, so my screen will last longer with the protector plus it's easier to clean!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Hd
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: Easy to use! Long life battery. Crisp clear pictures!  I would reccomend to anyone considering a Kindle Fire HD. Thsi is the way to go!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing price, great tablet
Reviews.Author: Tom H.
Reviews.Content: Amazon does it again! They have somehow made an extremely affordable tablet much better. The screen is incredible and the size is perfect. It seems easy to navigate through apps and the web, and the interface is really intuitive and responsive. Its a great gift for any age.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: Dale A. Fischer
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle Fire for about 7 months.  I bought it with the 2 year warranty which I had to use.  The wi-fi went out.  So I got the new HD Fire as a replacement.  I love it, so I got my wife one for Christmas.  Hope she loves it as well (so maybe she won't keep using mine!)

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "loving the kindle"
Reviews.Content: I had an original kindle and the screen broke.  So I upgrade and I love this little thing.  It's amazing.  My 4 year old loves to watch her Dora videos and the screen and sound is so clear.  As if you where sitting in front of the TV.  Love the touch portion...I'm still learning how things work but LOVE IT!

Reviews.Title: Everyone loves the Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Talisa
Reviews.Content: We're really impressed by this product, and even my iPad-owning dad thinks it's cool. Just like a tablet, really. Good buy.

Reviews.Title: Still learning
Reviews.Author: tintia
Reviews.Content: There's so much on this machine that I may never know everything it can do.I'm having a load of fun with it. I've only had it for two weeks so I'm not able torate it in it's entirety but love it so far.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: SG
Reviews.Content: It's a really good tablet. The image is nice and sharpy.if you have amazon prime, you can see lots of movies from amazon .I RECOMEND it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Olivia
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle very much. This is the second kindle I have owned(I had the kindle touch). I love it and it is exceptional.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle
Reviews.Author: Alton L. James
Reviews.Content: I truly love my Kindle. The only problem I am having is when I upload too many books (1000+). No more paperbacks for this guy.

Reviews.Title: Review on Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: tglass
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this device.  So clear and fast.  I am able to check email, surf the net, read books and stream videos all on one device

Reviews.Title: Love love love!
Reviews.Author: Brenda Skeel
Reviews.Content: I researched and debated whether to buy the Amazon Kindle HD or an IPADI love it! Do not hesitate to buy this Kindle. I spend hours on it. Do yourself a favor and buy a stylus though

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: PAMELA J HARTFIELD
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this! Its great for playing games,watching movies and reading books.I have no complains, Im on mine everyday. The kindle fire HD is amazing! :)

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I wanted to test this product and then a I Pad mini. So far in the two months I've had this, I can say it's easy to use, with plenty of apps. Not as quick as I'd like, but good for reading. Good rendering of movies and good audio. I'll have to post again when I get the mini

Reviews.Title: Great tablet - more than I expected.
Reviews.Author: Charlie Eddlemon
Reviews.Content: Got this tablet to play games, check email and maybe look something up on eBay.  After using it for a few weeks I got rid of my laptop and now this is all I use.  Only wish it had a front facing camera.

Reviews.Title: Best thing I've ever purchased!
Reviews.Author: survivorsmom
Reviews.Content: I'm not a techie person so this is strictly from a "normal" user standpoint.I love everything about it!  It's easy to learn, easy to use, convenient, and does everything I was hoping for plus lots more I'm still learning about.  The sound and video quality actually surprised me, I was expecting less.  I love reading books on it and playing games on it is great!I wasn't overly excited about the free 30 day Prime membership, but that changed!  Even though I can't take advantage of the free 2 day shipping (I only have a PO Box for receiving mail) I still went ahead and upgraded for the movies and the books.  It well worth the cost but I do wish I could take advantage of the 2 day shipping.I was showing my Kindle Fire to my niece and sister over Thanksgiving and both of them are going to buy one if they haven't already.  My daughter-in-law was more impressed with it than the Nook she bought her daughter so I think she'll be getting one for herself as well.To summarize... it was so much better than I expected and I'm so glad this is what I chose!

Reviews.Title: Great buy!!
Reviews.Author: Cbish2012
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is a really great product for the price. I really love the the picture, and the sound quality is awesome. The only tiny thing that very slightly bothers me is the app store is kind of limited, but aside from that, this is great. All in all, i can't think of a better product for the price.

Reviews.Title: Crystal clear picture
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: The picture is super clear and can be seen in bright light. It's fast and has great sound. With 16GB you have room for lots of stuff including music, books, videos and games. I am really enjoying mine.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Wendy J. Leach
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this. I can take pic  can read a book, Go on the internet. Shop on amazon which is one of my favorite sites to shop on anyway. I will be flying and will take this in my purse and use it to read which I think is amazing. Love It!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire you rock!
Reviews.Author: Shea
Reviews.Content: It's like all your favorite electronics wrapped into one. This thing can do almost anything. You will not be disappointed if you buy it.

Reviews.Title: iPad what? Kindle Fire is where it's at!
Reviews.Author: Jared Brentlinger
Reviews.Content: Plays Netflix great, WiFi capability has great range. Resolution on the screen is AMAZING! For the price you cannot go wrong. Bought one for my spouse and myself after becoming addicted to hers! Our son LOVES it and it is great for reading books when no light is available. Amazing sound but I suggest good headphones to really hear it all.Battery life is super long and can go 3 or 4 days without a recharge from moderate use.A steal at $199.99.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Lorna Kleinrock
Reviews.Content: I am TOTALLY satisfied with my purchase of the Kindle Fire HD.  It is capable of completing several functions and is extremely easy to use.  It is light and compact enough for portability anywhere.  The screen is large enough to easily view apps, games, web surfing, etc. in both portrait and landscape view. I have not found one thing yet (after almost a month of usage) that could be considered as a negative.This product would be an AWESOME holiday gift for people of all ages.  It is very affordable, fun, and practical.  You will not be disappointed if you buy one.  The only difficulty you may encounter is keeping OTHER people from using your Kindle!!

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I ordered!
Reviews.Author: Trudy H.
Reviews.Content: My daughter Loves her kindle! Works wonderfully! Only complaint is too many advertisements! Great for reading! Thank you very much!

Reviews.Title: Awesome device
Reviews.Author: Heather moakley
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if I should upgrade at first but boy am I glad I did. This device is ten times better then the first Kindle Fire. It's brighter, faster, and is much more comfortable to hold. Highly recommended.Also recommend the 8.9 if cash isn't an issue. The bigger screen is definitely worth it.

Reviews.Title: more than an ereader
Reviews.Author: kathy frantz
Reviews.Content: i love that it does everything a tablet does. great product. picture has great clarity and touch screen is very responsive

Reviews.Title: Its a great tablet!
Reviews.Author: BusyMom
Reviews.Content: Lots of nice features especially book reading application.  Easy to use and fast internet speed capabilities.  Perfect size and love to watch movies.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Ruth Clark
Reviews.Content: The versatility and options continue to amaze me. Very user-friendly and easy to master. Even my three-year-old grandson is comfortable with this.

Reviews.Title: Bought for the audiobooks, love the games...
Reviews.Author: TQs girl
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  I am addicted to some of the games.  I just had back surgery and it is a great companion.  The pictures are clear and the audio is great.  I can use Skype, get my email, and the Customer Service is quick and courteous.  Recommend this  to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD - More than I expected
Reviews.Author: MG in Seal Beach
Reviews.Content: The screen is amazingly clear and the colors are vivid.  I use it mainly for reading books, and it has features for this that are very nice.  I was surprised by its ability to also access the internet.  If you are primarily planning to use it as a reader, I highly recommend it.  If you are going to use it primarily for internet searches, I would recommend a computer instead, as it is not quite as fast as a dedicated web browser.

Reviews.Title: Love it sooooo much!!
Reviews.Author: kathleen
Reviews.Content: I'm more than happy with the Kindle Fire HD. I can do almost anything on it. I think my husband loves it more than me. I can't seen to get it away from him or my kids. I will be purchasing another one very soon!!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Julia Staley
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire so I bought he Kindle Fire HD for my husband. We love how it works right out of the box!

Reviews.Title: Love my fire HD
Reviews.Author: jmnznkaty
Reviews.Content: I have had my kindle fire hd for about two months now upgrading from my Kindle 3G.  I love it!  The ease of switching between apps books to videos etc is great.  I really enjoy the font and lighting options for books.  No more lighting issues for me at night.  The battery is good even when I am streaming videos then reading late.  I do miss the 3G feature when shopping but there are a lot places with wifi so I am adjusting when I am not at home.

Reviews.Title: LOVE the Fire HD
Reviews.Author: P. Lamoureux
Reviews.Content: I have limited experience with hand held devices (I don't even own a cell phone of any kind).  My first experience with a hand held device was the first Kindle because I am a reader and wanted something lighter than a book.  Wonderful - it was perfect.  That was a year ago.  Yesterday, I received the Kindle Fire HD because I wanted a tablet, and my experience with my first Kindle was very good.  Video and sound on the Fire HD is awesome!  It has sharp, crisp imaging and excellent sound quality!  I use Pandora on my laptop computer so I was able to easily and quickly connect to Pandora as well as link up to my email accounts in a matter of minutes.  No fuss, no muss.  Downloading & installing apps are done in less than a minute.  WOW!!!  Now if I can get the hang of this 'cloud' thing I'll be golden. :)However, there are 2 things that would have made it a touch easier. 1 - setting the system time.  It took me 30 minutes of looking around before I found out how to set the time.  2 - if I can only find the camera app!  I don't use Skype but I'm hoping to in the near future so at this moment, I have no need for video but it would be nice if I can locate the camera app to take a few pictures to see how they turn out.  For these 2 reasons, I have given this item 4 stars because I believe that if a unit has functions, they should all be readily available to the average user.  Other than that, this is an awesome product!  Can't wait to see what else it can do.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: S. Glidden
Reviews.Content: My husband bought me the regular Kindle Fire for Christmas and we both loved it!  He wanted one so he bought me the new Kindle Fire HD and took the other.  At first I did not like it as well.  The pics were beautiful on it and everything was clear but figuring it out was not as clear.  I played with it and enjoyed the basics and of course the reading but I did not like not having flash player and facebook did not work very well. It took me a a little playing with but I got it figured out and now everything works great!!!  I love it and highly recommend it

Reviews.Title: great tablet
Reviews.Author: Gayatri
Reviews.Content: new to the world of ereaders and tablets. so far so good as far the mKindle Fire HD 7", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offersain reason for purchasing was for upcoming traveling. only desire is that Rosette Stone program would be compatible otherwise quite happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Melanie van Wijngaarden
Reviews.Content: Very impressed by the speed, UI and the integration with Amazon store. My kids read books, watch movies, play games, my teenage son reads his e-mail and Facebook postings on it too. No idea why you would want to spend 200 dollars more on another tablet!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Art Ripley
Reviews.Content: I bought the Fire HD 32 MB as an adjunct to my Droid SmartPhone, to add several capabilities:1)  Easily view web content such as FaceBook, etc..2)  View pdf diagrams,3)  Listen to my music,4)  Store and read books while traveling.5)  Secure internet transactions.I was surprised to find that listening to music actually was better via the Fire HD, the Dolby sound really enhanced my music, a great deal of which is theater pipe organ. Wow! Fantastic bass with crystal clear rendition throughout the audio range. This is very impressive.Of course the books are easy to read, I read one the first evening I had the Fire HD just to see how well this worked, actually listened to music while reading!One of the items I checked before buiying the Fire HD was the availability o the Cisco AnyConnect VPN client, the first app I installed was the VPN client, no problems in installing or configuring, flawless operation and the connection is persistent, I can establish it at home (also on the College network), walk to work, and have it reconnect as I get within wireless range of the College. Excellent. This means I can access private financial records, anywhere in the world, and be connected as though I were "on Campus".I am very satisfied with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Improved fire
Reviews.Author: jack mortimer
Reviews.Content: The 7 inch fire HD is definitely an upgrade to the original. The screen is sharper and the sound is better.

Reviews.Title: This thing is sweet.
Reviews.Author: Johnny5
Reviews.Content: I like it. I haven't tried the others so I have nothing to compare to but I like it. The sound is awesome and display is true HD. Very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent followup to last year's Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Cox
Reviews.Content: When I heard the new Kindle Fire had come out, I was very excited. I had the first Fire when it came out last year, and it was pretty good. The new one blows it out of the water!It's the first thing I reach for in the morning, I can check my e-mail, get on Reddit, and play a few minutes of Bejeweled.

Reviews.Title: I Just Love My New Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Carol S. Berton
Reviews.Content: This New Kindle Fire HD is an excellent device. I love all the features and how seamlessly it works.It was abreeze to learn how to use. Using it to surf the web is great and it seems to be as fast as my desktop computer. I would have given the device a 5 star rating, but I had to go out and buy an adapter to charge it from a wall outlet. That was included with my Kindle reader.Other than that I think it"s a great product.

Reviews.Title: best gift ever
Reviews.Author: Suzon Putman
Reviews.Content: Absolutly LOVE my Kindle Fire....Hubby got it for me for Mothers Day.  Best gift ever.  Love to read on it, serf the web, play games , do banking, pay bills, all of it.  I have freinds with Ipads and this does everything they do except take pictures.  Will be getting my Hubby one  of the Kindle Fire HD for Christmas.  Hes always stealing mine, so he gonna get a new one.  Recommend it to everyone.  Great job Amazon

Reviews.Title: Reviewing first impressions
Reviews.Author: Colbert Fan
Reviews.Content: I haven't had this long enough to give an in-depth review. What I'm reviewing right now is how EASY it was to buy it, get it, and start using it. I have already purchased and read 2 books and it is just so easy to do.The picture/display is great so easy to read and see and from lots of angles. The touch screen is also great, not a lot of "hey I didn't press that!" moments like with some devices. Haven't tested the sound out yet. But literally opened the box and started using it, so intuitive in my opinion.I'm way behind techy times and this is the first notebook/reader type device our family has purchased; I got it because for the price I get something I can let my kids play educational and developmental games on for a treat, the family can read books, and more. I've heard the kindle paperwhite is amazing if you read constantly because battery life is long and it is lighter to hold.But this one rocks so far for what our family needed, and my wallet is a lot happier than with an ipad lol!  I'm not making promises but for the first week I'm super happy. Oh - and the "special offers" haven't phased me AT ALL. Glad I saved money going "With Special Offers" (and I can use that money buying books and other stuff!) Also love that I can keep it all in the cloud and not have to suck up the memory with books/movies etc.So far, really happy... hope it stays that way.  I also got the wall charger since it was offered for 1/2 price if I got it when I bought the Kindle. Glad I did so I can just take that on trips and not have to be sure we have a laptop too!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Upgrade to the original
Reviews.Author: Willy Wailer
Reviews.Content: I have read a few of the `1 star' comments and find them to be wrong about almost everything and usually simply ignorant of the operation of the HD and new OS.  Take a few minutes and watch the intro stuff.  Then be patient for a few hours as Amazon updates software, Silk adjusts to your usage, you recapture apps that you had on your prior devices and you go through your 'settings'.  This product is an excellent 7" tablet and I looked seriously at the Mini and Nexus 7.  Nothing wrong with those devices either, just a different ecosystem for the most part.

Reviews.Title: Everything I hoped for!
Reviews.Author: JDSebring
Reviews.Content: I love the backlit pages and the "carousel" of choices available from books on my kindle...to email and the internet.  I haven't even tried all the options yet...music and photos to name two!  It is heavy to hold but I like the flip cover I purchased at the same time as the Kindle since it protects the screen as well as allowing me to read practically hands-free.  It is fairly easy to use and holds a charge pretty well but I would suggest the speedy charger if you need to use the unit daily since the charger that comes with the Kindle takes 13 hours to reach full charge!!!  13 hours?!!  Anyway, other than that it is great and I'm enjoying it immensely!

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Chance E. Gill
Reviews.Content: To be honest with you all, I have always wanted to get an iPad but seeing as how I have had way too many problems with my iPod Touch 4G in the last 11 months I decided to get a Kindle Fire HD instead and I am very glad that I did. I'm actually about to buy a second one for my wife for Christmas. The display is beautiful, the web is fast, they have a great selection of Apps and Games. You can't beat the 200.00 price tag either compared to 400.00-500.00 for Apple iPads. I think Amazon cares more about their customers than Apple does because Amazon sells it for less than what it takes for them to make it, they are not all about profit when Apple gets around 41%-51% profit on their products. To make a long story short, the Kindle Fire HD is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7 fun to use
Reviews.Author: Katz
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire. The picture is great and the sound is good. I mostly use it for playing games. My only disapointment is the battery life. Most of the reviews I read said it had 10 to 11 hours of battery life with mixed use and mine is only averaging 6 to 6 and a half hours.

Reviews.Title: Best $200 tablethands down!
Reviews.Author: David J. Mummert
Reviews.Content: If you buy a tablet that's not the Kindle Fire HD and paid 200 or more I'm sorry for you. It's awesome, the camera is decent, and the battery lasts forever.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Friday
Reviews.Content: We bought 3 for son's family,  they love them. They have had them for a couple of weeks and my son said they don't put them down.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff as promised
Reviews.Author: Krishna

It is a worthy successor of the line apart from the fact that the odd book marking support clime be better.The app marketplace is good enough for me. And you can actually install apps from Google play without much hassle.The Facebook and other social media integration within the device is very well done. Oh and the speakers are terrific

Reviews.Content: Right from the box, it was very easy to operate.  The wifi is "like" that, bam!  The bing game (Heaven) needs some work.  Free should be free.  But this reveiw is about the KF.  I love the easyiness of it.  It fit perfectly in my purse.  I can read my bible, hilight verses and take notes.  I watched some movies on it and the sound is great.  For me, for the money, the new KF is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: fantastic

Reviews.Content: I can't put it down at times, I'm on it for hours hours and I take it everywhere , it does everything  and I love that new set up were you can see other options of what you are buying ,I simply love it!:)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: September

Ordered a "ROOCASE" to protect my Kindle. Still learning to use all the features but having so much fun doing it!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: maxhemus5000
Reviews.Content: Great product everything I expected of it and more. I would highly recommend the Kindle Fire HD if you would like and E-reader in order to read books and magazines. I love this product and would buy it again if I had the chance.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Richard Ryden
Reviews.Content: Received item on time and in good condition.  Ready to go right out of the box.  Have had little or no problem setting it up, and have enjoyed the features very much.  Having trouble getting the "Time" magazine app to work properly, but hope to get it figured out fairly soon.  I very much recommend the Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Steven Keith King
Reviews.Content: Just got my new Kindle Fire today and I love it. The screen is beautiful Great product and value.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Nano
Reviews.Content: Just got my new Kindle Fire HD in the mail. It is amazing just love itAlready downloaded some books and games. Would highly recommend it. Love the size it fits very nicely in my purse. A definite 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: More than I expected!
Reviews.Author: J. Ciccone "The Muncher"
Reviews.Content: What a neat product!  I'm still learning all rhe options and capabilities, and I continue to be impressed!  Good job, Amazon.  Keep those Prime options comming!

Reviews.Title: Loving it!
Reviews.Author: Restfinder "Restfinder"
Reviews.Content: Lighter, faster, and I can work on it longer. Hook up an HDMI cable and we can watch video on the TV from it. I read, I play games, I surf the web - what's not to love! Behind it all is Amazon's exceptional customer service - something the other tablets don't have!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: samantha
Reviews.Content: I love how quick it is. I love how bright it is. I have not watched a movie on it yet but I am sure it will be much to my enjoyment and liking! Great purchase!

Reviews.Title: exceeds expectations
Reviews.Author: briche
Reviews.Content: received this as a gift for my birthday from husband, best man ever!!o have used everyday, many different things - games, scripture readings, books, mags, recipes, email- so many apps, and havent paid for one yet!love that i can download from local library, print subscriptions for mags so i can have with mefamily members have earlier versions of kindle but none beat the fire hdthey may be upgrading soon!

Reviews.Title: Like it!
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my wife, who is an avid reader. The vivid color, excellent sound and fast wifi were a nice surprise. Not just for reading! Online content, videos, games, social networking, calendar and email come together perfectly in this small device.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: Virginia Lynn Barnes
Reviews.Content: I am having a great time experimenting with this thing. It is user friendly & if you get stumped there is help everywhere to get questions answered & information is  available. Very much like this product...

Reviews.Title: First impression
Reviews.Author: The reader
Reviews.Content: The product is very nice to use. It is just the right size a little large then others in its category. The colours are great and the connection to emails is great. Very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: A winning product by Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Gil
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is not exactly a tablet, and it's definitely not an E-Reader. It's a Kindle.Amazon did a great job creating and defining this product.Here's what I think are the KFHD (Kindle Fire HD) strong sides:* Great for games* Great for movies. Highly integrated with Amazon for movie buying, renting and streaming. Lots of free stuff for Amazon Prime members.* HD screen* Impressive build quality* Can connect to your pc via USB to transfer content* Good sound quality (for a tablet)* HDMI connection to your TV* Fast dual channel wireless-N connectionNow, not sure if it's a good thing or a bad thing, it's really up to what you're looking for in your KFHD, but the customization options are limited (for example, you can't even rearrange the icons on you screen) and administration is limited (example: you can't really control the wifi adapter, and even the wireless connection control is kind of "hidden"). So basically the KFHD is not targeted at "power users".The thing I don't really like about this device is that the app selection is limited. You definitely don't get access to every Android app out there. Also, there is no support for Adobe Flash so some sites will not load properly.One other issue is that I wasn't able to connect my Kindle to my workplace Exchange server so I can't use the device for work email which is frustrating. I heard though that you can buy and app that does this. Not so great though, the competition has this for free.Given all the above, I think you'll find that the KFHD is excellent for kids. I got mine for my kids to watch movies during long drives and it did the job wonderfully. We rented the movie HD for 3-4 dollars, downloaded it locally to the device and they were able to watch it with no wifi connectivity. They were also able to play their favorite games like Fruit Ninja, Cut the Rope, Temple Run and such, and I even got FIFA 12 and Madden 12 for $0.99 each!When it's on wifi, the device has great data rate and i am able to surf, email, facebook and skype with no issues at all.there's no GPS and no back Camera (just a front facing one). But these were not issues for me.the KFHD only comes with a USB cable so i ended up spending additional money on a wall and car charger (the iphone ones don't work with it) and I will have to buy some kind of cover to protect the device. I'm a little disappointed that Amazon did not include a wall charger at least.Last but not least: customer support is very good too.

Reviews.Title: I think this surpasses the original Fire
Reviews.Author: Christi S. "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: I received the original Fire at the end of July when I won it from a site.  I decided to upgrade it to this one last week and boy oh boy am I glad I did.  This one seems to run much smoother for me.  Especially when using the menu.  I used to always double tap it thinking that it didn't recognize my first tap.  I love swiping this Kindle to get to the menu.  I consider it worth the upgrade.  I also have the Amazon case and LOVE IT too.

Reviews.Title: Awesome upgrade on the Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: M. Bargar
Reviews.Content: Had the original Kindle Fire but once the new one came out knew I had to upgrade.  Sold my original to a friend and bought the new version.  LOVE IT!!!!!  Crisper video with the HD and it is great having the dual speakers compared to the one on thr original.  Also love that I can connect the Fire HD to my HDTV and view movies on the big screen.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: amazon addict
Reviews.Content: I have always liked the kindle app that i have on my ipod. When I saw that a new kindle was released I knew that I really wanted it. The kindle fire hd has a lot of cool new features that the kindle fire does not have. The only problem I have is that when I try to buy music apps and books it keeps telling me it is taking too long to download and that i can go to the home screen and wait for it to load fully. Overall I think that this is a great tablet and I will have to call kindle support and bring that problem up with them.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire HD 7 inch is awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Farrah "Farrah"
Reviews.Content: I just want to say that I am an admitted gadget queen!! I owned the first Kindle when it first released and own the 3rd generation kindle keyboard. I also own an  i pad 2 and the IPad. I even went out and bought a nook glowlight but the BN service is horrible!!I bought the Samsung galaxy tab 2 7 inch and returned it for the kindle fire HD and I love it!!Love my Amazon customer service and products but this is the best Kindle by far. I didn't bother to take off the ads cause they really don't impede with your use of this tablet. I like the user suggestions because they help me with identifying similar items that are to my liking! Thanks Amazon for the years of pleasure you have given me and I'm looking forward to the trial Amazon Prime : )

Reviews.Title: AgedSouthernLady
Reviews.Author: Joanne Kelly
Reviews.Content: I am so very pleased with my KindleFireHD.  I use it almost entirely for reading lots of Kindle books.  The ability to change the screen to a black background with white text is perfect for me.  I read in bed with no additional light, so I don't disturb my husband.  (My first Kindle required a light, which really bothered him.) The ability to change text size is also very easy.  In addition, it's great for checking e-mail when I don't want to open my laptop and the KindleFireHD keeps a charge within a very reasonable amount of time.  I really appreciate the 30-day free trial of Amazon Prime.  I downloaded an audio book, and it was so clear and added so much to the enjoyment.  In summary, I love it!!

Reviews.Title: KIndle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Linda S. Guy "L.S.Guy"
Reviews.Content: The only improvment I can suggest is make the vol and on/off button different colors in order to make them easier to see.  Thay are currently black and blend in to much.

Reviews.Title: The Best
Reviews.Author: Doggie tails.....
Reviews.Content: This is the best. I love to be able to read and watch movies and etc on this. It is so special to me as I have bad eyes and will be going blind eventually. So I can make the font bigger to read so I don't have to give up my love of reading books.... Thank you Amazon for this fantastic product and a name I can trust.

Reviews.Title: I use my KFHD7 every day
Reviews.Author: Joseph S. Kemp
Reviews.Content: I use my Kindle Fire HD7 daily.  It just works.  I have used other Android tablets and the KFHD7 is superior (IMHO).

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: i got the kindle hd and love it...lots of great features, alot of app choices, books, etc.. would defiantly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: JD
Reviews.Content: Good battery life. Sephia mode is great for night reading. Haven't messed with the white on black text yet. Bluetooth works wonderfully. Same with the wifi. Everything you'd expect. Only complaint is that I cannot adjust the brightness while in a book but that's just an annoyance. Having to go the the home screen, etc. An honestly the ads are not a big deal. If the only reason you liked your old kindle was for the random screensaver images... you might have bought it for the wrong reason.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding value!!
Reviews.Author: Shawn S.
Reviews.Content: I love this 7" Kindle Fire HD so much that I've just placed an order for the 8.9" version coming out in November.  Thought I'd be getting an i-Pad (my MacBook Pro and i-Touch have made me an Apple fan), but for my purposes the Kindle Fire HD 8.9" will not only be a lot less expensive - price aside, the 8.9" (like the 7") will be the a better choice for me.  I absolutely love the 7" for videos, books and I'm still getting used to surfing the web with it.  If its webpage loading speed is a smidgen slower or it has less than a gazillion available apps than some other device, I do not care.  I remember the days of dial-up so all of today's computers - especially all the tablets - are miraculous to me.  By the way, I've been an Amazon Prime member for about as long as Prime has existed - that was the nudge that steered me to the 7" Kindle Fire HD.  Prime membership was already a great deal for me.  Prime + Kindle Fire HD makes both a steal.  Kudos to Amazon.  The Kindle Fire HD is a game changer for focused value in tablets.

Reviews.Title: Complete!!!
Reviews.Author: Davichelli
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent product, and it has all I want, good sound and video, and the size is the best thing cause it is more comfortable, thanks amazon. The only thing I don't find useful is the limited amount of free apps available in comparison with other tablets.Regards

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: MDFire HD user
Reviews.Content: I have never had a tablet before and was about to buy the original Kindle Fire until the HD family came out.  I purchased the kindle fire HD and I absolutely love it!  No problems with it!  Its touch sensor isnt delayed or slow and I love how I can get AP's, books, emails and its great surfering the web!  I highly recommend it.  Its neck and neck with the ipad for those that are going between them!  Only difference (to me) is the internet connection!!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Harley
Reviews.Content: I like the bigger screen. The colors and screen quality is amazing. I have not had any problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD-love it
Reviews.Author: Heather Payeur
Reviews.Content: This is my first kindle and I love it.  The picture quality is great and I love beign able to read books and watch movies via Netflix streaming.  I also bought an HDMI cable to connect the kindle to my tv so I can watch netflix as well.  Very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD Review
Reviews.Author: Roxy Drew
Reviews.Content: Best Kindle Fire yet!Love the sound system,and the graphics are outstanding.Admire the small weightless size,too.The dual antennas are superb.The web browser seems faster,also.Like the recommendations for each book and the trending now thingy.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Jody Kennedy
Reviews.Content: I love that I can plug in my AUX for the car and listen to my books.  This is one of the best gifts I have given myself.
