Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7 Freetime
Reviews.Author: bigwilly1972
Reviews.Content: For Christmas we got two Kindle Fire HD 7. These are great products and very useful. Especially useful is the Freetime App. It is very useful to be able to set time limits for different accounts. There are a few improvements/enhancements that can be made to the Freetime app that will enhance the Kindle experience:Kindle Fire 7 HD Freetime issues and resolutions1.  All apps are not gamesFreetime has 3 categories for apps to include Video, Apps, and Books. There are limitations placed on video and apps which generally is acceptable but there is a distinction that needs to be made between apps such as DoodleJump which is a game and journal or the email app/Journal/Dictionary/Overdrive/Math education AppA1. Create a category for games in addition to category for apps. This way apps for writing a paper can be set to a different time than the games.2. All limits for System ToolsI consider the app store, browser, email, calendar to be system tools. I would not have a problem with my son using the internet for a few minutes in freetime doing some research on Google for school. However, this time needs to be limited and should be limited and accessible in Freetime.A2. Provide some limits to system tools within Freetime with controls

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: J. Linder
Reviews.Content: This was a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter and she was ecstatic to get this. Now I want one for myself and I will eventually.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Linda  J. Holgate
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it, purchased educational apps for my granddaughter. It is easy for her to operate . I love Prime watching old movies and tv shows. I love that I could download Facebook and e- mail. I love the lighted screen. I love the quality of the sound . I love my books and how quickly they download.

Reviews.Title: Like another reviewer said, the only problem is, now I read too much...
Reviews.Author: Jon Daley
Reviews.Content: The number of hours reading has greatly increased since I bought the Kindle.I bought it to read one e-book that is annoying to read on the PC, and also for games for the kids.Using the parental controls and the free time app, the kids have timers on how long they can play games each day, and also a limit on the amount of time spent reading on the kindle (we have some voracious readers, and I'm not thrilled with them spending hours reading on the computer screen)).  The kids love that we got it, and the free time app means I can set specific books and apps that are appropriate for each child.I've been going through Amazon's free books, and reading lots of books from 100-200 years ago, which has been a lot of fun.  There are some bad ones, and some have better or worse formats when they were copied into the kindle format, etc. but a bunch of good ones.And I also just found a whole set of Tom Swift books, which I'd been looking for for a long time without success.I ended up buying the Fire HD without special offers.  I originally was considering a Paperwhite, and each upgrade costs around $20, and so it is pretty easy to end up at the Kindle Fire HD, $20 for each jump.The one thing I hadn't thought about is that the Paperwhite is better than the Fire for reading - I'm still hoping to find an app or a hidden setting somewhere that will let me set the text color so I can have less light output when reading at night.  I have the brightness all the way down, and the background set to black, but the text color is white, rather than a gray, and so my vision gets funny white lines when I'm reading in the dark, and then look away from the kindle.  I haven't tried it, but the paperwhite is supposed to be better for that.Other than that, I'm thrilled.

Reviews.Title: dont buy anthing else
Reviews.Author: vettenelk
Reviews.Content: I bought this kindle fire hd for my wife and it has been awesome!!!!! Way better then any other tablet or ipad ever made! Makes an ipad look like a rock and a chisel. We both tried all the apple products and other ebook readers out there and the kindle blows them out of the water. Dont waste your money on anything else. Apple sucks!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I liked it so much I bought two
Reviews.Author: mantadiver
Reviews.Content: I found the Kindle Fire HD so easy to use and so well laid out I bought an extra one for my "technologically challenged" father.  He loves it too.  If you have Amazon Prime this is really a must have tablet.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Michael Hursh
Reviews.Content: That's all I have to say.  Amazing!  But since I have to write 13 more words, I'll say it again.  Amazing.

Reviews.Title: Bliss
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I entered soooo many contests to win a kindle and never won. I decided tax time was coming so I bought it. I couldn't be happier. it has everything I need and more. Web Books Games Apps Free calling with a certain app and free texting with another app. I don't even need my cell anymore.

Reviews.Title: A great device for $199
Reviews.Author: Ceara_18
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire.. it has everything you need, books, internet, etc.  It is easy to use, the graphics are amazing.

Reviews.Title: It's Great!
Reviews.Author: Travis R
Reviews.Content: Pros:The screen looks greatEasily interfaces with my HD-TV for streaming videos with an HDMI cordFast processor, no lag in appsCons:Not really anything big.  The worst thing is that the case selection is not as good as for the iPad Mini...which is hardly worth mentioning.Overall:Works great!  The best mini tablet on the market for the price.

Reviews.Title: I Love My Kindle
Reviews.Author: Robert Butler
Reviews.Content: This was a GREAT Christmas present!  I'm learning every day how to use it for more and more applications. Sometimes I want to go on the internet but not have to drag out my laptop. I may also want to catch up on reading and with my Kindle, I can listen to a book or read it.  Also great for listening to music. Many, many useful and fun applications!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD vs Samsung Tab
Reviews.Author: Scorpion79
Reviews.Content: I bought this Samsung after a lot of thinking about maybe getting a new Kindle HD where the Samsung seemed to be a little better and after few days of use here is my thoughts:Comparisons between Samsung Tab and Kindle Fire HD:1- Kindle has a better and friendlier User Interface than the Samsung, specially for Novices and Kids. Easier Navigation and switching between apps.2- Kindle has a more sensitive and receptive touchscreen, it seems that I have to push the screen several times sometimes for the Samsung to respond.3- Samsung have a better App Store(Google) compared to the Amazon.4- Samsung can have a SD drive added.5- Samsung has back and Front Camera, Kindle just front.6- Samsung has less memory(8GB, 4.5 usable), Kindle starts with 16GB.7- Kindle processor is 1.2G while the Samsung is only 1GHz.8- Samsung seems to get a little sluggish at times specially when opening several apps in a row where never had that issue with the kindle, maybe because the kindle will not allow apps to continue running in background after closing them.9- Seems that the battery life is a little better with the Kindle.10- Kindle does not come with a charger(Ridiculous!) and alot of complaints of ads while using Kindle.11- Amazon customer service is superb, I don't think anyone beats them.12- Samsung has GPS, not the kindle.13- Kindle has hDMI output, not the Samsung.14- Samsung measured usable Ram is around 700MB and not 1GB.15- Same Price.16- Amazon Video Library and access is great, Parental control is great. Don't think Samsung has a Parental control and still haven't used their video library and to see if u can download bought movies to watch later?!17- Samsung options and settings are more versatile and editable for the experienced than the Kindle.So far, Seems the Kindle might have been a better option but not sure, I'll keep the Samsung for now and update this review as things change.

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it, love it....
Reviews.Author: Kimberly A. Stephen "Kim"
Reviews.Content: Just the right size, just turned it on and my account is already connected.  Started browsing, downloading, watching and playing right away.  Awesome product, Amazon is just so customer friendly, you have no peer.  Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Miss Nikki
Reviews.Author: NUmbra
Reviews.Content: I bought the kindle fire hd for my daughter but I really enjoy it so I am going to get me one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Billy Here
Reviews.Content: Bought 3 of these for Xmas presents for the kids and they love it. The ability to borrow books from public libraries and restrict users w/ their Kids Time app makes this an excellent product for kids.

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Susan Newman "Brand Visibility Designer, Book...
Reviews.Content: So far I am enjoying this new gadget and can't wait to explore it's full potential! I love how easy it was to set up and look forward to reading books, watching movies and using social media. The size is perfect also.Susan

Reviews.Title: Really enjoying it!!
Reviews.Author: Jlkgolf
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to tell you it has the biggest screen and that it's the easiest web browser to use/read with, but it works.  The eReader is great, and I find it's much easier to read a book with that I was thinking it would be.  I'm happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: It's a winner
Reviews.Author: David Kaplan "Kap"
Reviews.Content: Of course everyone requires different specs in regards to a tablet or "tablet lite".  We love the kindle fire and it's a winner in our house.

Reviews.Title: Loves it!
Reviews.Author: D. Posey "Creative Genius"
Reviews.Content: So glad I bought this.  My husband has the original K-fire and this one is lighter with a great display.  I can't give it to you in technical terms, but I'd say if you're not ready for an iPad and prefer something smaller, you can't go wrong with the Kindle Fire and with Amazon Prime there are so many great reading deals.  Just do it!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Narine Charran
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife for Christmas.  She loves it.  The screen is great for viewing movies, playing games, reading books and reading generally.  My 7 year old son loves it as well.  It is just the right size for both of them.  i live outside the US so I found innovative ways to load software onto the HD since Amazon does not allow me to download anything without a US credit card address.

Reviews.Title: Fire HD on FIre
Reviews.Author: hank
Reviews.Content: It's not often i find a product that i treat as a constant companion. First and foremost, it's a reader. Try not to lose sight of that. Second the browser is Ok and it gets the job done quite well. All my favorite apps and websites are available and in very acceptable format. Unlike some of the iPads.. And it's portable (very portable).. 7+ inches is ideal.Weak points: battery still needs more help; camera needs improvement; and get rid of the carousel. it serves little purpose as far as i can see.Touch screen is great; backlighting is very well done; i'll keep this one a very long time..

Reviews.Title: Alas
Reviews.Author: Asmaa
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, I was intending to buy Kindle Fire 7 but it is not supported outside America. I live in Egypt so It will not be of great benefit for me. I wish you to consider making it a world-wide option in order for other people to be able to make use of it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product but wouldn't connect to TV
Reviews.Author: James D. Witherspoon
Reviews.Content: While we were in the Galapagos Islands for one month recently, my wife and I read several books on our Kindle Paperwhite and Kindle Keyboard.  We can highly recommend both of these two Kindles.  But our landlord said--and we eventually agreed--that we also needed a Kindle Fire HD to get the Web and e-mail.  When we returned to the United States, we immediately bought one.  It is an excellent product, not perfect, but certainly useful and entertaining.We seldom watch TV but decided to buy a new one on which to display the videos we could obtain through Kindle Prime.  When we connected the Kindle Fire HD to this new 42-inch Samsung TV, we saw nothing, just a message that it would not connect.  Thus we had to reconnect the Kindle to our old 21-inch computer monitor for this purpose.  We like watching movies on this 21-inch screen in our study, but it would be so much better on the bigger screen of a TV in our living room.  We hope that Amazon works to solve this problem.  We understand from other reviewers that some have this problem and some do not.

Reviews.Title: No regrets!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: Just got my new Kindle today! I debated on getting an iPad for a long time. My husband has one and it seems pretty nifty. And I already own a 3-year-old Kindle, so it seemed pointless to buy something I already have. But because I already own several Kindle books, and I buy audiobooks on audible.com, I decided to go with the Kindle Fire. So glad I did. Here's what I absolutely love:- I can hold it in one hand and it's very lightweight (that it's stylish looking is a plus, too)- the color and graphics are outstanding- the sound quality is all that Amazon says it is. I listened to part of one of my audiobooks, and love it!- I can sync to my email account- It has a calendar and contacts feature (great for taking my work on the road)- easy to type on and navigate through- no comparison to my old Kindle. Just none at all. It's like comparing a horse-and-buggy to a Ferrari.I'm actually not very tech savvy. I can't handle anything too complicated, and I tend to get frustrated very quickly when I encounter poor, counter-intuitive designs. But this product has so far been very intuitive. I was finding my way around on it right out of the box. Pretty simple to use. I still need to figure out how to highlight in the eBooks and print up my notes, but I understand it has that feature, and I'm sure it will be pretty easy to figure out. I also haven't watched a movie on it yet, but I suppose I will eventually, at some point. I would normally wait a few days before writing a review, but I'm so impressed with my new toy, I had to write something now, even as I am still figuring out all that it is capable of.If I have more to add here, I'll come back and update this review. But for now, I'm very pleased. No regrets here that I didn't buy into the iPad. Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: Shelia Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased The Kindle Fire HD 7 for my daughter but I enjoy it too. The sound system is great and the picture is excellent. Great product, I recommend if you are thinking about purchasing to indulge and you will be glad you did

Reviews.Title: Absolutely love it!
Reviews.Author: Shawaii "Shawaii"
Reviews.Content: I have loved my original Kindle from the beginning. The Fire takes the experience into another whole  level.  I can not only read, but can check email, Facebook, and Twitter.  Wonderful!

Reviews.Title: WHO NEEDS AN IPAD
Reviews.Author: Priscilla prichard
Reviews.Content: THE KINDLE FIRE HD 7" IS PERFECTLY PRICED TO MEET ALL YOUR NEEDS.  I WENT TO MY LOCAL LIBRARY AND THEY HELPED ME SIGN UP AND  DOWNLOAD SEVERAL BOOKS TO MY KINDLE, FOR FREE.  I CAN SKYPE WITH THE KINDLE, IT HAS A BUILT-IN CAMERA AND MIKE, NO UGLY HEADPHONES.  OF COURSE YOU NEED A WIRELESS SETUP,  I HAVE A ROUTER AT HOME AND CAN GET A SIGNAL AT THE OFFICE.  THERE IS LOTS MORE THAT THE KINDLE CAN DO, GAMES ETC., BUT I DON'T USE THOSE APPS.  AT $199 OR $149 AT SOME PLACES, IT'S JUST RIGHT

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my wife, but she admits to being technically challenged and decided to stay with the older version of the Kindle our son passed along to her.  As a result, I have a Kindle Fire HD.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product.
Reviews.Author: Fritz
Reviews.Content: Everything that I had hoped it would be. The screen clarity is excellent. Watching videos is a joy on my Kindle Fire HD. I have arthritis and, it was getting difficult to read books because I couldn't hold them. I now can read any book without pain because I can prop up the Kindle Fire HD and turn pages with a touch of my finger and don't have to hold it.  The back lit screen makes it easy for me to read in bed at night when my husband is sleeping.I used to own a Sony Reader and the Kindle Fire HD is a much better product. The Sony Reader was in black and white, was not back lit, could not play videos and did not connect to the internet. Those were all important features when I was looking for a replacement for my Reader. The Kindle Fire HD could provide me with those features; the Sony Reader could not. The only advantage to the Sony Reader was that it weighed less, but I have accommodated for that by getting a holder for my Kindle that allows me to prop it up so I don't have to hold it.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Autie
Reviews.Content: I recently got the Kindle Fire HD for Christmas from my boyfriend. I was using a first generation Kindle and loved it just fine, I am an avid reader and figured that it would be more than enough for me, until I got the Fire. I am amazed at everything that this device can do! I am a heavy user and I only have to charge it fully every two days. That's pretty good for an HD device. I was considering an iPad, but I don't think that I need one anymore. This Kindle is more than enough for what I need. I am very pleased with the Kindle Fire HD. Another wonderful and affordable product from Amazon!

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: kbbink
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife before she had major surgery. She doesn't like a lot of hi tech gadgets, just something simple and basic. She got the hang of it in less than a week. She was on the couch for 8 weeks. She was able to do pretty much everything sh would want to do (e-mail, web, news, etc..). She always has it with her now. The only complaints are 1. No Flash Player. No big deal for my wife, but it is frustrationg as heck when you want to see something on YouTube and 2. No Dish Sling Player. I can watch dish from my cell phone, computer, everywhere like I was sitting at home for $0. They have a $14.99 app that works on a Sling Box, but that is something totally different. If this was for me, these two items would be deal killers. But it is no big deal for her.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: jill
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD. I researched and did some homework before deciding on the Kindle. I have no complaints. The Kindle Fire HD is awesome!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7 inch vs. 8.9
Reviews.Author: Ron C. from PGH
Reviews.Content: Good day,I am the proud papa of both a new 7 and 8.9 baby Kindle Fire HD.  The 7 was received as a Christmas gift.  The 8.9 was purchased for $58 after trading-in old, not-being-used electronics.  This purchase of the 8.9 was made after being, suprisingly, overjoyed with the 7.  As my first tablet, I was initially skeptical.  But that feeling soon disappeared. Of all the debate over what is the best tablet, I can say the Kindle fire HD is, for me, the best tablet. I do not need a laptop replacement.  Instead, this is the perfect fit of a simple, streamlined device that can access books, magazines, movies, game apps, and Amazon products.Having tinkered around with both over the last two weeks, I am of the opinion that the 7 is the less buggy, more consistent, and, paradoxically, the more snappier of the two models (the 7 is 32gb, the 8.9 is the basic 16gb).  I am curious if anyone else who has used both the 7 and the 8.9 shares a similar experience?  Despite having less horsepower, does the 7 to you seem the more stable of the two?  I seem to get less "issue" with the 7 compared to the 8.9.  Additionally, when I factor in the portability of the 7 I find myself saying the 7 is the better option. And this is despite the 7 giving up screen real estate and greater resolution.Have I lost my mind??

Reviews.Title: THIS KINDLE IS ON FIRE
Reviews.Author: MARTHA G VANEGAS
Reviews.Content: LOVING THE KINDLE FIRE HD! IT WAS A GIFT FOR MY GRANDDAUGHTER. SHE LOVES IT ! NO complaints I can't be thanked enough

Reviews.Title: Why did I wait so long!
Reviews.Author: Mel
Reviews.Content: I am addicted to my Kindle Fire HD.  I  hestitated for a couple years on getting a Kindle - guess I'm glad I did because the Fire HD is awesome.I highly recommend this device.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: scp
Reviews.Content: The Kindle works great. It connects up quickly with wifi and the reception seems to be great. The time I spend reading has definitely increased over carrying paper books.

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: alina
Reviews.Content: Best decision I have made. It was between this and the ipad mini,and honestly as a college student I just wanted a gadget for reading, browsing the web,watching movies and quite frankly to kill some time.excellent choice. Does everything I want and more.easy to use,book reading does not hurt my eyes at all and movie quality is great. SO HAPPY!!!!

Reviews.Title: kindle fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Bean babe"
Reviews.Content: This is a Christmas present from my husband. I was afraid to try this but my friend is so techno, I knew I would have a good resource to "hold my hand," as needed. There is so much to learn..how to navigate around. I downloaded some of the "free" kindle books this weekend. HOW COOL IS THIS??  I love that we have the classics available and cookbooks too. I have much to learn but it is a new adventure for a new year, in hopes to put all the bad of last year behind. WHAT WOULD WE DO WITHOUT AMAZON??

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Lou Lou
Reviews.Content: I did  a lot of research & comparing before deciding on the KF Hd, and I haven't been disappointed. I've had it for about a month & I love it. I've played games, music, videos, email, uploaded powerpoints for the upcoming school semester, bought audiobooks & digital kindle books, and I really don't have any complaints. I think the price was great & I've been happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: I didn't get it for myself...
Reviews.Author: Shannon
Reviews.Content: But my brother loves it and can't pry himself away from it, which is tells me that it was a great purchase.

Reviews.Title: So good I had to keep it and get my sister another.
Reviews.Author: R. Steven Cooper
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister for Christmas and was testing it/getting it ready for her and simply kept it. I have looked hard at iPads, Nooks, and generic Android tablets and the Kindle Fire HD 7" is the best value I found. It has most all the functions that the iPad (except missing the back facing camera - definately add that to the next one Amazon!). It's snappy and content looks great. If you are as I am fairly flush with Amazon content and don't really like messing with the iTunes world, this is a robust little device married to a plethora of content. Audio is acceptable but not ear popping - haven't tried it yet with earphones.The only complaint I have is that the native app selection isn't as complete as say my Android phone. Hope that will improve with time.When you compare price with iPad there is simply no contest - I got 2 of these for LESS than my other sister spent on her iPad2. Can't beat that value when it's attached to a device that offers very little need to compromise. It's great to have a choice and this is a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Joyce Hawkinson
Reviews.Content: I have the regular Kindle and this will do so much more . i plan on taking it on vac to keep track of emails flight info.

Reviews.Title: Awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Ryan & Tiera
Reviews.Content: Super happy with this Kindle Fire HD. Fits in my purse better than the iPad.  An amazing product by far.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful, Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Drich
Reviews.Content: I have one of the original Kindle's and I love it.  This Kindal Fire is awesome. book covers are shown, additional activites.  I've just begun to explore the posibilites.  It's a Great traveling piece.

Reviews.Title: Just what my wife wanted
Reviews.Author: Renee B. Hembree-Bey
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this product to anyone. It has every feature that I was looking for in a convienenttablet. It is a reader, a web browser, a gamer,and a source of current of information. What more could you want & it fits into a purse!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: M. Rice "Meg R."
Reviews.Content: I had a first release Kindle Fire and I loved it. I didn't really have any intention of replacing it with the HD, but after reading reviews and weighing my options I decided to get one. So glad I did. Faster, prettier and sounds so much better. I use it all the time and can't imagine my life without it.

Reviews.Title: In Love!
Reviews.Author: Marci Nelson
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle! I received it for Christmas and I use it ALL the time. It gets great use!

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for any age
Reviews.Author: SocialSal
Reviews.Content: The best features are the clear vibrant graphics and great sound.  It has many options & lots to do besides just using it to read.  I purchased two for my son & daughter and they love it! The camera is great too.  I highly recommend the kindle.

Reviews.Title: so far I like it
Reviews.Author: Marilyn S Lundquist
Reviews.Content: haven't figured it all out. i do wish there was a book to look at to learn everything rather than having everything online. But its nice to watch movies on. The picture is amazing!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Baflink
Reviews.Content: My kindle fire hd goes with me everywhere fast shipping great service great device for the money would not trade for anything.  thank you

Reviews.Title: Kindle HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Patricia Crimmin Greenan
Reviews.Content: It is so versatile and portable! I lilke being able to view my email, save pictures and music and am looking forward to downloading movies and books!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Prime
Reviews.Author: alh
Reviews.Content: While I was in the US I enjoyed the use of Prime, but now that I am in the Bahamas I notice that I cannot use it.  So it would make no sense of me purchasing it.  I really enjoyed the movies and access to the games.  I wish that something could be done about this.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Eruggles
Reviews.Content: I love the new Kindle Fire HD!  I gave it to my daughter for a Christmas present and she showed me all the features and everything it can do, it is amazing!  She is pretty attached to it, she takes it everywhere.  Now my other daughter wants one, too.  I would definitely recommend this to everyone!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Maggie irwin
Reviews.Content: Love my new fire.  It's as good as my husband's iPad, yet small enough to haul around.  Because we travel a lot, it's the perfect size. Two issues:  KWERTY--on some screens it takes over and I can't get the correct word to take.  Second, sometimes the popup screen blocks what I am typing so I can't see it and I can't scroll it up.

Reviews.Title: Great product- price is right
Reviews.Author: A. Francis
Reviews.Content: My girls are in love with the kindle fire hd7.  It's a perfect size for them.  It makes our cross-country flights pain free with hours of entertainment.  The battery life is impressive.  Wide array of apps and movies plentiful.  Having a Prime account is more than worth it with this kindle.  HD picture quality delivers on this little screen. Now just waiting for the full-protection case manufacturers to create an HD compatible case.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely awesome
Reviews.Author: Mama Rita
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad and ever since receiving my Kindle, the iPad has sat in the corner unused . I like the way it's designed and the size is perfect for what I needed . Amazon is a wonderful site and their deals never cease to amaze me . The Kindle free time is an extra added huge work if you have kids who also like to use your tablet . I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Worth your hard earned money
Reviews.Author: Jason85
Reviews.Content: Let's set the record straight. The iPad is amazing. The Nexus 7 has more apps and full Android. The Kindle Fire HD is still worth every penny.Pros- Fantastic screen- Best speakers on a tablet- Amazon Prime benefits- Simplicity of function- Cheap price but not cheap hardwareCons- Can be buggy- No access to Google Play App store- The keyboard annoys me for whatever reasonBottom line is this tablet is great. Content is king and the Kindle Fire HD is your gateway to some of the best priced content available. Amazon is headed in the right direction. Amazon is a market game changer and Jeff Bezos will make sure it stays that way. Buy the Kindle Fire HD and root for Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great Value and Content
Reviews.Author: Grinznmore "jim-in-wa"
Reviews.Content: I'm a gadget person with iPads, Kindles, Samsung phones, etc. When it's all said and done my 32gb Kindle Fire and Samsung Note II meets all of my mobile needs.The 32gb gives me plenty of storage for movies, books, magazines and podcast. The display is clear and vibrant and the sound is amazing for the size.I really like my iPad but this device's size pushed the the Apple to the back shelf. I had to make a decision on content, iTunes vs Amazon, and Amazon won hands-down.Amazon continues to add content and value at not additional cost. Prime membership is still only $80 per year. I can access my movies on the Fire or my Roku. The fire will also play to your TV via HDMI.I listen to several podcast each week, all at no-charge. I also enjoy the linking of audio books with the e-book. While driving, I can listen to an audio book or music. Once home, I can pick-up where I left off on the e-reader.I just gave my iPad to my son and my Kindle Touch e-reader to my granddaughter. All excellent products but not getting any use since I bought the Fire HD.It's all a matter of what is the right fit. They're all amazing products. This is not a subsitute for a small laptop if you're a student. It is a great portable media device that gives you access to a wealth of free or inexpensive content.I was very surprised the lack of 3G did not bother me. The large storage capacity made it a non-issue for the most part. I just load it up with content and use my smart phone for email. Of course many smartphones can be used as a wi-fi hot spot.Amazon has a generous trial period, give it a try.By the way, I'm also happy with the Amazon Kindle Fire cover. Light, makes a nice stand and the device turns off and on when you use the cover.Update: BN Nook is dead. Amazon is THE platform.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves this thing!!
Reviews.Author: Pat van schenker
Reviews.Content: She got mad when I got her a smart phone for Christmas, really mad!!  Said "I will never learn how to use this thing" Long story short, now she facebooks, talk on the phone and surfs the web all at the same time......lolNow I am the champion of gifter's ........Pardon me while I go in to smirk mode...I got her the kindle HD and she learned it very quickly. It was a real hit.To the point!!  If you have a low tech person to buy for, This is your tablet.Best sound I have ever heard from a tablet and the 7" screen is just right for personal viewing. Full web, and has a beautiful HD Screen. And the weight........ It feels like you are NOT going to break it. It has a little weight to it so it feels very sturdy. Its a winner of a gift, i think the words she used were  "Awesome" " Amazing" "Brilliant"A really great device,  And remember guys..... When she is happy....Your happy....

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet!
Reviews.Author: Shelley Woodward
Reviews.Content: I love this kindle.  I had an original kindle for two years and kept thinking no I would not upgrade to the Fire as all I really wanted to do with mine was read.  So, I didn't need all the capabilities of a Fire.  Well, my husband finally talked me into upgrading and boy am I glad I did.  This product is awesome!  I had considered the Kindle Fire instead of the Fire HD but my husband insisted I go for the HD and I'm so glad I did.  It is well worth the extra 50 dollars.  The clarity of this tablet is the best HD I have ever seen.  The colors are so vivid and clear.  I love watching movies on it and the audio clarity from the bose speakers is awesome.  I love being able to read in bed at night without keeping the lamp on and it's great for reading outdoors also.  The weight in my hand is just right.  It's the perfect size.  If you are considering a kindle or upgrading your old one.. this is the one to get!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: rara1964
Reviews.Content: I received my first Kindle as a gift about 3 years ago....I really never thought I could give up the "written" word until I got my first one and then I was hooked.  I travel alot for work and the e-reader is excellant for my travels.  However the Kindle Fire exceeded my expectations.  The size is great (I have the 7'), the HD color is unbelivable and the capability is wonderful.  I can do so much more with the Fire that I have even considered not bringing my personal laptop with me on my business trips.  This would help me out seeing I have to take my work laptop with me...whew hevay travels with two!  I was a little concerned with the potential glare however I have not had a problem with that.  I also love the fact that you dont need a seperate light while using it (the first one I bought a cover with a built in light since their was no back light)...the Kindle Fire was one smart choice with unlimited apps, books, movies etc I could not ask for more!!!!

Reviews.Title: AWSOME
Reviews.Author: Angelica
Reviews.Content: wonderful! great price and came the next day! Have not had any problems. Very satisfied. affordable. Thank you so much

Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Morgana
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it!!! Love it for reading and playing games. Still new so I'm still learning what all I can do and I'm having fun doing it.

Reviews.Title: Great device!
Reviews.Author: Carlo Ligotti
Reviews.Content: First tablet purchase for the family and we couldn't be more pleased.  Folds seamlessly into our household wi-fi to allowing us to play, read and learn!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: joy butler
Reviews.Content: I am very excited about my Kindle Fire HD. It was very easy to get started and I am eager to use this product.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality!!!
Reviews.Author: bill thompson
Reviews.Content: Very Good Quality!  Fast Shipping too!. I was very glad to see that the items were as advertised. Easy to use!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: The price was right & I got a lot of "bang" for my $. There's more to the Kindle Fire HD 7" than I thought, I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: the best tablet ive seen so far
Reviews.Author: Shane R.
Reviews.Content: Before I bought the kingle fire I thought all tablet were basically the same and I actually thought the kindle fire hd would be nothing special with it being $199, but I was wrong.It has an amazing hd screen and amazing speakers. Since buying it for my gf for christmas I've used two other tablets and they look and sound terrible in comparison.The hd really makes a huge difference. I'm tempted to buy one for myself. My only problem with it is, it doesn't stream videos on every website. Idk if I can install the plugin or whatever but I will update the review if I do.

Reviews.Title: I luv my new kindle
Reviews.Author: Eleni Larew
Reviews.Content: I just dont think i should have to pay extra to buy a camera app just to use the camera other than that its great ....

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: M.C.S. "M.C.S."
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this Kindle to anyone needing a book reader, a movie/video viewer, a game/apps player, and even an elementary sort of camera (as a bonus). Before complaining about the extras, such as the camera, keep in mind that it is not the primary purpose of the Kindle to act as such, it is simply a bonus and very rudimentary feature. I loved it so much that I got a second one.For the price, and all the features available for it, it cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire great
Reviews.Author: P. W. Neal
Reviews.Content: Exceptional value, easy to use once I got the WiFi working. I loved my first Kindle and I love this one.

Reviews.Title: Fabuloso
Reviews.Author: Herick Lopez
Reviews.Content: El Kindle Fire Hd 7” fue mi regalo de Navidad 2012. Estoy fascinada por lo fácil de usar y lo como de llevar a todos lados. El objetivo principal para mi era usarlo como e reader o lector de libros. Eso me evitaría estar cargando con libros, muchas veces pesados. La conveniencia de tener acceso a mis libros, si no entiendo una palabra tengo el significado al momento, me indica el % de progreso de mi lectura, me marca la pagina por donde voy leyendo, etc.En adición,q la opción que tengo de acceder mi correo electrónico, internet y muchas aplicaciones muy útiles.Es una super herramienta.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jon R. Chance
Reviews.Content: This was a christmas present for my mother, she is learning to use it, and she thinks its a great item

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: I don't know what I did before it. it's the greatest device ever. I recommend it to every one I know

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Peter W. Crisler
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this as a Birthday gift for me.  I really enjoy it and love all the features it has.

Reviews.Title: Best Gift to Receive
Reviews.Author: B. Smith
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Kindle for my 4 year old as he was always playing with my tablet.  Considering he was an early reader, the Kindle Fire made for a perfect gift.  It has become an excellent travel buddy with the ability to play games, watch movies, read age appropriate books, and so much more.  On the technical side, I am pleased with the processor as there the response time is acceptable and provides fluid motion when playing games or watching movies; the Dolby speakers are of great quality and provide sound that exceeded my expectations; and with approximately 20 books, 30 apps, 15 movies/TV, and approximately 100 music files there is still plenty of space for more media with the 16GB of memory.  Overall, this was his most favorite gift.

Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle for my son. We both like it its amazing. great picture and fast as well. i might buy one for myself.

Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Content: We got two of these for our family for Christmas and we love them.  the picture quality if fabulous and the sound is good.  We haven't complaint yet

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire is more fun than ipad!
Reviews.Author: Sandra D. Beeman "Sandra in PA"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire - it is fun to use, small enough to carry w/o a problem, and has superior picture and sound.It is easy to use, comfortable reading and streaming TV shows.  I highly recommend a Kindle over all the other tablets ofsimilar nature.

Reviews.Author: Diane Martens
Reviews.Content: The best gift I’ve received for a long time!! I wanted a tablet for an electronic calendar for work and family appointments. I also wanted to browse the internet and access email. The Kindle Fire has been extremely easy to set up, sync with existing calendars, explore apps, etc. It is also wonderful for reading books and magazines; especially when I do not want a room light on.

Reviews.Title: The best gift that I received this holiday.
Reviews.Author: Koala22
Reviews.Content: I received my first Kindle 2 years ago and absolutely loved it.  The Kindle H.D. that I received this holiday far surpasses that one.  The clarity of the screen and and versatility of this unit are unbeleivable.  I would definitely recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it.
Reviews.Author: G. Maxwell
Reviews.Content: My little Kindle Fire HD 7 took me through a month long recovery from foot surgery. I played games, did email, read books, watched a PBS series, read the Bible, searched the web, etc, etc. It was easy to hold and I could adjust the brightness and sound as needed. It was a spur of the moment purchase before my surgery which turned out to be just what the doctor ordered.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: C. W. Smith
Reviews.Content: I've had a kindle keyboard for a couple of years and finally upgraded to the kindle fire. I considered purchasing the iPad but really the Kindle Fire has everything I need at a much more affordable price.

Reviews.Title: A beloved product (in an Apple household)!
Reviews.Author: Amanda L. Arguijo "ala"
Reviews.Content: First, let me say that everything in my house is an Apple product. We have an iPod touch, 2 iPod Nano's, a MacBook Air, 2 iPads, AND to cap it all off, an Apple TV. We are obsessed with Apple products. I was a little hesitant to buy a Kindle for this reason - I thought that maybe would should just pony up the extra $150 and get a iPad Mini for our toddler girls.We decided against that for 3 reasons:1) Our toddlers have broken, cracked, otherwise broken our first iPad one too many times. The front glass is fragile, and even with a supposedly "military grade" case on it, our daughter dropped the iPad onto a tile floor and .... crrrrraaaackkkkk. We read reviews that said that the Kindle glass was much more sturdy, so we thought that we'd give it a go.2) We were really excited about Kindle FreeTime. We spend a lot of money on the Apple AppStore buying books and games, and the prospect of paying only $3 per month and getting unlimited books and games was too alluring to pass up.3) The combination of the higher initial price and the higher maintenance price of buying new books and apps for the iPad was just too great of a difference to ignore.We are very happy with our decision. The Kindle has been a great addition to our current line up of gadgets. While I wouldn't use the Kindle exclusively, I do like having it around as a backup for myself and as the primary gadget for my children to read books on. At this price, and with Kindle FreeTime, it's a deal that can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Good as an IPad
Reviews.Author: Andrew E. Smyth
Reviews.Content: The screen display is great---slightly sharper than an IPad mini. I am a lawyer and I can use it to do work, too. I write pleadings on email and send it to myself--then scan and paste it onto 28 line pleading format.Movies great to watch

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: CorkiDeCat
Reviews.Content: Received enough Amazon Gift Cards for Xmas so I could upgrade my Kindle Fire to an HD.  What I am most impressed with is the sound.  No longer will headphones be the first choice.  I can hear it easily in the same room as the TV running without turning the volume on the Kindle up or the TV down.  It's like it's aimed right at me.  Everything else is great.  I am use to HD quality videos, but not HD web browsing. (I really like it)  It's also nice not to have to tilt the kindle this way or that to lose a reflection.The camera/video is pretty nice too, but you will have to buy an app to use it's full function. When I turned on my Kindle HD, there was a credit to claim that will make the app free.The e reader is about the same. I prefer the original Fire's look, but I will say the anti reflection more then makes up for it.  I can't say what is different, but something is...The XRAY feature is pretty neat.  I don't know how many time I pause a movie to look up something on IMDb.I will be receiving a cable (from Amazon) that will allow me to hook it up to my HDTV.  I knew if I waited long enough, I would not have to buy a Roko, which I always wanted.  Hope this set up works.

Reviews.Title: The best
Reviews.Author: Dora McDonald
Reviews.Content: It is just great so far but I am just learning . At my age it takes a little longer to learn all these new things . I am 76 yr. old but I am enjoying my kindle so much.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Christmas

Reviews.Content: It was a gift to my daughter in law and she has not put it down yet. It is easy to use and she loves it.

Reviews.Content: I have found that it is convienent, fast, and easy to use!  The only down side I would say is the battery life could be a little longer.  I couldn't imagine using the Kindle (non-HD) with even less battery run time.

Reviews.Title: It was for my daugther....she love it...

Reviews.Content: Is a great prodoct.....for my 8 year old girl....she can play games, check the internet, skipe....is amazing We love it

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Content: For anyone who's looking for a reasonably priced tab, this Kindle Fire HD 7" is INCREDIBLE!! And, for only $20 more than the basic Kindle, you get HD which is fantastic!! The color and sound is amazing and I wouldn't trade this for any other tab ever!! I would highly recommend it to everyone in the market for a tab!!!  Good job Amazon!!

Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is a must.  I bought it for my daughter for Christmas and she has not put it down yet.

Reviews.Title: new toy for all!
Reviews.Author: Sue B
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of researching before decided to get the Kindle Fire HD 7", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 16 GB - Includes Special Offers and I'm not disappointed with my choice. It does everything it says it will, no it's not an IPAD but it never said it was. It works for me and I'm happy with it. :) It is easy to use and you can always go to the Forums for answers and helpful hints and if that fails Amazon CS is always a click away and I have found them most helpful when I needed answers to my questions. :)

Reviews.Content: i got an excellant product for my grandson.he is really enjoying it. he did not need any help in working the Kindel he just started going thru the functions

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: scadyooper "Manda"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this for our seven year old for Christmas.  We chose the Kindle Fire because of the Parental Controls that can be enabled on the device.  I love the fact it can be set up so she can read unlimited and play games for 30 minutes a day.  We looked at several devices iPod Touch, the Galaxy Tablet as well for us there were many factors that played into our decision.  Our child is 7 and does not need Facebook, Twitter or to be surfing the internet on her tablet - I love the fact I can block this on the Kindle.  The main reason we chose the Kindle Fire HD over the iPod Touch is most School Districts consider iPods as music devices and not a tablet, so she would not be able to bring the Touch to school (and I was not paying for an iPad - our child is 7).  If we ever let her take the Kindle Fire to school she could (I do not see that happening but it is an option we have.)  I have played several games on it (I also like the fact that I can block those "pay to play more" parts of games), streamed video and read on the Kindle when my child is in bed.  We also didn't pay the $15 to get rid of the ads because it is on the lock screen and it doesn't bother us.  If you us the "Free Version" of Kindle Free Time you do not have the other people viewed, it is a very simple screen.  The fact that there is only a front facing camera doesn't even bother us, because we are not going around taking photos, we use it to Skype and why do you need a back side camera to Skype with?For us this device is perfect for what we needed.  I was not expecting a "lap top" if I wanted my child to have a lap top I would have purchased one.  I wanted something they could read books on and play the occasional game or stream the occasional video on.  The Kindle Fire is that it is not a computer or a lap top it is a gaming device that you can read and learn new skills with (whether it is a piano or a language).I now wish we would have bought one for our other child so they would each have their own and no fighting would ensue.

Reviews.Title: The new, improved Kindle Tablet, HD.
Reviews.Author: Glenn Lee
Reviews.Content: The new improved Kindle Fire HD worth buying.  The display is superior, text to speech capabilities in itself worth the upgrade. The text to speech feature has excellent speech characteristics, without the usual computer like uninflected speech characteristics.  This feature opens an entire library of free literature up to blind or visually impaired population.  As long as you can find a book online (classics all free), you can have the book read to you in a pleasing sythesized computer voice, complete with human inflection.  The availabilty of storage in the Amazon cloud ensures almost instant availability of a huge personal library. A really true breakthrough for the blind or visually imparied.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: booksmart07
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is everything I expected and so much more.  It's  a mimi computer with books added. Clear pages for reading. Great screen for watching a movie. Very clear still and motion pictures. Can even check e-mails,facebook and world wide weather channel. I guess it's great for video games also but I don't use it for that. All I can say is I am very happy with my Kindle. My wife has a regular Kindle and would like to have the HD model. Birthday is coming.

Reviews.Title: five start all the way
Reviews.Author: Kevin Wilde "Kevin"
Reviews.Content: The kids absolutely love their kindle fire, and I do too. Picture quality is pure HD - great - and the surround sound is so impressively loud it fills the room. But the best part is the ability to plug in a connector from the HMDI port to HD TV HMDI port ($9 cable) which allows you to look at whatever is on the Kindle Fire to the big screen TV, including playing TV shows and movies - or reading books, playing games - on the TV.A friend of mine said that the movie Margin Call was great. I couldn't find it anywhere. Not on demand, not on pay per view, not at Red Box - can't find a Blockbuster any more. One click on the Kindle Fire and there it is FOR FREE, streamed straight to my tv (via the Kindle Fire.!!!!)I love the old British Comedy Fawlty Towers, and recently paid $28 for a box set of DVDs so I could watch. Same shows on Kindle Fire FREE, streamed straight to my TV.Watching movies on the Fire itself is fine, but the ability to stream it onto a big screen is a great plus.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: LSL308 "LSL"
Reviews.Content: I have held off buying any kind of Kindle until I read up on the Kindle Fire. I'm so pleased with the HD quality and Dolby Audio. All the functions of this product were more than I expected. I can read a book, play a game, surf the net, watch a movie, have anti-virus on it, and get updates as needed. It also came with the special offers, like the Prime members account free for the first 30 days. I liked the Prime account so much that I kept it, because you can watch free movies online as well, and free games to boot! My kids love it as well. I can't afford to buy them each their own, so I do let them play games on it. They also offer audio books, but I haven't tried that yet. There are some books that are free as well. I love my Kindle Fire so much, because I can do so much on it. It's wonderful! I highly recommend this product!

Reviews.Content: It was a really wonderful Christmas in our home. The Kindle Fire is a great part of it. We have downloaded some movies:  crisp and clear graphics, unbelievable sound.  This is a product that is a bargain!!

Reviews.Content: I bought 3 Kindle Fire HD for Christmas for my Niece and 2 Nephews. You will enjoy the Kindle HD...

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: I have bought 4 kindle fires last year for family members and myself so when they came out with kindle fire hd I I ordered it and I LOVE IT!!!

Reviews.Content: I purchased this kindle in November for my Foster child knowing she wanted a laptop and it got me thinking why get her that when I know exactly what she uses a computer for so when I checked the spec for this kindle HD it was a no brainer for my 14 year old best electronic I bought her this year.

Reviews.Content: My wife loved her gift and uses all the time. I gave it 5 stars because of its versatility and ease of use, I would recommend this product to anyone

There needs to be more hours in the day for all the wonderful things your can accomplish with very few keystrokes or brushes. Thank you for such a great product & the nice freebees that can be involved with it!!

Reviews.Title: Very much enjoy my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: A. Brown
Reviews.Content: Love the size, fits nicely into my purse to take with me if I should choose to. The light up screen is excellent. I still love my old Kindle for reading books and will take that one with me when I go away as not to have anything happen to this new kindle fire.The old Kindle does not have lighting in it so I have to use a book light sometimes but I am not ready to give that one up yet either. But this new one does so much more. Can watch movies on it., play games, access the internet, don't have to have several devices with me at one time. Wifi works great no problems with that either. Very attractive looking and just pops for me.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for our 8 year old
Reviews.Author: E.S.
Reviews.Content: This was my daughters christmas gift this year. She has been so thrilled. This is a great tablet for her. I really struggled with which tablet to get for her. Yes she is 8 and its an extream gift, but we knew she would use it and take care of it. The tablet is made really well with a great feel to it. If it wasnt for an 8 year old i would not have bought a case for it, it just has that good of a feel to it.  I chose this tablet because it was for a child and i know there is only so much she would need it for. Mostly entertainment. Yes it is, in a sence, a way for amazon to get you to buy from them all kinds of media, but im happy with that. I love amazon. Everybody in the family knew she was receiving this for christmas so it made it easy for them to buy a gift card to excatly the place she would want one to. On a parent note...i chose this tablet for 2 deciding factors. One: its user friendly. I didnt have to spend an hour trying to figure out how to operate it. It came registered to my amazon account, and when i wanted to put my daughters name on the kindle instead of the name it came registered to ( mine) it was a snap. And those types of things usually take me forever to figure out. Everything on this device is very simple to use. I was worried how to swap things in and out of the cloud before i received it, but that also is so easy. You dont even have to think about it. Its plainly there and explains itself. So for anybody that wants a tablet but struggles with electronics and how to make them work right, this is for you. I wish all devices were this easy. The second deciding factor for me was the parental controls. And im not even using the free time feature. That adds even greater saftey and control even over how long your kids are allowed on it. But just from the standard functions i was able to set a passcode for turning wifi on, im able to block anything i want without locking everything as a whole. I can block just movies, or just the web, so thats why i went with the kindle,its the tablet she asked for, but it was a great choice. The ease of use and the great parental controls the other tablets didnt offer. The picture qualty is amazing, as well as the sound. They are not lying when they say these features are great. So this is just my 2 cents on my thoughts on this device for our 8 year old.  My daughter has also done more reading on this tablet in a week then she ever has, so its been very good for her on that end as well.

Reviews.Title: All & More than expected
Reviews.Author: Kris Thompson
Reviews.Content: I was very surprised & pleased with the Kindle HD. For the price it is awesome. No problems so far. The only thing I wish it could do is to be able to put "read" books into a separate folder like on my old Kindle. But otherwise it does everything I need it for & more!

Reviews.Title: love kindle fire hd

Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HD 7 in mail a few days ago. I love it! I had a Kindle 3G and really loved that but I also had a tablet,which makes 2 things I had to carry with me. For what I need this new Kindle is perfect and I only have to carry 1 electronic with me. Only complaint is the fact that you have to buy electric charger seperately as the usb charger is very SLOWWWWWWW!!!!!! I am a reader and love the clarity and the light in the new Kindle!! Now I need to sell my old Kindle 3 G which is in perfect condition!! Amazon is a great company to work with!!!! prompt delivery and great web site!!!

Reviews.Content: Wanted a tablet for my daughter but didn't think she was ready or an iPad. This was the perfect choice for her. It does everything for half the price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle review
