Reviews.Title: I had my doubts
Reviews.Author: K. Schiele
Reviews.Content: I traded in my original fire at GameStop, got $99 for it, purchased the Fire Hd 7" and got $25 Amazon gift card to boot. When I purchase I only read negative reviews and separate from someone being too picky and could I live with the issue. Anyway I could not pass up this deal. I love it.  I don't have any ads at the bottom there is nothing there and I did not pay to have them removed.  There are lock screen ads but in HD they look like pretty pictures and are good deals. You never could personalize the home screen anyway and as for a clock, if you are concerned with the time then you shouldn't be on a tablet playing anyway. The sound is wonderful I don't need my extra speakers anymore. Don't worry about flash there are plenty of ways to get it and watch what you want. Rapid charger: yes the cable is slow to charge but I have an iPad charger and does speed it up, because this baby goes everywhere with me. So get it if you want its good besides any issues from the software or performance you know Amazon will replace it under warranty. I haven't heard of Amazon saying "oh well" at any issue.  I have an iPad, an Asus transformer, a Samsung Galaxy SII,so I'm used to power in a device and this does everything it was designed to do. If you notice you system getting slow its an app that is in the background doing too much don't blame the KFHD

Reviews.Title: the best tablet ever!!
Reviews.Author: stuart
Reviews.Content: After searching for months, we bought the 8.9" HD Kindle Fire. The picture is very sharp and the sound is amazing!! Very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Kort Meyer
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD replace my Kindle Fire.  The HD is lighter, thinner, and faster.  The resolution is crisp and clean.  I would not hesitate to recommend this product to friends or family.

Reviews.Content: I am really happy with the kindle fire hd.  The picture quality is amazing.  I enjoy being able to watch the videos on Amazon Prime. Reviews.Title: Get this!

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7" Dolby Audio Dual Band Wi-Fi
Reviews.Author: Jean Goldbach

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Janice Kruger
Reviews.Content: I read several books a week and not having to carry all those hard cover books is a blessing. I have everything I need on my Kindle. I can take it with me wherever I go.

Reviews.Title: best deal ever
Reviews.Author: charlie roy
Reviews.Content: hate to put it down..take it with me everywhere..love to share it with my family and friends..thank you much..good product.

Reviews.Title: It does everything
Reviews.Author: Betsy Johns
Reviews.Content: I am just amazed at how much the Kindle fire can do.  I use mine several times a day and I love it. .

Reviews.Title: Upgraded to Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: This should be a 4 1/2 star review. I couldn't figure out how to change it after I submitted it. I have to admit that when I first turned it on to try it out I didn't think I would keep it.  I loved my Fire first generation and it took me awhile to see what made it worth paying for the upgrade.  After downloading my apps, music, photos, playing some games, etc. I am very pleased with my purchase.  Touch to speech on the reader is a good feature, xray features for movies and books is awesome and photos of artists in my music library is a special treat. Some of the issues I read about in other reviews about special offers being an aggravation are practically a non issue. The product offers on the home screen can be hidden by changing the home screen viewing option in settings.  I am still getting familiar with the features and every time I use it (which is often, I think I'm getting addicted to it), I find more things I love.  Love the Bluetooth, love the HD screen, love that it is thinner than the first Fire. So far the only thing I don't love is not being able to choose what goes onto the carousel.  Things keep popping up. It' s not anything that would make me return it though. I have added the apps I use most to my favorites and don't really use the carousel very much anyway. I owned a Galaxy Tab 2 but sold it to buy a Fire. You just can't beat the Fire for simplicity and convenience if you use Amazon books, music, etc.  Love this tablet.

Reviews.Title: Great Improvement!!!!
Reviews.Author: Luvlytrinity
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire!!  The graphics are great and not as heavy as the first kindle fire.  Downloading books are much faster too. I highly recommend the Kindle fire HD!

Reviews.Title: Oh yeah!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was a bit worried about buying a locked down tablet but Amazon has done an amazing job with the new fire HD. We have not a complaint.  The crazy her hype over advertising on the tab is silly. I only had ads on the lock screen.  I look at it as a beautiful dynamic screen saver!  We've bought the Amazon Prime cool-aid ... Amazon, you've done a beautiful job.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet
Reviews.Author: gogo
Reviews.Content: Great sound Great picture.  Am still figuring out how to navigate through theicons and the web, but am very happy.

Reviews.Title: I don't leave home without...I'm never bored when I have my Kindle Fire!!
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: If you have someone in your life that has to spend a lot time resting or waiting (like waiting for kids at their activities or to pick them up at school), I cannot recommend the Kindle Fire enough. This device has kept me entertained almost continuously for the past 10 weeks while I was recovering from a major illness and surgery.  I was in the hospital 5 of the last 10 weeks.  I had a variety of books, magazines, movies, TV shows to choose from depending on my mood.  I could also keep up with friends and family on Facebook.  My Kindle Fire HD was a great companion.  I would have gone stir crazy without it!!!What keeps this from being a 5 star review is the Silk web browser needs some improvement.  It can be clunky occasionally.

Reviews.Title: Child Loves It
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Bought this from staples to give to my daughter for her birthday.  She really likes the apps and games she can play and I like the piece of mind I get from setting up parental controls.  When she's not using it I love to watch movies and my own content loaded on the Kindle.I do find the power and volume buttons rather cumbersome to find at times, they just blend in the side and I can't tell you how many times I've hit the power instead of volume and vice versa.  Also I get a loud pop sound most of the time when the device is awoken from sleep mode.

Reviews.Title: I just love it
Reviews.Author: S.wade
Reviews.Content: I so enjoy my kindle,iam glad i updated to the kindle fire.great buy thinking about update again i like it so well.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7" HD is awsome...but...
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This little 32GB tablet has an outstanding screen, the best sound of any computer type device I've ever listened to with built in speakers(including PC's) and is very smooth when swiping from screen to screen. I bought this primarily due to my already being a prime member which gives me a ton of streaming options. That's getting better all the time! Netflix had better watch their back.  I can't use voice search and that bothered me but I went for it anyway. I'm glad I did. The keyboard input is pretty easy to use and once you have entered a few characters your result usually pops up. My biggest gripe is the clunky carousel. It's easy enough to navigate around but it's like the big elephant in the room no one wants to acknowledge. There's no need for it.  I already have another tablet I use at home and this one was bought strictly for travel. This doesn't do all the "nifty" things a pure android tablet does but makes up for that with a tremendous amount of free content from Amazon.  I've looked at all the ways you're supposed to be able to make this act more like a pure Android device but I see no need to do that. It does what it's supposed to do and very well at that. I'm giving it 5 stars in spite of the carousel.Recommended.Update after having the Kindle HD for a while now. You can add voice search to this by using the dolphin browser{or other I suppose} and side load google voice search. It's not as easy to do as it should be but if I was able to stumble through the process, anyone should be able to. You'll need to create an account or two in order to download what you need.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love...
Reviews.Author: Annette Boyd
Reviews.Content: I love this Kindle Fire! We cannot afford the ipad (which is what I really wanted), but my parents surprised my daughter with this as an early Christmas gift. The problem is neither one of us wants to share it! So, we've already purchased a second one with a pretty pink case so she can have her Christmas wish..."to have my own kindle..."

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Clatterbuck
Reviews.Content: I use the Kindle more than my iPad.  Wanted a smaller and lighter tablet to carry with me and read books.  So glad I settled on the Kindle.  What sold me was the step by step user instructions on the Amazon Kindle site.  The Kindle forum is a bonus if you  have a question on one of the functions, etc.  I read through everything before I got it so it was easy for me to operate it right out of the box.  The screen is beautiful and the sound is clear and sharp.  Looks like I have become a real Kindle fan!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Sharon Bowman
Reviews.Content: What a great product. I loved it so much my husband had to have one.  Shipping was super fast and the graphics are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Very enjoyable!
Reviews.Author: Gerald N. Diamond
Reviews.Content: Does more than expected.  Some shortcomings but way more joy than disappointment. .  Well done!!!!!!!!!!!!  More value than I-Pad... BUY

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Nickee J
Reviews.Content: Just received this as an early Christmas present and I Love It!!! Nice bright screen for my books, movies are exceptional, and the sound is awesome. The display is nice and clear and it's easy to navigate. Completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: Mauricette
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my kindle! I was first thinking on buying an ipad and decided to go for the kindle since I thought was more afordable and I do not regret it!Great sound, HD picture, fast, I just love it!

Reviews.Title: Excellent !!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Travelling Lady
Reviews.Content: I had a Kindle Keyboard and loved it so thought I would like to upgrade.  I am so glad I did.  I can't tell  you how much I enjoy the color and high quality.  I even learned to play "Angry Birds" so I can comppete with my grandkids.  I can't say enough about the quality.  Well worth the money.  I haven't even learned to do everything possible with it but I am learning as I go along and it's amazing.

Reviews.Title: Love the Fire!
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: I am a Mac user and considered staying with Apple for a tablet, but decided that I liked the features of the Fire HD as well as the price.  I am not disappointed--it is user friendly and intuitive, has wonderful clarity and great features.  I do wish Bridge Baron was available as an app!

Reviews.Title: Son in college loves it
Reviews.Author: Brenda T "phd mom"
Reviews.Content: My son, who is a junior in college, asked for this as a gift.  He absolutely LOVES it, and really likes the size because it is easy for him to carry around.  His girlfriend has an IPad but carries around a large purse, so it's easy for her to carry her IPad around, but my son specifically wanted this Kindle Fire, not only for what it does, but for the size.

Reviews.Title: Excellent customer service
Reviews.Author: Maineiac
Reviews.Content: My husband got me the Kindle Fire HD for my birthday but I patiently waited a month for the 16G version to come out. When it finally arrived it was apparent within minutes that there was a problem with the screen. I jumped on the customer service chat right away and let them know. I followed the steps he asked me to do but was still having problems. Within one week I had a new Kindle Fire HD in my hand. I love it and want to thank Amazon for such great customer service.

Reviews.Title: Love the Fire
Reviews.Author: Kristina A Pooler
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews before purchasing and was impressed with iPad users saying they liked the Fire more. Don't have an iPad, was thinking of getting one but not now. I absolutely love the Fire; easy to use, gorgeous HD quality on everything. The videos are limitless, I am English and can watch so many of the TV shows from my childhood on the Fire.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd Kindle.  I love everything about it!  I started out with the original, 2nd generation and now the Fire HD.  The long lasting battery life is fantastic!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Greg Nowak
Reviews.Content: BETTER THAN EXPECTED. Easy to use even for a computer illerate like myself.Sound is unbelievable for something so small.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Nice clear images and print.  Pretty easy to get the hang of and does a great job of streaming Netflix and other videos.  Very Nice product.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted!
Reviews.Author: James J. Smith II
Reviews.Content: Excellent visual display with lightening fast downloads were a pleasant surprise! I have enjoyed "Premier" movies and books and all of the special Kindle discounts on e-books, and magazines. I highly recommend the Fire HD 7" to one and all!

Reviews.Title: One of my best gifts given.. ever
Reviews.Author: Kyle Robert Coughenour
Reviews.Content: I dont like to make very long reviews.I bought this for my wife's Birthday and she hasnt put it down since I got it for her.The speakers are AMAZING!!BUY PRIME IT IS SO WORTH IT ON THE KINDLE HD!!!

Reviews.Title: First Kindle
Reviews.Author: CF
Reviews.Content: Ok, I am new at this since this is my first pad, pod or tablet of any kind.  First, there is no manual that comes with the Kindle Fire HD and I had to learn how to move around by trial and error.  I looked on line for a User Guide or something I could download but there are books etc you can buy.  After several searches I finally went to Best Buy and one of the Geeks there told me how to go to the User Guide on the Kindle. There should be some kind of instructions given with the Kindle that tells you where to look.  I had no idea.  You can find this by,after opening the tablet and turning it on, unlock and slide to the left.  Then on your home page,drag from the top down and that brings up headings at the top.  Then go under (More) in the right hand corner and open that. Then go under (Help & Feedback) and then (User Guide). You can find out how to do things there.  It would have saved me a lot of time and effort if I had known how to do that when I bought the Kindle Fire HD.  Not sure how I will like it yet since I have just learned how to move around and do things on it.  I did manage to learn how to download a few books. I think I will like it but I am just beginning to use it so not sure yet.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tracy Warner "Tracy"
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle. It is exactly what I was looking for in a "tablet". I'm glad I bought it

Reviews.Title: Perfect for what is designed for
Reviews.Author: sonia hollnagel
Reviews.Content: Have it for just a few days and is all I expected to be.Small, easy to use with great sound and picture and fast.

Reviews.Title: a must have!
Reviews.Author: R. Weiss
Reviews.Content: I love it! Easy to use, apps are simple to download and organize, and the screen is crystal clear. A must have for anyone!

Reviews.Title: EXECELLENT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: WW
Reviews.Content: THIS IS A GREATABLET RECOMMEND IT TO EVERYONE CAME FAST AS USUAL AND AMAZON PRIME IS A GREAT DEAL BUY ONE FOR YOURSELF AND SEE

Reviews.Title: I got the Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Grandmanurse75
Reviews.Content: Great price for what it is able to do- compared to the price of an I Pod! Easier to carry also!

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: Mountain Girl 723
Reviews.Content: Haven't had a lot of time to play with it but what little I've done is FANTASTIC.  Instead of being restricted to it operating with just Apple products like an iPad is, the Kindle Fire HD 7" gives you Internet experience, access to e-mail, Facebook, etc., and TONS of books (some you can borrow for free) and movies!!!!!!!!The screen image is crystal clear.  It doesn't take long to fully charge the first time.  Gorgeous cases to choose from too.Who would want an iPad when this is a fraction of the cost and does SO MUCH?!?!!!!!Only down side, it comes with a cord to charge it while hooked to your computer; however, no USB adapter to plug it into for a surge strip.  On the up side of this issue, I had a USB adapter for another electronic item and it works fine with the Kindle's cord.You won't be disappointed with this product.  I bought it for my daughter and as soon as I can, I getting one for ME!!!!

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Randall J. Thompson
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 7" is working out well for me.  I have been a Kindle user from the very beginning.  I purchase this item after I dropped my Kindle Fire and shattered the screen.  For the time an effort that it was going to take to repair it I just decided to move on the the next great thing.  Everything is going as advertised.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Sean Sinner
Reviews.Content: Great product. Very easy to read and use. I would recommend it to others. I like being able to change the brighness as easy as it allows you.

Reviews.Title: Love my kindle
Reviews.Author: sherry B
Reviews.Content: love it love it love it I am reading non stop but still trying to figure out some of the features and what my access is because i am not in d us

Reviews.Title: This tablet is one of the best on 2012
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: This tablet is one of the best tablets on 2012 and probably 2013 until amazon launch the new version, here is a excellent review of kindle fire in spanish, well if you are looking read some in spanish about amazon kindle fire[...]

Reviews.Title: A great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Harry Mohrmann
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother in law.I wanted a simple but powerful tablet to allow her to read her favorite books and listen to music.She can also do email and make purchases without a lot of training.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tansaction
Reviews.Author: tracey2680
Reviews.Content: Got here faster then it indicated that it was suppose to be here. Played with it and love it my sister will love it for a xmas present. Will order from again.

Reviews.Title: Like having a portable laptop.
Reviews.Author: mmdetloff
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. I can web search, watch movies, stream videos, AND read my books. My previous Kindle (which I lost...bummer), I could only read my books on. This is like having a small I-phone that's a reader! Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: pammc
Reviews.Content: I got mine yesterday and right out of the box I love it.  I have had a kindle for a few years now but really like the versatility of this pad.  Don't like the ads and would love to pay to get them off but sadly, there are not any instructions to tell you how.  LOVE IT!!!I do love my Kindle Fire but there are things I do not like.  I know with more capabilities it will be a heavier product - it's a bit too heavy for my old wrists.  I do not like the way the charger hooks up - on the bottom?  Cannot charge and watch a video or read a book with the cover on and propped up.  Speaking of the cover - if you bend it too far backwards, it shuts the tablet off.  I'm not happy with the cover at all.  Its awkward especially when charging. I have taken it off and will go back to my old work tablet padded cover - will let you know how easy returning and refunding it will be.Some of the apps are difficult to use.  Locations services suck.  I cannot get the weather, moon and star charts to take a location or even find it.  These same apps are much easier to use on my iPhone.  I was hoping for better viewing of the night sky but no luck with location services yet.I get a loud crack from the speakers every once in awhile that is disturbing.I love the graphics and the clarity of the videos.  Watching movies is really nice.Trying to find an app that will download my songs from iCloud to Cloud is a challenge.  Downloading my pics a chore also.  I just don't have time to do something that should be easy.Nevertheless I'm still a big fan.

Reviews.Title: A solid upgrade to a solid device.
Reviews.Author: Daniel B. Robison
Reviews.Content: A few months ago I upgraded from the Kindle Fire to the Kindle Fire HD, overall the experience has been good. $200 was a great price for the Kindle Fire, which is why the HD is an even better deal. The addition of the camera makes skyping extremely easy and smooth. I tested out the skype feature by contacting a sibling of mine that lives out of state. We had a fairly long conversation that was one of the smoothest video calls I've ever had. It does all the stuff the Kindle Fire did, but it does it better. In cahoots with the Amazon ecosystem, you have a device that is powerful and puts amazon's digital content at your fingertips.Some notable additions to this model:-The speakers are incredible. The sound is clear an loud, easily loud enough to fill a whole room. Listening to music and watching movies with friends on the go is better than any laptop or tablet experience.-Streaming is notably smoother.-HDMI out makes your kindle a portable streaming box you can take with you anywhere. For prime members this means taking the whole streaming library to anyone's house on their big screen TV.- The Amazon Ecosystem is a big turn off for some, but for Prime subscribers it's awesome. You have all the benefits of Prime at the touch of a button.-Physical buttons for sound.Some not-so-great things:-The buttons that were lacking on the last iteration of the device are way too flush with the unit, making it pretty hard to just press blindly.-The Power Button and Sound buttons are close together, making it pretty easy to put the Kindle to sleep when you just want to turn the sound down.-Limited App Store.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Forchildren
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HD! I have downloaded music, books and even movies. I take it with me everywhere and love that it is thin and small enough to put in my purse. This would also make a great gift for someone else. I felt the price was great and I compared it with the Nook, e-book and found that I have made a great choice. If you do decide to get the Prime Time added do it at the time the special is offered, this will save you $10.00.

Reviews.Title: More that I expected
Reviews.Author: Marsha L. Eaton
Reviews.Content: When I got this I knew I would be able to read my books and get the usual stuff I could on my old kindle that I have had for 2 years. I knew it would be in color and knew I could watch videos and play games. What I didn't know was that I could get online much like I do my laptop. That was a surprise. I was so thrilled when I discovered this. There are a couple of apps I would like to be able to get on it that don't seem to want to work on my kindle but I can live with that. I would have liked to be able to hook up to the internet connection at my parent's house but it was not wireless. Haven't checked to see if there is a way to hook into a non wireless account yet. All in all I love it.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: scline "BFSearcher"
Reviews.Content: I recieved my Kindle about a month ago. It is the first tablet Ive owned though Ive used several. I think its fantastic. The web, movies ,games and books all come through in brilliant color. It has the best speakers. There are hundreds of applications you can download from Amazon for free. What a great product. And Ive become a reader at 61 yrs old.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Avinash
Reviews.Content: I received my Kindle Fire HD Yesterday. I must say how amazed I am of the delivery of this product. I signed for a super saver shipping which was estimated at 5-8 days but got it within 3 days!The Kindle Fire is all I expected and much more. Lets just say I'm proud to be an owner of this amazing product.To be honest this is my first tablet and without a doubt I will be hanging on to it for a long time. The main reason I purchased this product was the face to face chat feature. I never expected a tablet would be as advanced as this. The images are stunningly clear and the sound is exceptional.This is one of the best investments I have made! Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Night Reading
Reviews.Author: Terry Britton
Reviews.Content: I do alot of reading at night and the Kindle is great for that! Best gift I have ever bought myself!

Reviews.Title: X-mas Present for Sister and Brother in Law
Reviews.Author: Rosalinda
Reviews.Content: I am so excited to see their faces when they get this for Xmas. I Mainly got it bc my brother in law likes to read a lot and my sister is tired of having so many books around the house.

Reviews.Title: it's finally here.

Reviews.Content: I love it, loveit,love it!!!! Perfect choice for our family in these economic hard times.  It is our tech gift to ourselves for the year. Perfect compromise for the money.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Number 2!!!

Reviews.Content: I love my first Kindle Fire so much, I had to get the new Fire HD....it is wonderful...great color...lighter weight...absolutely the best speakers! Buy one ..you won't be sorry.

Reviews.Content: Never thought I wold give up the feel of a real book but the kindle is great in terms of traveling anywhere (light) and quickly downloading all the books I want  at a price significantly lower than a hardcover.

Reviews.Title: why i love my kindle

Reviews.Content: I ordered this for my 8 year old. Think it is perfect for her to use to play games and watch videos and movies on. Hope it will keep her off my iPad. From what I understand in order to use as a camera you have to purchase an app. It can be used as a cam for video chatting through Skyp without an app. Still trying to figure it out. Anyway I would definitely recommend as a fun little device to play around with.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HD

Reviews.Content: I find that my Kindle is able to do everything I need it to do as well as entertain this is a quality device and a great vaule, I work in the IT field so I demand a lot out of a device and when I say that the Kindle Fire delivers you can believe it.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE

Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT TOY. MORE THAN I EXPECTED. VERY EASY TO USE. EXCELLENT PICTURE. SOUND IS ALSO EXCELLENT FORE SOMETHING SO SMALL.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7 Fantastic product!
Reviews.Author: Maja de Versé
Reviews.Content: Buying the Kindle Fire HD 7 was a toss between buying a lap top computer or the Kindle. Not for a moment did I regret this purchase. What a wonderful little entertainer it is, but not only that, there are so many APS to choose from, like the news and CIA world facts, which are always updated, the weather channel, foreign exchange etc.  Now, instead of my old lap top I shall carry my Kindle with me when I travel.. It allows me to acess e mails as long as there is an internet connection.  The Aps are fantastic and the PRIME offers a great savings.  I bought mine with 32 GB rather than 16 and am glad I did it, because there are many things I would like to keep. I recommend this Kindle highly, 5 thumbs up, great product!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Vanessa Lay
Reviews.Content: I love it !  I have read more books since I got it than in the last 10 years .

Reviews.Content: Everything I was expecting and more. The 7" is great but now I am envious of my husband's larger screen.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: I purchased the kindle fire for a gift for my husband but found that we share it! It is easy to learn how to use and reading books is great on the device. It arrived in a very timely manner.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Fun n d Sun
Reviews.Content: I love the new features such as hd and night reading. The picture quality is excellent. The sound is also great. The whole family can use it. I would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my sister as a present.Received Kindle very promptly from Amazon and we were very impressed with the Kindle.It was very light weight compared to my nook tablet,pictures were very sharp,download fast.Very happy with my purchase and my sister was even more pleased since the velocity cruz tablet I gave her is not working.She has played around with it,downloading free books from Amazon without any problems.She has gone to the internet,access youtube and the screen is so crisp and clear that I'm envious.She will have the Kindle to keep her occupied on her trip back home to Australia next week.12/2--- my sister has been using her Kindle for a week and she is disappointed that she can't download free apps without is providing credit info.Now we find out that the camera is useless unless you download and pay for the app to take photos. I am very disappointed in the product.One of the reasons I bought this instead of the Negus was the camera.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: peggy garbe
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for grandchild and they have been thrilled.  I would recommend it and would use it.

Reviews.Title: Great pad!

Reviews.Content: I bought for my wife whovis not that tech savy.  She set it up very easily and uses most of the functions without seeking assistance.  A great little product that she has to hide because the kids are always looking to use it too.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle fire hd!

Reviews.Content: I don't go anywhere without it anymore. It's sort of adicting. I play word games on it, watch movies. The sound is amazing! I had to hood speakers up to my laptop to watch movies on it, but the sound on the kindle fire hd is clear and plenty loud enough. Love all the aps, web surfing is great. The only thing that annoys me is that sometimes when I'm reading a book it's hard to get back to the home page. The little home icon dissappears and it's hard to get it back up. Reviews.Title: LOVE MY KINDLE

Reviews.Content: love love love it ,!! Im so glad I read the review about weather to get a kindle fire or a kindle fire HD, I really do think for the extra 50$,,, you really cant go wrong! goahead spend the little more you'll be glad you did.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7
Reviews.Author: Roger B.
Reviews.Content: Had the Kindle keyboard prior. This one is much better and easy to operate. The touch screen is amazing. Reading is so much better with the lighted screen. I also read my Golf Digest magazine on my Kindle which has fantastic color and is very sharp in HD.

Reviews.Title: Great product - Great service.
Reviews.Author: D. Costello
Reviews.Content: I have loved my kindle from the first time I used it. I had problems with it taking it charge six months after getting it, sent it back, was sent a replacement,  and haven't had any further problems. There were no charges not even shipping. I will be getting one for my Husband this Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Tim m Savage
Reviews.Content: Beautiful display. I like the Calender app. Holds lots of music. etc Easy to use. WIFI works good too. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Entertainment on the go!!
Reviews.Author: Stan Cook
Reviews.Content: I bought the new HD version back in September and have been using it a couple of months.  The Ads don't bother me at all, and I DO notice them every time I open the cover.  I have since read about 4 books.  One of them is a Kindle Serial.  The serials are great, but they kinda get to you as well.  Right when the suspense happens and something is going to be revealed. . .. ."Continued in next episode."  Then you absolutely cannot wait for the next episode and when you get it, you devour it even faster than the last.  It's also awesome for listening to your music or watching a Netflix TV episode before going to sleep.  I have even watched a Netflix movie while on the treadmill exercising.I can watch part of a movie, catch up on the news, browse a magazine, check my email or countless other things while I have my lunch at work.  I read a lot more now than I did before.  I never was interested in the spy mystery before.  I read a Tom Clancy book and got hooked.  Then started the Andrew Peterson series.Bottom line.  With this small package, I can access my music, books, magazines, news, emails, games, and make reminders for myself ALL WHILE ON THE GO.  I highly recommend getting one, BUT. . . . DO NOT COMPARE THIS WITH AN IPAD!!!!!  They are not the same and are not supposed to be.  I made the right choice and now enjoy daily reading time.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: BlessedMomFNPC
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD.  I have an iphone and a windows 8 laptop but I spend more time on my kindle than the others. I had a Nook and quickly returned it due to its lack of features.  Kindle is fast and it has more apps than the Nook. Kindle has lots of memory and the Kindle screen is awesome also.  I can download apps to Kindle and sync with my iphone and Windows laptop.  I can type and check out my college courses also.  This size is convenient.  I simply toss in my purse and go.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Tiffany S.
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD was the best itme that I purchased for myself. Like my AmEx card I never leave home without it.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use for someone who is tech-challenged
Reviews.Author: Jennie
Reviews.Content: I am not very good at using new technologies, and I normally don't care enough to try. But I recently bought the Kindle Fire HD to keep me entertained on a very, very long flight. As I started setting it up and downloading apps I noticed that this is incredibly easy to use! Even for me! Within an hour or so I had completely set it up for my trip (set up netflix and pandora, downloaded a few games and a few books, etc), and now I just like to play with it. Also, with Christmas right around the corner that free month of Amazon Prime is a bonus. I would definitely recommend this product to someone who is looking for a cheaper alternative to the great and powerful ipad.

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: david m mandel
Reviews.Content: its very helpful and dependible i enjoy it and it is a sensation f f f f f f f

Reviews.Title: AWESOME LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Cakegirl
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough how much I love this new kindle. I've enjoyed watching movies, playing games and surfing the web.  I read a lot of books and just can't say how much I love it! Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kristi
Reviews.Content: I really like the Kindle. I like the size of it and the capabilities. One thing that I would change is for it to have an off or on button for auto rotate. It sucks using it in bed laying down cause sometimes the screen flips without you wanting it to. Facebook doesn't work all too great but that is an app default and not the Kindle. It is easy to use and the books have a lot of options you can adjust which I really like. I highly suggest it to anyone who is thinking about buying a Kindle. The battery life is tremendous. I can use it all day long for hours and it doesn't die.

Reviews.Title: My review
Reviews.Author: Luis R. Colon
Reviews.Content: Excellent product it does everything I expected and more.I was planning on buying the new I-Pad mini and I'm glad I decided to go for the Kindle Fire, which does about the same for less money.

Reviews.Title: Love my new kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: P. Perkins "Book Lover"
Reviews.Content: I was so excited when the new kindle fire came out. I really liked my old kindle fire  but the new one fixed so many of the problems I had with my old one. The sound quality, speakers is wonderful, I loved that I could hook up with facebook and download all my photos also bluetooth my phone and transfer my pictures from it. I think the best thing was that every book and mp3 or app I had purchased from Amazon was already on my new Fire when I received it.  Complaints, yes there are a couple, all the ads, which Amazon removed for $15, I would love swype on the keyboard(not sure if it's an app I can add), and I wish they would have supplied an entire wall charger and not just the usb part. That's why only 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hd review
Reviews.Author: Brenda J Buschkamp "b busch"
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle fire hd.  I can't believe the difference in the picture quality.  I have watched a couple of movies and they were really fun!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: AMV
Reviews.Content: I really like my new Kindle Fire HD.  I can take it everywhere and have all my books with me.  Love being able to e-mail with it, check the weather, play games, watch movies or just read! The only thing that I am not happy with is the battery doesn't seem to hold a charge as long as the Kindle Fire.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD is great!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Zayerz "Jay-Z"
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle fire HD so far! It streams easily, has great sound, and, so far, does everything I want it to do!

Reviews.Title: My new Fire
Reviews.Author: Ralph J. Benzenberg "Ralph B."
Reviews.Content: Recently received it, but it appears to be everything I wanted.  Gave my wife my "old" kindle but between the 2, we're reading up a storm.  I've also found the help desk very helpful.

Reviews.Title: It is wonderful
Reviews.Author: Jody M. Yezek
Reviews.Content: Never in my wildest dreams did I think I could have something that does all that it does. Movies , music, news etc. so handy and I love it.

Reviews.Title: I love this thing
Reviews.Author: Gecko
Reviews.Content: I use it to read books, watch movies, and play simple games when I need to waste time.  I am new to Kindle and don't yet know how to do search's in books such as the Bible and Math study book.  Therefore, study is more difficult for me than just reading page by page.  I may have only scratched the surface on this thing's capability, so study may get easier as I become more acquainted with it.Watching movies is a breeze.  It connects quick to my home wi-fi and connects to TV easily with a HDMI/micro cable.

Reviews.Title: The Best Yet!
Reviews.Author: Katherine "Kat"
Reviews.Content: I have often told friends that I could give up all my electronic toys except my Kindle Fire.  I did, however, give it up for a new Kindle Fire HD.  Amazon, you have made the best better!  I've had my new Kindle Fire HD for two days and I hate to put it down.  My only complaint is that I will not receive the case for it for another two or three days.  I started several years ago with the original Kindle e-reader, then I bought Kindles for my children as birthday and Christmas gifts.  The only person left in the family who didn't have one was my husband who now has my original Kindle Fire.  He loves it!!  I do not feel that I run the risk of being told I'm crazy when I say that Kindle Fire is the best tablet you can purchase because I also own an iPad.  My new Kindle Fire HD streams movies and videos seamlessly and quickly--no starting and stopping like the iPad.  I've told all my friends and family about it so I wanted to write a review to say that I could not be happier with a product.  Bravo Amazon!!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: heathert
Reviews.Content: my mom loves our ipads, but isn't really tech knowledgeable.  she wanted something to browse the internet (etsy, pinterest, facebook) and to use her netflix subscription better.  she looooves it.  she doesn't mind the smaller screen and you can't beat it for the price.  i love our ipads, but these are great for kids or anyone who doesn't LIVE for their computer/tablet.  great value and quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Kindle
Reviews.Author: J. A. Putman "Bookseller"
Reviews.Content: Fast and very vibrate colors compared to my Kindle Fire that I purchased less then a year ago. I would buy again!!

Reviews.Title: I love my Fire
Reviews.Author: donnie
Reviews.Content: It is everything I want.  I was thinking about an I pad but I am so happy with the Kindle Fire that I I am glad I saved my money.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for all ages
Reviews.Author: mrswmt
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire for it's great sound, easy to handle, great screen pictures, easy to operate and would recommend it for all ages. Great for traveling.The web cam is the bonus for this device.  The sound is amazing for a small tablet.Wasn't sure if I would like using the tablet for books but after reading a few books you get used to it and don't miss holding a bulky book at all. I would highly recommend this product if you are thinking of a tablet.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle is great!
Reviews.Author: Katherine Foulke
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle! I have used almost every feature on it except the camera. Its not the best for doing lots on the internet because the screen is small and some pages won't load properly. But overall I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Lorene Ballew
Reviews.Content: Love it just the right size and weight for purse or briefcase use it every day. Very good price. Thinking about getting another one for my grand child.

Reviews.Title: It's Great!
Reviews.Author: NWTechie
Reviews.Content: It was given as a gift. Going from the original Kindle to the Kindle Fire HD was a pleasant surprise

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Roberto Vergara
Reviews.Content: I had it for about a month and so far I like it. Still haven't really check its full potential.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny
Reviews.Author: C. Carroll
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 7" is certainly worth the price.  Even if you have to spend extra on the wall charging adapter, this devise does almost everything I could ask from it.  It's not a desktop/laptop, so don't expect to be massively productive.  However, if you simply want a device that allows for you to surf the net, watch videos, and listen to music and have it easily accessible, this device is for you.  Cell phones certainly provide all of that, but clearly with a smaller screen.  The 7" HD screen is beautiful and has not much of any glare issues.  Streaming videos and music is simple. The audio, as you've read everywhere else, is amazing, relative to all other portable devices of this nature.  For $200, you're getting a lot.  People will compare this to the iPad, which I cannot do as I don't own one, but I'd imagine that if you want to do more with a tablet, spend the extra $300+ and get an iPad, otherwise, if what I listed is all that you're looking for, don't spend the extra money and buy the Kindle Fire HD 7".  The concept of value is different from person to person, so be objective when comparing this device with the iPad (and other tablets) and just know what you're looking for and what you can afford.  The pros and cons from other reviews are pretty accurate, for the most part with there being some exceptions, so I wont bore you with what I see as pros and cons, but as they say, where there's smoke, there's fire.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: The Doctor
Reviews.Content: The wife loves it, it makes her happy so it keeps me happy. I would say for the price you can't go wrong :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD, 16G
Reviews.Author: S. King "It takes time and pressure to make a...
Reviews.Content: With so many tablet devices on the market, it can be next to impossible to make an informed decision. I made the decision to "upgrade" to this newest kindle because I also have the first Kindle Fire, but wanted better sound quality, more storage, and to be able to view it outside. Since I greedily pried it out of it's cozy and nicely constructed package? I have not stopped using it. Other reviewers are much more eloquent than I about all the technical "stuff"; and "spot on" in giving the HD praise about sound quality and visual crispness. Amazon design team has done a remarkable job creating this device! I have had the opportunity to compare this to the iPad 2.. and my kindle wins hands down. Or.. 2 thumbs up. ; ) In fact, I have given my older Kindle Fire away- chocked full of books and games. As much as I use this device for reading, playing games, watching movies, and.. yes, purchasing items from Amazon; I wish I could give it a 5 star rating. However, there is one design flaw that irritates me every time I am charging my device,, so I am mentioning it in this review. As others have mentioned, the power button is flush to the bottom of the device (probably because of the numerous complaints about the first model KF button getting inadvertently pushed off). I like this power button design.. but! I wish there was an indicator light on the power button to let me know when/ if device is charged. The battery icon in upper right corner is hard to estimate exactly how well charged the device is, so I downloaded the "round circle number" application to remedy this. Otherwise I would happily give this the superb rating it.. almost deserves. Also, if you are on a budget and find the price of the official protective case a bit too much? I recommend the "roocase origami fold" as I have been using since day 1 of arrival for my HD Fire, and it works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: katie11
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed the item.  Small enough to fit in my purse, easy to use, easy to transfer items from my old kindle to the new one.  The one and only complaint I have with the item - it constantly dropped the connection to my internet - even while in my own den.  I hope this was just a defective unit and it was returned.  The stylus worked great with the item.  I will buy another kindle fire hd

Reviews.Title: A good pick for 7" tablet
Reviews.Author: DesignWonk "R.M."
Reviews.Content: Have had this for about a week.  Was a little hesitant to buy it before the iPad mini specs were announced but am very happy with my choice.  The screen is amazing (compare to iPad mini specs).  On  the negative side, it is locked into Amazon content, but I have had a prime membership for a while now.  Nice use of STANDARD connections.  Can watch my Amazon content while on the road by connecting the HDMI port to a flat panel TV.  Good battery life.  Overall quite happy.

Reviews.Title: My First Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Almonimymoni
Reviews.Content: I have always debated which electronic product would best fit my needs. When the Kindle Fire HD was introduced with out a hesitation I knew this would be my foundation to my ultimate get away (of course in a tablet). Books, Movies, Music, Web and Email was all in one. I was able to download books, watch millions of movies, and get my emails on my kindle. Since I deployed frequently the Skype function was part of the icing on my cake. This 7 in gadget which did it all was by far the most advanced, best friend I could ever have.

Reviews.Title: new Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: nanajan "nanajan"
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HD 7".  It is easy to use and to find free books to have on there.  I love that I can access my email at anytime/place.

Reviews.Title: love my kindle fire hd
Reviews.Author: Inferno
Reviews.Content: I love this little tablet. Fast/seamless access to Amazon video (as expected), ebooks, improved silk browser, and the IMDb x-ray feature is awesome.. lots of hardware at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: LilBit10
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with new fire. Pictures and print are very bright . Works fast and enjoy using cloud.  My granddaughters like games on it .

Reviews.Title: fire
Reviews.Author: ladybug
Reviews.Content: love it.wish it had a camera :(unless i just am not figuring it out. any suggestions please comment. must charge more often than the kindle reader thats kind of a bummer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent upgrade to the original Fire
Reviews.Author: Abdullah Jibaly
Reviews.Content: The HD screen looks great, colors are vibrant, and the sound is loud and crisp. There's a ton of content available through Amazon's services. My kids love it.

Reviews.Title: exceptional product
Reviews.Author: hulamercedes
Reviews.Content: Love my tablet. I can do almost everything from my kindle. I have had it a little over a month now and with the exception of a few problems with crackling in the speakers I would  recommend it. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Mostly Happy with Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: HQ29lgp4
Reviews.Content: This was the first Kindle I've bought, and I think it was a great value for the features it has.  I bought the smaller version, but the display is spectacular and the size is more than adequate. The speakers are surprisingly robust for such a small device, so watching movies with without headphones is no problem.  I have found the Kindle Fire HD to have easy navigation, and the preset links to the Amazon store are convenient.  For book reading, which is why I really wanted it, it's really great, although the screen glare is too much for outside reading unless you're in the shade.  The only thing I don't like is the built-in web application, which I think is a little buggy and doesn't display every web site as well as on a laptop or destop screen; I don't know how it would look on a bigger tablet.  There doesn't appear to be any other alternative app available yet for download, although I understand there may be some that are under development.  Overall, I like the product and would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: PSF
Reviews.Content: Sound, video, display and speed over the top and exceeded my expectations.  I was debating between an iPad but decided on the kindle and not only saved money, but I'm more than pleased with my decision.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle HD!
Reviews.Author: Aquaman
Reviews.Content: I've had my new Kindle Fire HD for a little over a month now and I really love it. I chose the 7" screen and I couldn't be happier with it. I take it on the train and have read several books already. It stores easily in my computer bag and the screen opens up to the last task I was doing when I closed it. I would recommend getting a case for it, just to protect it while traveling. Make sure to get a case made for the new model, as it has to accommodate the speakers on each side. The sound is terrific from the speakers by the way, though I've yet to buy a pair of earphones, which is next on my list. Movies and videos look beautiful on the HD screen. Service from Amazon has also been great! Book, music and movie downloads are fast. I've also gotten many free MP3 downloads and discounts from them and other nice offers and promotions as well sent through the Kindle. If your looking for a personal entertainment tablet, great selection of books, music and videos, then the Kindle Fire HD would definately be the one I would recommend!

Reviews.Title: Bob's Book
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Carter "Toy Provider"
Reviews.Content: This is my second Fire.  They are great, do everything I want them to do.  They go with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Day
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love my new kindle fire!  It is easy to use, very clear and easy to read.  I have downloaded several books and that is a snap!  I am so glad I waited until the new kindle fire came out!  Very happy!  Great product!

Reviews.Title: Love my Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The Fire HD is my third Kindle and I have been very satisfied with all three. I am a recently retired 70 year old male. When not in my wood shop, I am using the Fire HD for checking e-mail, surfing the internet, playing games or reading. It has all the features I need or want. At $199 plus my Prime membership, it's a complete package. I had a few small problems right after I got it, but all where handled promptly by Kindle support.

Reviews.Title: Loving the new Kindle HD
Reviews.Author: Renee Herring
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire HD. I was surprised how much I can do with it. It can do almost anything a computer can do. It's so convenient, I don't know how I managed without it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: E Reader
Reviews.Content: I am very please with this product.  I had recently order the Kindle Fire and within 30 days the Fire HD came outand customer service allowed me to return the Fire and order the Fire HD with refund. I  like that the Fire HD has an antiglare screen unlike the Fire had.  I do wish the battery would last longer like my second generation Kindledoes.  The battery life is much to short and needs to be extended this is the only thing I dislike about the Fire HD.  Over all it is an excellent product and I am very satisfied with it and would recommend it to everyone

Reviews.Title: enjoys to the fullest
Reviews.Author: BFTL
Reviews.Content: We own an iPad as well as a Kindle and I am very pleased with the Fire HD.  It does everything I want and more with wonderful battery life.  Nice size and the screen makes for an excellent format for reading.  So glad I bought it instead of another iPad.

Reviews.Title: What an improvement!
Reviews.Author: kbraven
Reviews.Content: As an owner of a second edition kindle I was pleasantly surprised as to how nice the new Fire is.  To be able to see things in color reminds me of the first time I saw a color TV when I was a kid.  I use it mostly for reading a newspaper subscription and also reading some books. Controls are easy to use and I just wish the battery had more life to it.  I get about 10 hours of reading before having to recharge.  I like the compact size.  I'm still learning all that the Fire will do; but after owning it for a few weeks I am very pleased.  Remember to get the extra battery charger with it!

Reviews.Title: Amazing, wonderful,  love it.
Reviews.Author: M Corsoniti
Reviews.Content: I am so thrilled with my new Kindle Fire HD. I am going to Europe and it will be wonderful to be able to skype my family at home and not have to lug my computer with me. I love everything about it. I thought the screen would be difficult to read outdoors but it was just as good as my original Kindle. So happy to have it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Hooked on Amazon
Reviews.Content: Just love my new Kindle Fire HD. Wonderful quality for fabulous price. Great HD picture quality. Love the sound. Truly enjoy watching movies on it.

Reviews.Title: Great for Entertainment (movies, books, etc..) Lacks Big Time in Game Apps
Reviews.Author: Moss
Reviews.Content: The tablet is great if you have a Amazon Prime, otherwise I would not buy the tablet (I have Amazon Prime)and buy another tablet. The screen size is perfect, great resolution, light, and easy to navigate. What it lacks in tremendously is in game apps. The tablet does not allow you to get games on Google Play, it even goes as far as to block/lock you out from Google Play. Yet if the games were on Amazon Apps store it won't be a problem, but they even lack the number #1 games like Dark Summoners, Blood Brothers, Legend of the Cryptids, and Elder Sign: Omens. Hopefully Amazon App Store will soon get some top games, otherwise this will be the last time most people will buy the tablet.

Reviews.Title: My kindle good and bad.
Reviews.Author: Roger S
Reviews.Content: I am new to this type of screen. So it has been a learning process. Some controls I still do not know their purpose like X Ray. I found it generally easy to use except when I just started to use it, some controls didn't appear when I swipped like I thought it should work. Due to my inexperence I assumed it was something I was doing. Turns out it was just being difficult but started working properly when I got it to work the first time. The other glitch was first book I opened it and it jumped back and forth between two pages rapidly. As with any computer I shut it down and restarted with no more problems. My only big complaint is if in a movie you accidently hit the time line bar at the bottom of the screen it looses its place and it is damn hard to get back to where you were. I have managed to do this several times. With books because I tend to listen to books and follow reading. The time line at the bottom of the screen blocks the text. I tried to get it to close while playing and have been unable. The same problem has happened with the time line bar as with movies of accidently hitting it. The books are easier to get back to where you were by flipping pages. I do like it. I love the quality of the picture. I would recomend developing clip on shell ears to send the sound toward the user instead of away. I wouldn't mind an instruction manual either in writing or on line with explanations of every function. Really what is X RAY???

Reviews.Title: Improvements Everywhere!
Reviews.Author: Connie S. Litrenta
Reviews.Content: Where to start. I love this new version of the Fire. They've imroved just about every area of the original. So, to make this a little easier to read, I'll just do it in list format.GOOD1. Better display2. Thinner and lighter (very good)3. Front facing camera4. Bluetooth5. New cover available for the Fire will turn the screen on and off as you open/close cover6. HUGE improvement on speakers7. Available mini HDMI connector8. WiFi works better with the device. Old Fire would NOT download content as it arrived unless it was "awake". This one seems to be much better9. Hardware volume buttons10. More memory (16GB)NOT SO GOOD1.  Camera can only be used for Skype. Says Evernote can use it but haven't figured it out2.  Some might say the ads but I have no problem with it. They are done so that it doesn't detract from the Fire and they're geared toward the owner. Seems unobtrusive to me and at any rate, you can choose to pay Amizon $15 to have them turned off. I actually like them so I'll keep them.3.  Doesn't include the power component that plugs into the wall. You really don't need this if you have one from something else as it does come with the USB cable. I chose to buy it ($20).Advice to other reviewers: STOP complaining about how it's so tied to Amazon. It's a Kindle for pete's sake! The whole idea is to be tied to Amazon. Anyone who has ever had a Kindle knows that. Just as the Nook is tied to Barnes and Noble and iPad is tied to Apple. Get over it.  STOP comparing it to the iPad and to some extent the Nexus 7. Again, this is a KINDLE. Many of the things low reviewers are complaining about are things that are obviously going to be the case. of course Amazon wants to put ads on these devices. THAT is how they make their money, not the device itself. A lot of people actually like them. If you don't, pay your $15 and be done with it. It isn't going to have a rear facing camera or GPS. Again, IT'S A KINDLE! It wasn't designed to be a full fledged table but a multimedia consumption device. As such it does very well. And for $200, it more than delivers.

Reviews.Title: Initial problem with registration, but IT REDEEMS ITSELF!
Reviews.Author: Raymond H. Zografos Jr
Reviews.Content: What a beautiful tablet! I am in love. At first, I couldn't register - it said I had to call Kindle Support. Once they helped me to get registered, the tablet TOOK MY BREATH AWAY! Easy to use, breathtaking near-retina display, and an affordable price. You're selling YOURSELF short if you don't get one of these for yourself!I WOULD LIKE TO DEBUNK TWO FALSE POPULAR STATEMENTS: 1) you can take pictures AND video with the Kindle Fire HD in the Facebook app, AND you can watch videos on YouTube :)Brett

Reviews.Title: Theres a lot they dont tell you about this thing. Like you have to pay extra to get an app in order to use the camera.
Reviews.Author: I Got Stuck "I GOT STUCK"
Reviews.Content: Ive never heard of it comes with and HD camera but in order to use it you have to pay a buck to download an app in order to use it.. Thats a scam and its just plain wrong! They brag this thing up but they fail to tell you that in order to really enjoy it you have to downoad all the extra apps, each of them cost money... I think that kind of stuff should be fully disclosed. Failure to do so in my opinion is illegal and is a scam.. If I knew then what I know now, I'd never of order this.. Over rated, over priced and to pay to get apps to use it is just wrong!

Reviews.Title: Proud owner of Kindle Fire HD! WOOT!
Reviews.Author: Laura Hughes
Reviews.Content: LOVE MY KINDLE FIRE HD! So here is my review on my new toy!PROS:1. Super fast WiFi! Not sure how people are having issues with it because I haven't!2. Vibrant Screen/Color/Amazing Picture Quality3. Sound is amazing! Gaming, movies, etc.4. Device is sleek, slim, easy to handle.5. Chat applications work great (IE: Skype, KIK, Yahoo, Wireclub, AIM)6. Cloud sync uploaded all of my previous books from my Kindle applications (Windows 8X & Desktop applications)7. Sturdy and durable. Have two cats already it's been knocked off my nightstand a few times, doing great!8. Love that you can purchase the warranty along with the HD from SquareTrade.CONS (Very Minor):1. Definitely the on screen keyboard. Would like to change this out due to it completely trying to take over my whole screen. What's with the Jitterbug dinner plate sizing for each key? If you don't know what reference I am pointing to look up the Jitterbug phone. The buttons are like font size 72. Not sure how to resize the onscreen keyboard. Not even sure if that is an option at this point. Went and googled to see if it was didn't find much. Also no resize is available in the settings tab.2. (See #1) Id like to be able to resize and adjust my font overall. Not just for the books you download. Seems there is only an option for books.3. Silk is slow and my screen will stick sometimes. Silk browsing is for basic needs but I keep having to remind myself that I need to slow down with the demands and remember this is not my desktop. The Kindle is not a replacement for a desktop, laptop or even an iPad. It's a fun multi-media machine for people who are constantly on the go like jet-setters.The fact that anyone is even comparing it to an iPad (which I have seen on the reviews) isn't really fair to Kindle. I see some of the reviews yet again later today and people are still expecting it to function like a desktop. Come on people!4. More privacy options. Meh. Im the only one who handles my Kindle but there are some people who like to be "hands on" with your devices and fun toys. Of course being that I am territorial I hardly let anyone touch my precious gadgets! MY PRECIOUS!!!! *Runs off coveting said sacred items*5. Would like a way to organize my books but eh really isn't a must have. Just more over a suggestion.Personal complaint about myself: How come I always miss the awesome sales on the Kindle Fire HD? I bought it around Father's Day and noticed the day I bought it, the day after was a $20 markdown! Then today I get on to do a review and it's $30 off! DAMN IT! *Fist in air* Ah well. C'est la vie!I will say this is a must for mom's. I can see why the appeal is so great for people with kids. Talk about a life saver for those long car trips, day's at the beach, grandparents house, dinners, etc. Not a mom yet but if I was Id definitely have at least two around at all times to keep the kids from going bananas.If anyone has any answers to #1 & 2 on my Cons list let me know! Id love to get this squared away. Otherwise my cons are very minimal. I really, really like the Kindle Fire HD. Im a huge fan of all the books and media Amazon has made available. With that said I just became a member of Amazon Prime. About to watch my first movie and I can tell you right now I'm super excited! I will put an update once I am done with the movie as far as the quality for you reviewers.UPDATE 6/30/13 - Just watched my first movie. Picture and quality was spectacular! LOVE MY KINDLE!!! AMAZON YOU ROCK!

Reviews.Title: Battery life under 3.75 hours!!!
Reviews.Author: Jerry the HAWK "Scarebear"
Reviews.Content: Amazon quotes 11 hours use on batteries....I get well under 4 hours with a full charge,The techs just made excuses about screen brightness,apps running in background,etc....I just opened the box yesterday and have like only 2 game apps  and my Entertainment Weekly on it...This is really unacceptable....Its going back with that $20.00 charger and case!!

Reviews.Title: 3 Stars Because The Android Market Is Blocked
Reviews.Author: Nicholas
Reviews.Content: The hardware is great for the price. It isn't just a matter of "You get what you pay for." Amazon really tried to give you the best tablet for the price. They barely broke even selling it. The advertisement concept is also brilliant and will make them money.However, Amazon blocked the Android market, so access to apps is limited. That was not at all brilliant.

Reviews.Title: Great device....IF you only plan on using it as an E-reader
Reviews.Author: Ww
Reviews.Content: I've always loved the Kindle, so I thought I couldn't go wrong with the Kindle Fire HD...boy was I wrong. It is great as an E-reader and has the majority of Apps I use so no complaints there. However, the browser SUCKS! 9 times out of 10 when I try going to a site it'll continuously "load" and I'll get the error that it's "stopped working" and I'll have to shut down my device and hope that the browser works after reboot...sometimes it does, most times not. In my opinion, with similarly equivalent items both system and price wise....the Kindle Fire HD would no longer be my first choice.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Lucy N. Parker
Reviews.Content: I chose this item because I have really enjoyed my previous Kindle.  I also appreciate the ease in which I can download book purchases.My only hesitation is that it has been really hard for me to learn how to use it.  I would really like to have a booklet of directions with the item.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD is Great but...
Reviews.Author: sandy matzek
Reviews.Content: We just purchased in the last 10 days. Soon after receipt, we see that there is a discount available to AARP member of $20. We are AARP members. There should be some indication when making a purchase if certain discounts apply. Not sure if this is the correct venue to address this issue but I can not seem to find a way to contact Amazon. Will keep looking.S. Matzek

Reviews.Title: Far from impressed thus far
Reviews.Author: Pearl A. Maxey
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother since she always plays on my iPad 2 when she comes to visit.  She just wanted something to watch youtube videos on crocheting, and play angry birds.  I thought this would be perfect for that purpose, and be half the cost of an iPad.  It arrived yesterday, I charged it all night, and have now installed a few apps.  Neither HBO go, Youtube, or Netflix will play.  They get stuck loading the movie  then just say that they aren't responding.  So far, the kindle HD seems very buggy. I think I'm going to have to return this and just get her an ipad since the apps she would use keep refusing to respond.  I wanted something user friendly, because of her age, not frustrating.  What a disappointment...

Reviews.Title: very disappointing.....
Reviews.Author: Wesley Sowers
Reviews.Content: take one of the best pieces of hardware currently available, then impose strict limits on its capabilities = greed. Amazon makes it very clear, its their way, or the highway.... not exactly forward thinking if you ask me. then to advertise it as "the best" when it wont even stream a photo from another PC, like EVERY other tablet in my collection. definitely making Kindle the odd ball. doesnt exactly qualify as high-tech in my home, if it cant do a simple task like show my neighbor a photo streamed from my main tower pc.i have already stopped shopping at the #1 general goods store in the U.S. for this same type of business practice, i do not recommend continuing down a road where a retailer makes is VERY CLEAR that they only care about money...i couldn't even stream media from my local network (i.e. another PC in my home) because kindle will only let me stream from a cloud drive service! (which costs money) thats not even practical as i like to use my devices when there is no internet connection! no speedtest.net??? a lot of my favorite android apps and technologies have been intentionally averted from this device interface and i am very disappointed in this device i was surely expecting more... shame is in order.

Reviews.Title: Immensely practical
Reviews.Author: Dr. Conspiracy
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD 7" is a product that has a feature set at a price point that is immensely practical.The main thing I do with my Kindle Fire HD is read books and documents, and that is something it does superbly. I installed the "Send to Kindle" program on my desktop and I can just right click a file and pick "Send to Kindle." The document is delivered by WiFi, no cable required. My Word documents are automatically converted to Kindle format, and I can copy PDF files and pictures too. There are so many ways to manage content on and off the device, in memory or in the cloud, that one could be overloaded with options.Of course, buying eBooks from Amazon and getting them delivered to the Kindle is trivially simple and fast, but many public libraries will let you check out eBooks for free, sometimes through Amazon, on your Kindle. Add to that many other free content sources like the Internet Archive and Project Gutenberg.I hook an HDMI cable from the Kindle to my HD TV and stream movies in HD right to the TV (or do it on my lap without a TV). I also sometimes browse the web that way when I want to show my wife some cool YouTube video or a photo.I also find the Kindle Fire HD just fine for browsing the Internet, reading email, sharing photos, and carrying documents around to meetings. It's just a great way to make my content portable. It's just the right size to carry around without getting in the way.Here are some suggestions to get more out of your Kindle Fire HD:1. Get the free ES File Explorer. This let you navigate your files and directories. One drawback to the Kindle is that there are so many ways to deal with content; you might not know whether something is a download or a book or a document. You can find it, install it, play it or view it with a click in ES File Explorer.2. The Dropbox app is one easy way to make your content portable, and share it on your smart phone, Kindle and PC. Once installed, you can go to web sites like Project Gutenberg and click on a Dropbox icon to move a book automatically to your devices.3. Check out dedicated apps for your common online activities: WordPress, Wikipedia, Facebook, Netflix, Twitter.4. Wireless headphones such as Creative Labs WP-300 Wireless Bluetooth Heaphones are great for watching movies without disturbing anyone.5. A great tool is the free PC program called Calibre that can convert content between different publishing formats. If you have content in a format that the Kindle doesn't support natively, chances are that Calibre can convert it (especially effective converting ePub) for the Kindle (or that you can find a free Kindle app that supports the format natively). Calibre can also maintain a library of content on your PC and your Kindle.Just about my only unfixable complaint is that it has no external storage. A micro SD card slot would have been just so nice. I hope that the PDF reader will be updated to support newer compression standards for scanned documents. It would be great if the Silk browser supported the Adobe Flash plug-in, and it would really be nice if one had access to the larger Android marketplace without hacking the system.I've bought a lot of gadgets since my first computer with 16K of memory. Some got used every day and some gather dust. The Kindle Fire HD 7" is clearly one of my best investments.

Reviews.Title: Surpasses The "Glorious" iPad byfar!
Reviews.Author: Mathew Lombardo
Reviews.Content: I own the Kindle Fire HD 7". i used to have the iPad 2 and i must say the switch was a good move. The kindle fire HD is just the fun, processing power, usefulness, and great help of the ipad in a more compact, much cheaper form.specifically, here is my opinion of the features.Look and feelThe device is light and the rubber/polycarbon/whatever (i dont know what the material is called)feels very comfortable to hold and has some grip to it. i like the sleek black and slender design of the device, but its a little annoying when trying to find the wake/sleep button. after a while you get used to it.Screenthe HD in kindle fire HD is no lie. pictures are beautiful, watching movies in Hd in a small package is AWESOME and the sensitivity from touch is excellent. i even have a thick screen protector on and notice no differene in the touch reaction.SoundDOLBY AUDIO IS A STAND ALONE FEATURE. the sound out of any handheld device speaker is usually not much to brag about, and even less for sound quality, unless you have a kindle fire Hd. the audio out of this device from music and video is exemplary, and definitely top of the list.SpeedInternet browsing is fast and the fact that the device organizes AND stores your most visited sites is a nifty featurette. i especially liked how it only took about 25 minutes to download a full movie from the store DIRECTLY to the device. my connection speed for my internet may have a bit of credit there, but still, its fast.Apps, entertainment, and productivityof course, 1/3 of the appeal of a tablet device is for mobile games, movies, apps, shows, and entertainment in many forms. while the amazon store does have the most popular and many of its own apps and games, the choices and selection is not as immense as the itunes store. however there are still plenty of free apps that are great and many more paid ones that are even better.Reading (duh)Kindles started as devices witht the sole purpose of storing dozens of books in one thin package. i read on both devices i owned, and definitely preferred the kindle fire HD's reading capability over the iPad's. if connected to the internet, many books will have pre-highlighted sentences and exerpts. These features are CRUCIAL to a student in highschool or college, since you can save those pages, find a certain quote, or reread important pieces.Performanceone major concern about tablet computers and smart devices is their technological capability. battery life on the Kindle Fire HD is pretty average to most others, but it can be optimized with the correct settings for a couple extra hours. it doesnt take too long to power on either, which is another bonus.CustomizationThe only major downside to this device is that it has extremely minimal options for personalization, excluding the addition of a case. There are 3 customization features this device has currently known to me. 1) you can choose to have advertisements as a lockscreen background  2)You can have a series of decorative pictures as your lockscreen background  3) "(Your name's Kindle is displayed in the top left corner of the homescreen. there isnt any way to choose your own background picture or maybe change the internal color scheme. disappointed here.Overall ImpressionAll things considered, the 7" Kindle Fire HD is a marvelous device with loads of features, making it a top contender as one of the best tablet devices currently available. in comparison to the iPad, my opinion leads toward the kindle. Personal reccomendations for accessories: The amazon Kindle fire hd standing leather case(advertised along with the device). It's a durable case that adds great protection, and its also designed to wake the kindle when the case is opened, and make it sleep when you close the lid. also, i recommend the Armorsuit Military shield screen protector. its not as easy to put on as other screen protectors, but i feel like i installed a force field generator. this thing absorbs impact and scratches, and over time the minor-medium scratches will disappear.i reccomend the Kindle Fire Hd 7"!! and im sure that the 8.9" Kindle Fire is just as good, with a bigger screen and possible 4G connection.

Reviews.Title: Not for International Customers
Reviews.Author: Vidia Rampersad "Vee"
Reviews.Content: If you do not live in the US then please read the restrictions before buying and go to Kindle Support and read up the section on travelling outside of the US.For all the wonderful features the Kindle Fire HD may have, you will not be able to experience most of them as you cannot buy or access music, games, apps or most everything else besides books.I am very disappointed, but it is my fault for only reading the raving reviews and not the notification about using outside of the US up there next to 'In Stock'.

Reviews.Title: Should I get my kids the iPad or Kindle HD??
Reviews.Author: Greenband
Reviews.Content: Some of you are probably trying to decide whether or not to buy your kid(s) an iPad (or iPad Mini) versus the 7" Kindle HD.  Other reviewers have done a fantastic job of feature comparisons already, so this review will be subjective based on kid feedback.I've had every generation iPad for myself personally and my kids have used them all in addition to an iTouch.  For myself, I would never switch out my iPad 3 for a Kindle Fire.  The power/volume placement, weird screen rotations by apps, strange settings, difficulty sharing accounts on the same device, app selection for business, etc. make the Kindle Fire not a fit for me.  The top of the line iPad is a much superior device to Kindle Fire HD.  However, the iPad cost hundreds of dollars more and most casual users (consuming personal content, games, video, etc.) will never care about the differences.My kids care about 3 items in order of priority:* Games* Reading books* Occasional web browsingAfter lots of research I bought 2 7" Kindle Fire HD devices instead of iPads.  The simple verdict - my kids love the devices and won't touch the iTouch or iPad devices lying around.  For younger kids (5-12), the 7" size is perfect, screen is great, and app selection is fine.  The iPad is a superior device with a MUCH better app store, but they just don't care.  For playing games, reading, and browsing the Kindle Fire does a great job at the price point.I have 2 EXTREMELY happy kids and saved a lot of money versus the Apple options.

Reviews.Title: Good product, poor software and poor ability to organize
Reviews.Author: Nature Cure "docpluta"
Reviews.Content: Well,I find this device- almost acceptable.
