Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE SERVICE
Reviews.Author: melissa richard
Reviews.Content: It was a Christmas gift for my mother. It only had 1gb of the 16 it was supposed to have available. Plus, it was supposed to have the newest updates installed and that wasn't the case. She called and you guys argued and told her that it wasn't possible for her Kindle to be that short on memory. When your customer service rep remote checked it, she discovered that my mother wasn't lying. She was sent a new Kindle to only have the exact same problems again. Terrible, terrible service. She did the factory reboot in order to fix it. She had to hook it up by USB to her computer to update it. Are you kidding me? I will NEVER buy as much as a toothpick from you again.

Reviews.Title: What was amazing was they returned the defective one without question
Reviews.Author: R. Grider
Reviews.Content: I bought two refurbished Kindles for my kids. One was defective and wouldn't stay on, the other was fine. Even after the thirty day warrantee they accepted and replaced the defective one, no questions asked. This kind of service is why I will keep coming back to Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Would buy it again
Reviews.Author: gary m nichols
Reviews.Content: Great video display and nice touch screen.  I like the backlit screen for reading books and the option of backgrounds.  I would give 5 stars but it is still a little shy in the available apps dept.

Reviews.Title: Kindle replacement
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire was replaced with Kindle Fire HD when original unit cease.d functioning. Working with Amazon team to replace the unit  was very easy and the person I contacted was very knowledgable and helpful

Reviews.Title: Noticing a pattern,  many complaints around the one year marker
Reviews.Author: Laura DeLorme
Reviews.Content: Lauradel12-I purchased the kindle fire hd in Dec 2012.  There were minor glitches around July 2013.  This December the kindle began shutting down on it's own.  The problem progressed throughout the month.  I called customer service in early January 2014.  I am now on my 5th and final phone call to attempt to fix the problem.  Each call I am asked to repeat the same troubleshooting steps.  On call 4, the rep had me repeat the steps again, then put me on hold for 5 minutes or so, and finally said I will call you in an hour.  Call never came,  I called tonight for my 5th and final call, the rep informed me that the one year warranty has just expired and unfortunately all they can do is have an engineer call me in the next 24-48 hours.  I won't hold my breath.  Do yourself a favor and buy an iPad. I have had one for almost 4 years, never one issue.  We bought the kindle for our son thinking it was a good value,  now we are stuck with a $200 tablet that doesn't work,  so the $150 we saved on the iPad mini will now cost us extra!  Very disappointed with this product!

Reviews.Title: Bummer with the Warehouse Deals
Reviews.Author: Terri Musgrave "Terri"
Reviews.Content: We love our Kindles... we have quite a few of them.  But we purchased two kindles from the warehouse deals and both of the batteries were shot, so my kids have to sit with them plugged into the wall.  They can't unplug them or they die pretty instantly.  Even when they show a full battery life.  They still die!  Very disappointed that there isn't some sort of repair service.  Even with these items not having a warranty, Amazon offers no way of getting them fixed even if you are willing to pay for the repair yourself.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Heathnae
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad that my 10 year old daughter always wants to play with. I decided to get her this kindle for Christmas. Even though it says "refurbished" you would never know it. It came packaged like it was brand new...and my daughter loves it!

Reviews.Title: Not working
Reviews.Author: shiva sadegh
Reviews.Content: This kindle was great in the beginning but then it died and there no way to figure out what is going on. Even worse than that, i got this for my daughter and now she can't talk to customer service about it because I am the one who purchased it?  That is not right.

Reviews.Title: Worked perfectly for 9 months
Reviews.Author: cyns2 "Cynthia"
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved her kindle for about 9 months.  It began to start crashing and randomly turning off.  I know that the warranty lasts for 12 months but the problem did not start happening with much frequency until around 13 months.  I guess they build them to last as long as the warranty.  At 10 months I tried all of the trouble shooting ideas on the website and they seemed to help.  At 14 months, I called with the same problem and did a factory reset and it helped again.  Today at 14 1/2 months, amazon can not help me because I am out of warranty.  I was not looking for a free device, I just wanted ours fixed.  They do not repair kindles, either you get a replacement while under warranty or you get a small ($30ish) price break on the purchase of a new one.  I hate that a $200+ product only lasts a year with normal wear.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Product
Reviews.Author: Amiri Sanders
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my mother.  The product was delivered in minimum time.  She enjoys how light weight the ease in using.  I would recommend this prodcut to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Number 4 replacement..Need I say more?
Reviews.Author: Woman in a Strange Land
Reviews.Content: My credit card gets charged about $200.00 every time I have had to replace this unit. I could have purchased a fully loaded I-pad mini at the same time I purchased my first Kindle Fire HD. I purchased my Kindle Fire HD to replace my Kindle Fire (First generation) which actually still works without any problems. This model works for a few months and then an internal failure occurs. My first unit wouldn't keep a charge, my second unit had a volume malfunction, my third unit developed a problem loading pages and music..I just received this 4th unit yesterday and I haven't opened the box yet. Why?? Because I perceive it will work very well, I'll be very satisfied and as soon as I am in my comfort zone using it...bam! a problem will occur. I just do not know what to do here...It's the first time I have experienced such a lack of confidence in an Amazon product.

Reviews.Title: Poor navigation!
Reviews.Author: MERand
Reviews.Content: The settings setting is difficult to get to.  The home page on the UI is too busy and needs to be simplified.  There is no file structure to organize your books or to keep track of what you have read.  Very little customizability.  (I really wish I could get rid of the carousel.)  Also, I accidentally hit the voice guide and spent almost two hours to turn in off.

Reviews.Title: Amazon dropped the ball.
Reviews.Author: S. Rattray "GOD BLESS!!!"
Reviews.Content: Amazon is usually pretty good at customer service. This time they really dropped the ball. The replacement kindle fire hd stopped working after about 30 days. So far in the last 3 months we have had to replace all of our kindle, for various reasons (freezing, battery errors, just stopped working), I was willing to pay the 30 dollar difference to upgrade to the hdx just hoping that I would not have to go through this whole process again. For the 4th time. The online chat supervisor was total unwilling to help. This in addition to the fact that I was one of the customers that did not get my Christmas order on time. This whole ordeal has me second guessing my future ordering, especially since Best Buy will now match Amazon pricing.

Reviews.Title: A simple version of Android and good tablet.
Reviews.Author: Sean Gately "Book Review"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mother-in-law because I thought the simple user interface of the Kindle Fire would be much easier to consume than the Nexus.On first impressions the device is okay and acceptable in every way. The build feels solid and heavy in a good way, the back is wrapped in great textured coating making if feel less likely to slip, and the bezel and glass look good. The rocker button for volume and on/off are conveniently located on the side, and it has two inputs for Micro USB and a very convenient Micro HDMI output.Start up and registration is simple if your a prime member, and downloading apps although severely limited is easy. I had the original kindle fire and sold it because I couldn't stand that the carousel added history for EVERYTHING, which cluttered the simple starting screen. It looks like Amazon is continuing the line with this which is unfortunate. Everything you open or read will be put in the carousel making it cluttered and unusable, but for my mother-in-laws expected use this will be fine.The software still feels buggy, and hesitates when scrolling and loading, making it feel much slower than it's competitors. Using the Silk browser is still just okay, it's still slow and the user experience hasn't really improved over the Kindle fire gen1. Moving music over from either the cloud or USB was fast and simple, and at refresh the album art was loaded.The picture is clear and beautiful and the stereo speakers are among the best sounding in any tablet I have ever used. Amazon did a bang up job on the audio, so much so I would love to use this tablet if they would ship a version with vanilla Android (not going to happen) with a completely add free experience.Here are some things to consider. This is a great simple tablet. It only comes with a USB cable and not a charger, so be aware of that. It does come with a front end camera but no camera app. I believe this is intended for Skype usage. Recommendations are pretty heavy but can be turned off in settings. Ads haven't been an issue so far but let's wait and see. It's a bit heavy to use as an e-reader so stick with the original Kindle.Now, if the iPad and some other tablets like the Nexus (although I question their first gen screen fracture problems) this tablet would rate much higher. I give it 3.5 stars, but since this is not an option it stays at 3. Price did not factor into the rating, or this would be at 4 stars.Overall this is a solid tablet that has its quirks and amazing qualities. I would suggest it for Amazon prime members, or anyone introducing someone to the world of tablets that doesn't want to buy an iPad. At $130 refurbished this is an absolute steal.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Durable
Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet without knowing a darn thing about tablets, apps, etc.  The Kindle Fire HD7 is very user-friendly, and I'm amazed with everything I can do with this.  The picture and sound put my laptop and computer to shame.  Apps, such as WatchESPN, proved invaluable.  I was able to view every game my small FBS alma mater played.  I got the smaller screen for the portability function; however, after buying my parents the HD 8.9, I will likely upgrade to the larger screen in the future.

Reviews.Title: Kindle fire is cool......
Reviews.Author: Malisa Rivera
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire is great when you don't want to use a computer. It does a lot of the same things which is less time consuming. Great for on the go.... more apps need to licenced to Amazon to make the experience even better.....

Reviews.Title: Best tablet ever!!
Reviews.Author: Randy Rowell
Reviews.Content: I have had my Kindle for a while now and must say that I could not be happier.  I have had to problems at all, I love all the free applications and books that Amazon offers, and reading on this is wonderful.  I never imagined I would read books on a tablet, but being able to adjust the fonts and the background color has really made my reading easier and more enjoyable.  I have started needing reading glasses for close up viewing, but with the Kindle, I don't need them.  I am able to connect this to the speakers on my treadmill and watch movies or TV shows while working out.  I can't imagine needing any other type of tablet as this one meets and exceeds all my needs.  And for the price, you know you can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD and FlashPlayer
Reviews.Author: Sharon Agan
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD. But I can not view some websites that use flashplayer. I tried to find downloads but no luck. I'm looking at a google tablet not. Come On Amazon been with you for the last 8 yrs have purchase a lot of things Please get a FlashPlayer for the Kindle Fire HD.Sharon

Reviews.Title: Just bought for my 5 year old for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Aaron Potier
Reviews.Content: I did my homework. I had previously given my old Toshiba tablet to my daughter when she was 4. She used it all the time. It just recently crashed and I needed to get another for her. I checked out the reviews online and they all pointed towards the Kindle Fire HD as one of the most kid friendly. I am doing this review on features only as she hasn't received it yet. I can say their are 3 things lacking that I would hope Kindle fixes with the next version. First, it has no camera. My daughter loved taking pics with her old tablet. A huge oversight. Second, Kindle 2nd Gen. had 16Gb internal. This new version has half of that. Internal space is important because once you download things overtime it causes these things to run slower. I wouldn't build one with less than 16GB. Thirdly, accessories. This brand is getting allot of press but stores aren't carrying enough of the accessories for it. Especially for the little ones.

Reviews.Title: Replacement did not work
Reviews.Author: Lora
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD 7" but it quit charging so I contacted Amazon. They were great and sent me a new one which I received in 2 days.  I opened it, plugged it in, and it won't turn on either.  So now they are sending me yet another replacement.  The customer service is wonderful, but I just want my Kindle to work!

Reviews.Title: best tablet!
Reviews.Author: lovemyamazon
Reviews.Content: We have six kindle fires now and love them all, some original, some hd, and various sizes. Refurbished seems just as nice as new we have purchased and will make for some happy kiddos come Xmas morning! The free time is perfect on these and amazon has the best service and warranty hands down! Love how many options there are and that the price is so much better than apple products, and the kindle is a way better choice for my family as we don't like the apple operating system and this is all android based so works well with what we already use!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Not So Kid Friendly and Hassle free
Reviews.Author: Adam D Williamson
Reviews.Content: The device itself is fine. I bought this for my 8 yr old. Amazon does have the Kindle FreeTime App for parental control. However Kindle FreeTime is soarly lacking. What I expected from a topnotch company like Amazon/Kindle is content profiles and apps streamlined for both parent use and/or kid use. Instead, when I bought this device for my child I now find out that it's going to be a hassle EVERY TIME just to ensure that she doesn't see my Amazon Contents and purchases instead of her own kid-friendly stuff. Here is why I say the Kindle has proven to be Not So Kid Friendly and Versatile:1 - (This is huge) Kindle FreeTime does not startup automatically. As a result, my child has to bring the device to an adult every time she starts it up so that we can safely navigate past the Adult themed Amazon account we have for buying everything from movies, music and Christmas presents for the kids to get her logged in to the safe Kindle FreeTime profile. For as much advertising out there that Kindles are great for kids, it seems like a no brainer to create a feature that automatically loads up the kids' stuff, not Mom and Dad's stuff at startup. Netflix finally figured it out...anytime now Amazon.2 - Content is what Kindle is really all about right? Want to let your child listen to MP3's in their Kindle FreeTime profile? Perhaps some Raffi MP3's or Kid's Bop? Sorry, they can't listen to MP3's in Kindle FreeTime. Ironically, I can choose which books, videos or apps to share from my Main (Adult) Amazon account, so if I want to share my Season 2 of Hell On Wheels or Steven King Thriller with the kiddos, the Kindle FreeTime app makes them just a button away. But sorry, Raffi is a No-Go. But wait, it gets worse - have a county library system that will loan you books for your voracious kid reader?...Guess what, in the Kindle freetime App, they can't read borrowed books! So again, my 8 year old ends has to be in my adult profile to read the borrowed book and some of the titles I read just aren't suitable for kids! Seriously Amazon?Hopefully, Amazon is working quickly on these issues (and I DON'T mean by only making it available on the newest Kindle device). In the meantime, unlike a Leapster, or some of the other Kid's Electronics devices, Kindle and Kindle FreeTime App is not so hassle free for Kid Friendly features.

Reviews.Title: Really like the Kindle Fire HD but now not so sure about longevity.
Reviews.Author: TriTroy
Reviews.Content: Note at end regarding a failure of one of the two kindles.  Have had these since Nov 2012.My wife an I really like these tablets.  We also have an iPad.  The Kindle is a really great size for portability.  I don't use it for movies though I think it would be good also.  We do use it for a number of apps like; calendar, email, games, etc.  Lots of apps avail from Amazon or through third parties using their apk files.  Google how to use with Kindle if you need to use these.  Great color and no issues ever with graphics.  Sound is fine but better of course with earphones.  Our kids use them almost every day as well so they've been pretty durable.  Never had an issue with the storage capacity yet on this 32GB unit.  I also use this for magazine and books.  I've had very good luck and like the reading experience on the Kindle Fire HD though others have indicated less than stellar experiences.  I suspect this was due to the publisher though, not doing a very good formatting job for the tablet.  I use the Kindle much more than the iPad due to the size and the number of free apps avail.  Overall, very happy with the Kindle Fire HD.Got two of these... his/hers.  Well after one year and 18 days, hers quit working.  Yep the warranty is one year.  She, was not happy.  Having already attempted a hard reset (more than once), the screen was blank and stayed that way.  Amazon tech basically had me do more resets with the power cord attached and not attached. No workee.  Thanks to Amazon though, they replaced it anyway.  Don't know for sure if the fact that we purchase a fair amount of stuff through Amazon and are Prime members and have been customers since 1998 made a difference but the rep did indicate this was a factor in the replacement after the warranty expiration.  Hope the other one doesn't fail anytime soon!

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle fire however....
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Coggins
Reviews.Content: I called in to see if a problem I'd been having with it was because of something I might have set by accident or if it was a problem with the kindle itself. The tech I spoke with told me you all would send me a new and to return the one I already had. Which is what we did. However, I am still having the same problem with this new one as I did with the old one. :/Also, I would like to suggest for future creations, it would be nice to have a way to organize my library of books into categories and be able to show that it has been read already.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Margaret J. Brown
Reviews.Content: Bought this Kindle in September 2012.  After a year the screen had lines on it from time to time.  It would work normally for a while then more lines.  As of December 2013, it no longer works at all.  This was my second Kindle.  My old Kindle reader is still working, but this Kindle Fire is not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Kindle
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Hampton dba Grandmas Do Sew Much
Reviews.Content: This device doesn't work properly. It has been replace with another that does the same thing. The sales person said there was rarely a problem with refurbished Kindles,so that is why I went with this purchase. Amazon is calling today to replace it again.  Maybe the third time will be the charm.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Christa
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this product. Just wanted it for reading and web search. The only thing I did not care for is that a wall charger has to be purchased.

Reviews.Title: Reply
Reviews.Author: eric muhammad
Reviews.Content: Extremely Disappointed... We had to trade in 4x's due to malfunction and I nope this doesn't happen again; was a waste of money..

Reviews.Title: Great tablet for your money!!Get rid of the ads amazon!!
Reviews.Author: Jason B.
Reviews.Content: I have a nook, ipad, kindle gen 1 and now I own two kindle fires gen2. Amazon knocked it outta the park on this handheld tablet! Very easy to use but does have a couple draw backs hate the button location on the device and hate the adds I wish I woulda bought no ads options on both a customer should NOT have to pay for this option amazon should be glad customers are buying there product instead of the other dozens of tablets on the market!!!! But other than that very user friendly. Have yet to purchase the new kindle fire xd to see if they improved all the improfections of the older kindle devices.

Reviews.Title: It is GREAT!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Carole Parsons
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle from Amazon and set up the account and have never regretted it.  When I had any trouble, I spoke with an American!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  The trouble was handled with quickness and ease.  I love getting my books and games so easily.  I like that I can loan out my books to my sister who loves to read also.  I started out with the first Kindle and now have the Fire which I love.  IT is great!!!!

Reviews.Title: go old school
Reviews.Author: cat-h
Reviews.Content: this is a very good kindle hd  for the price, and unlike the newer version, it has MIMO and a camera.  you have to upgrade to the next level to get that on the new kindle hd

Reviews.Title: Great tablet to travel with
Reviews.Author: Wolff Girl
Reviews.Content: I use my tablet daily and have never has a single problem with it. I would highly recommend it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good price, mobile entertainment, long battery..
Reviews.Author: Justin Chia
Reviews.Content: I just bought this on Black Friday. Everything is good, content delivery (the best), built quality, sound (good for the price I paid for), and display  except one issue which I will talk about later. Compare to other tablets, it looks really high quality at the same class and price. However, when it comes to typing on the soft keyboard.. it is a very horrible experience. Sometimes it works but most of the time, I have to re-type username/password and other short message for about 5-6 times. Last night, I tried to enter my password on one of the websites for more than 10 minutes. I couldn't believe Amazon hasn't fix that issue yet. It could be the hardware instead of the software so the fixing is pretty much mute.I just ordered Kindle Fire HDX 7" 2 days ago. I am hoping I am not having the same issue like this one. Compare to my Samsung Note II, my phablet is definitely better and there is no comparison.

Reviews.Title: As good as an iPad.
Reviews.Author: Harvey H. Willard
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad but you cannot read books on it in the sun. Kindle Fire is a lot cheaper and you can read in any light. I do not use all the features, but if you don't want to pay the price for an IPad or just want to use it for reading, you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Love it but sorting books should be custom
Reviews.Author: Crysalis Mariposa
Reviews.Content: I do love my kindle fire hd, and I have only one wish for improvement.  I purchased the kindle to change my library to a kindle library.  But I am not happy that my library is not under my control as to the sorting of it.  I would love it if I could arrange my books in my library the way I want them.  I have a number of authors who have multiple books in multiple series and I can't sort them.  I have to make a list on paper of each author and the order of their books and which series the books are in and then go into my library and search through it for the right book.  I want to be able to pick a book in a series in order without referring to anything but the kindle in my hand.  That being said, I love my kindle in spite to that. I love carrying my library in my hand.

Reviews.Title: AWSOME BEATS IPAD AND OTHER TABLETS
Reviews.Author: cycej
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is a great tablet for reading and playing games. It is really good for adults and children. If your not sure if you should buy it for your kid. Well you should, because you can set a time limit for your child to play on it and let them do certain things.

Reviews.Title: First one dead, second one scratched, third one crashes
Reviews.Author: S. Wilson
Reviews.Content: Dead out of the package!  Amazon says they'll send a replacement, but it doesn't give me all that much confidence that their quality control let a broken Kindle get shipped.Update:  the replacement Kindle had two small scratches on the screen!  Amazon had the audacity to blame the carrier for this!  The way this item is packaged there is NO WAY that this was the shipper's fault.  So they sent ANOTHER Kindle.So far the third time appears to be a charm.  I'm disgusted by Amazon blaming the shipper for the scratched screen.  I think they should give me a partial refund or some coins to buy apps since it took them THREE tries to send a decent tablet.I can't give a full review on the tablet.  Sad since it's mid December and I ordered this product BEFORE Thanksgiving!1-7-2014 This has to be some sort of JOKE!  I am now sending back my third Kindle for a fourth replacement.  This one won't hold a charge and crashes.  I am so disappointed and I have a child who is heartbroken because her Christmas present is already broken.  I honestly DO NOT recommend this product.  I should have gone with an iPad mini!

Reviews.Title: The best tablet for the price!
Reviews.Author: ahoffoss
Reviews.Content: Don't get me wrong, for most people this machine is a no brainer, but for me, it's just "OK".  That being said, I gave it 5 stars, because what it does do, it does REALLY well and for a SUPER cheap price!  For it, it was a gift.  My problem is, I don't read from eBooks.  I only read paper books.  There's just something about an actual book in my hand that I can't get from holding up a Kindle or any ereader, for that matter.  I can honestly say that the reader DOES do books good, because I did read at least 1 using this.  Also, the fact that Prime members have access to an unheard of amount of books they can "borrow" for free?!  For the people that are looking for the best tablet on the market for the price,....the KINDLE is just that!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Conrad
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HD. I thought I was getting a great price when I bought it (which I did get a great price).I just wish I would have waited a few days because the new Kindle Fire HDX came out with the camera facing in theoppisite (sp)  direction, etc.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Tom Dodd
Reviews.Content: After reading on my Fire the other night, I placed it on the nightstand like always.  It was charged, didn't fall or become damaged in any way, but wouldn't respond the next night.  I did a hard reset but all I get when I turn it on are a few lines on a gray screen which then goes black after 20 seconds or so.  I'm a Prime member and we have other Kindles in the house.  It's just gone out of warranty, of course, and I'm not going to buy another one.  My iPad and iPhones work great after 2 years of daily heavy use, but the Kindle's quality leaves me unimpressed. I wanted to express my displeasure with your product.

Reviews.Title: New Kindle
Reviews.Author: Terry Boyle
Reviews.Content: This kindle freezes almost every time I use it.  I can be doing something and  the screen freezes then after 30 seconds or so, the kindle shuts off and comes back on.  My old kindle never did that.  I don't know what the issue is, but it is very irritating.

Reviews.Title: Not bad!
Reviews.Author: CTW
Reviews.Content: Some apps don't work well,  nott sure if it's the Kindle or the app. But overall, I am happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: prblems
Reviews.Author: Chelsea Nicole morgan
Reviews.Content: because, there are many apps that are free at the google playstore but aren't for free for the amazon app store, i have also had many problems with my sound one time i had shut down my kindle with the sound all the way down and after puting it back to factory settings, it did it again then i got a new one delivered to me on wedenesday and i am already having problems with it its only been 5 days! and i didn't even open it till saturday. amazon, you can do better than that.

Reviews.Title: A worthy alternative for an iPad.
Reviews.Author: Zachary Thompson
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle Fire HD 32 GB, and I've had it for a year now. It was very annoying at first. The autocorrect was very tricky and annoying to get used to, then I found myself accidentally uninstalling apps when I meant to remove them from the carousel. In my opinion the way you close out apps is weird as I keep thinking the bottom option should be remove from carousel but it's actually uninstall. Amazon is real strict with what apps you use on your device so app selection is very limited. Facebook is the only major social site that actually has an app released for it. Twitter, youtube, and instagram don't have offical apps available so you'll have to use 3rd party apps for the web browser called silk. The biggest issue I have with the Fire HD is silk. Bottom line, it sucks. It's very buggy with alot of websites and doesn't perform well with flash players. Amazon is extremely strict with apps so you can't go install google chrome or any alternative. My favorite thing about the Kindle Fire is you can put your unprotected music on your device for listening to, and for backup incase your computer ever dies. Battery life is good, and book/video selection is outstanding. For th  price I would certainly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: Choclodite Lensman "Choclodite Lensman"
Reviews.Content: i bought this refurbished kindle after having a horrible experience with amazon customer service.  Do not buy from their warehouse deals-they will not honor warranty or replacement.  however , if you buy a refurbished kindle hd for a little more they will.  This screen is not yellow like my previous one.  i love this device!  highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Fire's Hot
Reviews.Author: Patrick
Reviews.Content: My wife loves this thing!  Works great.  Had some trouble streaming video, at first.  Turned out , it was the fault of our archaic router.

Reviews.Title: Great device for pleasure and work
Reviews.Author: NSlone
Reviews.Content: I use the Kindle as both a tool and for pleasure. I am an avid reader, but also when I am working on something, whether it is art, crochet, programming or designing a website, I like to have the Kindle next to be to read the 'how-to' of it. The Kindle can get kinda hot, which I don't think it should.The other reason is I can't seem to figure out how to set up folders for the various types of book.Other than that I absolutely love this Kindle!

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love My Kindle Fire!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: chrystine collins-blums
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire. I can't imagine why anyone would pay more for a different Android device.  I love my Kindle books, getting my email, access to the internet. I do not play games but my family members do and enjoy it.  If I am sick, I will watch a Prime movie or tv show.  The price can't be beat.  I try not to criticize others but I get so much for my money with my Kindle, including the camera and a charger that works on all the phones in the house with no special pricey adapters (cough cough) or can charge via the computer, why would anyone pay more? I just wish they were indestructible.....We won't talk about how many I have dropped in water, crushed in a hospital bed, etc...

Reviews.Title: Well Worth it
Reviews.Author: andre
Reviews.Content: Now that i had this for a few months i might as well rate this above five star. you could throw this at a wall and it will work like a beauty. The special offers never get in the way.-ProsDurable little tablet.Very good speed.Amazing Picture Display.Good capacity.Sound quality exceeds perfection.-ConsBattery life sucks when playing games but when reading is good.No back facing cam.Slow charging speed.No way of increasing Capacity.So for this tablet on my rating scale i would rate this a 93 out of 100, sure its the best tablet i ever had in my hands, but it does not have much apps for doing work and you cant move things out of the download folder but for all the cons it has, it has the best sound quality i have ever heard and is very good with Skype and other social apps.

Reviews.Title: love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "B Ventura Tennessee"
Reviews.Content: I have had a Kindle for the last four years.  I started with the Kindle reader and now have a Kindle HD.  This is one of the best multi task readers I have found.  I researched every reader I could find, bought a few and returned them.  For my needs this is a perfect instrument and now I can print from it.  It is a little cumbersome to print and untill the app for my printer came out it was impossible but as more apps for different task come out its getting better. I can put almost any app on here.  Typing is a little difficult but you get used to that ..the picture is awesome, WiFi is fast you can surf the web.  All in all a handy little book that slips right into your purse

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied consumer
Reviews.Author: Ama Hill
Reviews.Content: I've had problems with this product from day one. From the freezing of the screen to the kindle just not coming on. I havent had this Kindle for a year and it decided to comp out on me I brought it as a mothers day gift for myself and can no longer use it. And to top it off everytime I try to contact the company it never goes threw i answer all the questions then cant choose if i want to email or chat thumbs down.

Reviews.Title: Why this a great buy!
Reviews.Author: Richard Raehal
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire HD is an amazing product. What makes this product so great is the new screen, sound, and whisper soft technology. All these advancement come to you for a great price.The screen on Kindle Fire HD is bright and crisp. It has a 1280x800 high definition LCD display. It packs a punch even with its small 7” screen. The picture is clear no matter the viewing angle. The Kindle Fire is made so that there is no gap in-between the screen and touch sensor. The gap in most small tablets, including the Kindle Fire 7, make the screen hard to see in outdoor light as well as when lying in bed. This is not so with the Kindle Fire HD; the screen is great any light at any angle.The sound on the Kindle Fire HD far surpasses the sound on Amazon’s older tablets. With the HD you have clear sound that you don’t have to struggle to hear. With the original Kindle 7”, the sound was so low and muddled; headphones had to be worn to really enjoy any form of sound. This is not the case with the HD version where the sound is clear and loud.The feature that makes the Kindle Fire HD a one kind unit is the Whispersync software. This software is the best tool for children with a learning disability since the invention if dictation software. My daughter cannot read and thins tool has made her fall in love with reading.  The Whipersync links your kindle book to the audio book. When you buy a kindle version book you are offered the ability to buy the audio book from audio.com for a discount. When you download both the book and audio they are synced to each other. The reader can open the book press play the book is read by the HD while the tablet highlights each word that is being read so the reader can follow along. If the reader moves on to another task they can listen to audio without the book on the screen. When the book is opened back up it starts off the where the audio has left off. This is an amazing tool for many, but for a child that can’t read it opens up a whole new world to them. I think Kindle fire HD is the total package for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Not as wonderful as I'd anticipated; sorry!
Reviews.Author: Brooke Andrews "Eager Reader"
Reviews.Content: I could only give three stars — OK, perhaps 3 and a half stars — because I'm not thrilled. Among other things, this is heavy! I am used to holding my Kindle Touch, which would slip into my purse. This one slips into my purse also but then it weighs me down! And, my hands get tired of holding it after a fairly short period of time. Also, it was more of a learning curve than I'd anticipated. Before I bought it I contacted Amazon to see if everything I had on my Kindle Touch would transfer to the Kindle Fire. I was assured everything would transfer. Not exactly true. All the games on my Kindle Touch are "not compatible" with the Kindle Fire so I don't have them after all. Very disappointing. I almost "took back" the Kindle Touch, which I gave to my husband.

Reviews.Title: Reading many books in NH
Reviews.Author: Paul Reamon "Paul Reamon"
Reviews.Content: I can do almost every thing that I can do on my computer and more. It shipped out fast and I love it.

Reviews.Title: In love....
Reviews.Author: Candycaine
Reviews.Content: Completely exceeded my expectations. I absolutely love it. Couldn't ask for a better product. I am more than pleased with the decision to replace Kindle DX with this one.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: does everything its advertised to do and the size is just right and amazon stands behind their product. I am a amazon customer for life

Reviews.Title: Better than expected
Reviews.Author: Lois Lane
Reviews.Content: good quality for price. I am beginning to find my way around the Prime network and like any other link to the web there are things to learn. I am a little heavy handed and need to learn to be careful with 1 touch shopping, and the links in help are in need of improvement, but the Kindle fire itself works great.

Reviews.Title: shit
Reviews.Author: zack attak
Reviews.Content: Works only half the time and glitchs the other half also cheap battery that only last two hours on a good day and no power cord so it takes three or four hours to charge.

Reviews.Title: Two units down, ready for my third.
Reviews.Author: Hamburger
Reviews.Content: The wireless went out on my original unit after only a few months. The replacement powers off a few seconds after powering on unless plugged into the charger. If I want to sit tied to a wall outlet, I'll just use my laptop. The Kindle Fire has an appealing appearance, but the manufacturer can't seem to get the mechanics right.

Reviews.Title: Convenience and Fun, Fun, Fun!
Reviews.Author: Lois A. Zollars
Reviews.Content: With having recently purchased a Kindle Fire HD 7", Dolby Audio, Dual Band Wi-Fi, 16GB, I spend A LOT of time EVERY night on that amazing piece of technology! For me, television leaves much to be desired. I like to unwind after my busy days by reading, playing word games/Scrabble with my daughter, challenging my brain with the Hidden Objects games, and listening to my kind of music on Pandora Radio- ALL on my Kindle. I can do everything on my Kindle (while sitting in the comfort of my recliner in the living room) without having to go upstairs and getting on my computer- waiting for it to boot up, log into everything, etc. My husband is now hooked on his own Kindle. TV off- Kindle on!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: My Best Friend
Reviews.Author: Diva
Reviews.Content: This kindle is my best friend. I bought it after much deliberation because I am a tight wad and rarely spend money on myself frivolously or for that matter on electronics. That being said, this thing is SUPER AWESOME! It's like a smartphone and laptop rolled into one. You can play about every game you love on your computer and smartphone/iphone AND you can read all your favorite books, search the web, watch movies, listen to music....you name it! I use it constantly and it has a good battery life. Continuous game play for 8 hrs (which uses more battery life) and 3 hrs of a novel and it needed a good over  night charge but really, if you have a job you do not have time to use it this way unless on vacation so I'd say thats pretty darn good.I have had this for 2 months now and use it for just about everything. I do recommend getting the fast charger if you plan on using it extendedly because it comes with a slow charging USB chord that can be attached to a wall adapter or any computer/laptop and this may be too slow for your needs (6-9 hrs to fully charge) but you can use it while it is plugged in which makes the extended charging time take a little longer but if your playing Temple Run2 you don't really care. :)I recommend this to anyone who may be on the fence, this is better than my husbands ipad (he wants a kindle now lol) and has an amazing display. The HD is beautiful and better than most big screen tv's. I would buy the Kindle HD TV if it existed the HD quality is that good. And my husband agrees! Nothing bad to say about this! I can even do my amazon shopping and actually see what I am buying. (I hate cell phone MOBILE APPS) lol :)

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Judy Poorman
Reviews.Content: Not sure what to say here. I had battery problems with my kindle & asked them to call me twice & immediately they called me.  The second time I had to call them because of my battery they replaced it. They do stand behind their products 100%. Support is excellent. Thanks Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Hated It
Reviews.Author: BostonGirl
Reviews.Content: Ordered it. Hated it. It wouldnt connect to my current wifi router. In order for it to work, I had to go buy a new one? What? My router was only 2 years old. I ordered an Ipad mini instead and didnt have any problems.

Reviews.Title: A perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Terra R
Reviews.Content: I bought this item for my husband for his birthday for him to be able to go online without having to have a computer.Recently when we were on vacation he brought it with him and he used it quite often. That says a lot considering he hardly ever used the computer before getting this gift. I think I hit a home run this year with my selection of his gift!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Reilly "Arizona Jen"
Reviews.Content: We own 2 Kindle fires and love them.  One of them took a dump and ordered the HD and love it.  Way faster than the previous generation and the picture is awesome.  We are a KINDLE family no ipad for us.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my 5 year old son
Reviews.Author: JustCallMeMugs
Reviews.Content: LOTS of apps for kids that are educational.  Runs a version of Android, so pretty open-sourced.  He's a 5 year old and has had this for several months and hasn't broken it.  Need I say more?

Reviews.Title: We are apple lovers big time but I really like this and so do the kids!
Reviews.Author: S. Tavera
Reviews.Content: We have pretty much everything that Apple has came out with (iMac, iPad, macbook, macbook pro, iPhone,etc). Anyway I wanted to get 2 more tablets of my kids ages 6 and 4. Since they can't read yet they have no idea that this isn't an iPad. They call it an iPad lol. Compared to our iPad 2 this has great graphics and loud speakers! Really looks great. Our kids love the freetime app. I take a point off because the app store is lacking. I did however find 1mobile.com and got some free apps there. I also take a point off because a wall charger isn't included. It takes forever to charge with a usb. I believe I heard it takes 9 hours to fully charge and you know with kids they have no patience. I inquired about getting a free prime trial since I haven't had prime in 6 years. Amazon support said the prime trial is only good one time. Which really sucks btw when you think of how much I buy just from amazon. It couldn't hurt them to give me a free trial. Anyway, that's all. My kids love it and I love it especially cause I got 2 for under $200!!

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it!
Reviews.Author: Luke B
Reviews.Content: My Kindle is one of my favorite electronic devices. I use it constantly and I love it. I I go everywhere with it. For everything that that it does for the price that it costs is a good deal!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT GIFT FOR A CHILD
Reviews.Author: BILLIE LENEAR
Reviews.Content: LOVE IT,  IT HAS BEEN WONDERFUL SO FAR, I BOUGHT IT FOR MY 4 YR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER AND SHE TAKES IT EVERYWHERE.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: Nessa Val
Reviews.Content: I got my kindle fire HD in JulyIt was great at first but after a while i realized its Horrible!!Kindles cant access google play so we cant use IG or Snapchatcant ooVooSkype is HORRIBLE!!App store is LAME!! and we cant use any other app storebattery life is really bad, theres no camera on the back so its hard to take pictures , the keyboard acts up sometimes (not typing) cant send things from the kindle to another device via blue tooth but you can do it the other way? that makes no sense!Videos take LONG to load, Connecting to a Wireless takes FOREVER and may say "authentification failed" or "obtaining ip adress" when the wifi has no issues!DO NOT BUY THIS , YOU MIGHT AS WELL BUY AN IPAD!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire, love it.
Reviews.Author: patricia tyrrell
Reviews.Content: I really like my kindle fire. I like being able to slide across the page to get it to turn. What I don't like is the battery doesn't last very long. I had my old kindle for two or three years and had over 500 books on it, I liked it also till it died,

Reviews.Title: Really Nice
Reviews.Author: Alissa Elder
Reviews.Content: This is really nice . I like my kindle fire . I can read books or magazines or even watch movies or television shows.

Reviews.Title: Like it.
Reviews.Author: Margaret Wallace
Reviews.Content: I wanted one for a while.  I am slow to learn how to use it though.  I got me a book on how to use the Kindle Fire.  I only have a regular cell phone and I am amazed at all this technology.  I give this five stars because I hope it will be what I wanted when I learn everything about it.  I am excited about learning.  I just wish I had more time.  I do not have wireless in my office yet and I am at work or in the field from 8-5 Monday-Friday.  I have wireless at home, just got it recently.  Between work and home there is not much time to play.  I used my points on a credit card to buy this which was great.  I think I am going to like this.  I can get the farm markets for my husband and the weather.  He likes that.

Reviews.Title: Poor battery life....
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HD is a warranty replacement but the battery life on this one is no better than the original. I purchased the Fire HD because I had the original Kindle and loved it. I had hoped to do a lot with the new version but there are limitations about what you can do. I would not recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD sale
Reviews.Author: J. Nank
Reviews.Content: I paid $159 and two days later is was $139.  At $159 still an out standing buy.  I have only begun to explore its capabilities. I have had a Kindle Touch for a couple of years so I am used to the reading advantages of a Kindle.  One thing to be aware of is the Fire does not had a screen that can be read in the sunlight.  At first I was disappointed by this, but I just decided if I am going to read on the beach I'll just use my Touch.  I have also used the web and wifi, set up an email client (the one that comes with the Fire is web based and awful).  I have used Skype.  It works fine.  Which reminds me of another thing to be aware of, there is only one camera on the Fire, and it's not for taking pictures, it points towards the user and is there for skyping.  It would be awkward to take pictures of anything except yourself.  I loaded a few free games for my grand kids, they of course like it, but it's not a big deal for them. They have their own game/learning devices.  I am going to load some version of a DOS emulator for Android so I can run a few old does apps that I wrote for personal finances.  So you have in the Kindle Fire, all of the old features of the Kindle touch plus, color, web and wifi, streaming video (many free movies if you are a Prime member), email, and other tablet features.  I know there are a number of other tablets out and coming out that are cheaper than an iPad, but the Fire was one of the first I believe and is still a good buy.  They newer model Fires have come out and I am sure they have even more features but for now I am not going to look at them and just enjoy the "old" Fire I just bought.

Reviews.Title: LOVE THE KINDLE FIRE HD7"
Reviews.Author: Donna L. Staats
Reviews.Content: I like my Kindle Fire HD 7" very much.  It is a great improvement over my old Kindle but I amstill learning about the many things I can do with it. I finally downloaded a free book to read.  Ilove being able to enlarge the letters and with the light built in, reading is much easier.  Ialso enjoy being able to check my bank balance and pay bills online.  Thanks so much fora wonderful product!

Reviews.Title: refurbished Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Constance L Detamore
Reviews.Content: Don't be afraid to purchase a refurbished device.  They have the same warranty and look as good as new; the best part is that you save dollars!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne Lynum
Reviews.Content: It has so much to offer. It is brighter-I do not need a lamp light. I can easily make the font as large as I need. I watch my favorite movies. It is so much fun.

Reviews.Title: Love IT
Reviews.Author: Anna Morales
Reviews.Content: So easy to navigate and movies are awesome.  Also has a great sound system, way better than my husband's tablet. haha

Reviews.Title: Trouble with Kindle
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: I was sent a Kindle with 2 GB of memory instead of 16 GB. This is my third Kindle with Amazon. The first one I had quit charging after 1 year of use. The second one I received in June quit charging in August. Now I have the newest Kindle with an inadequate amount of memory. I am not pleased with the Kindle brand at all.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: marilyn baker
Reviews.Content: just wish it was more imformative about how to  operate itover all i really like it amd a good value

Reviews.Title: prime membership
Reviews.Author: Valerie Addy
Reviews.Content: beware when getting your Kindle and you activate your free 30 days of Prime membership, they do not tell you you will be automatically charged $79.00 for a year of prime membership if you do not turn off the automatic payment. We have never had a problem with Amazon, until this moment, It was bought as a gift and the person who bought it got hit with my $79.00 subscription. This is a true case of buyer beware and read the small print. And whats up with no owners manual? Wasting battery to figure out all my capabilities is STUPID! Some VERY, VERY SHADY business practice by an otherwise great company. SHAME ON YOU AMAZON FOR TRYING TO TRICK YOUR WAY INTO A LITTLE BIT OF CASH.

Reviews.Title: Feel like I am a victim of Bait and Switch
Reviews.Author: California dreamin'
Reviews.Content: Within a few weeks of my thinking I had scored a real deal on the Kindle 7" HD Fire at $159.00, Amazon comes out with the new generation of Fires, and prices them cheaper than my old model.  Feel like I was cheated.  Cannot return it, can't sell it with the new and improved ones going for less than I paid for mine.  Seems to also have a problem with spontaneously shutting down right in the middle of whatever I am doing.  Not sure what is going on there.  The picture is sharp and clear, the other features are fantastic.  I just feel like I was taken advantage of by being offered this model on "sale" when they knew darn well they were bringing out the next gen in just a couple of weeks.  Not nice, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: I Love my new Kindle Fire!
Reviews.Author: Mary Ellen Davis
Reviews.Content: I love my new Kindle Fire. It has been great for internet and reading books. I thought it would be hard to learn to use but, I have had no trouble!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Linda Covey
Reviews.Content: Purchased to replace my Kindle Fire that had a faulty charger port.  Wouldn't be without a Kindle but not happy that I had to replace the original which was less than 2 years old.  Hope this one lasts longer!

Reviews.Title: No charging light
Reviews.Author: Vicki Sutter
Reviews.Content: I don't like the fact that there is no light to indicate the tablet is charged.  On my older kindle I have that feature.  I find the older one easier to use.  I like the HD on the new one.

Reviews.Title: Impartial Review upon using this product for many months
Reviews.Author: J. Shin
Reviews.Content: This is my first product review on Amazon.  I've purchased many, many products in the thousands of dollars through Amazon.  I have never had an issue with the services provided by Amazon.I've purchased this product (on Amazon) over 6 months ago. I've read the description of this product on the Amazon page.  The descriptors extol the virtues of the Kindle Fire HD.  I made a conscious decision to buy a non-Apple product.  Partly due to the lower cost of the Kindle and partly to stop owning everything Apple.After using the Kindle Fire HD, I have to say I'm very disappointed with the product.  For purposes of watching streaming movies via Netflix and reading digital books, the product is fine.  For anything beyond those two simple functions I can say that it doesn't provide satisfactory performance.  Surfing the Net via "Silk" is not fast.  I compare this to the iPad.  Ease of use and navigation of data (apps, photos...etc...) is not, at first, user friendly.  In fact, even after using this product daily, I still don't find it user friendly.  The video viewing app (for personal video files) that came with this product is woefully inadequate.  The app I purchased via the app store isn't much better.The first thing that troubled me initially was the constant ads that kept popping up each time I turned on the Kindle.  I had to manually disable this.  The option to disable it is there; however, I disliked having to take the time to do this in the first place.  I did not buy the Kindle to be inundated with ads!As I am not a technically inclined person, this review is coming from the "average" layman's view.  I deeply regret not purchasing the iPad instead (to save a few dollars).  In fact, I may end up purchasing one in the near future (from Amazon, of course).  The bottom line is this product is ok for watching streaming videos and reading books.  If you want more from this (and if you own an iPhone like I do) then you're better off getting an ipad.  This is just my personal opinion.  Everyone else can make their own informed decision.

Reviews.Title: My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Tara "Tara"
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire. Wish it came with a charger.  It should come with a charger. Th kindle itself works well.

Reviews.Title: HAPPINESS IS A KINDLE FIRE HD
Reviews.Author: Vallarta
Reviews.Content: HAPPINESS IS A KINDLE FIRE HDI couldn't be happier with my purchase!  Every day I am thankful that this is the device I chose to purchase.  It's almost made my laptop obsolete for email.  I love having the camera.Now I am one of the most electronically challenged individuals on this planet I don't even own a cell phone but now I don't know how I could live without my Kindle Fire HD.P>S>  I live in a foreign country and there are few english books available.  It is amazing to be able to download from the library back home and to purchase on Amazon .....  This device is addictive!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Autumn McNabb
Reviews.Content: Its great! I love it but I only gave it 4 stars because there is to limited app selection and I cant upload any videos I make to youtube. But I still think its great!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Margaret E. Dansie "Margaret D"
Reviews.Content: Just what I need.  Plenty of memory for the things I need.  I have several reference books and videos on it.

Reviews.Title: My 4rth kindle fire hd.
Reviews.Author: chrisann w.
Reviews.Content: This is my forth kindle fire HD. The first tablet stopped working after about 3 months. I received a replacement, the replacement, the volume button didn't work properly, was told to do a factory reset but this still didn't resolve the problem, I was eventually told I needed another replacement. I received my 3rd replacement and when I got it it was completely dead and wouldn't turn on. I charged it for about 2 hours tried turning it on and still nothing. It finally came on the following  day when I checked it. It worked fine for about few hours then just shut down and wouldn't start up back. I was told once again I need another replacement. So I am now on my forth kindle and it has been working fine so far, no issues. I gave this product 3 stars because, although this is my 4 th tablet the customer service was always good and I do like the product despite the issues. I just hope there will be no issue  with this one.

Reviews.Title: Review for Kindle Fire HD 7"
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire HD.  I also have one of the first kindle fires.  And I use them both.  My previous kindle did not allow text to speech.  So I use the first one when reading before bedtime and I use the second one when I am crocheting.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD is amazing!
Reviews.Author: Firedad
Reviews.Content: The picture on the Kindle Fire HD is amazingly clear, I was instantly impressed when I opened it up and turned it on.  It came already set up for me which made it easy.  There are tons of great apps for the Kindle and reading ebooks is a joy on here.  I had seen commercials for the Kindle Free time prior to buying this and I am really impressed with it.  It allows me to set up an account for my kids, but set limits on how long they can watch videos, play games, and read.  Each of these can be different lengths of time.  I have no complaints about the Kindle it works great and I love using it!  5 Stars!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Love It.
Reviews.Author: Jean T.
Reviews.Content: I got it because my granddaughter has been after me to get one.  Absolutely love it. I now use this more than I do my computer.  I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle
Reviews.Author: Judith Labadie
Reviews.Content: Never thought I would enjoy reading anything that doesn't smell like paper!  That's still my preference, but we're moving somewhere unlikely to have a large library, so my husband purchased a Kindle for me.  Left it in the box for several weeks, resisting what I was sure would be a high learning curve.  Nope.  It's easy to use.  Can download books, surf the internet and check my e-mails.  As an Amazon Prime member, can watch movies too.  I know, the rest of you already know this... but maybe another baby boomer will be encouraged to try it out.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD 7", Dolby Audio, Dual-Band Wi-Fi, 32 GB
Reviews.Author: Great shoes
Reviews.Content: Was as expected - Great graphics and easy to use !Battery life has a bit to be desired, but is tolerable.Save yourself some time and buy a the kindle fast charger at the same time, if you can swing it $ wise and you'll be set !

Reviews.Title: Very happy with the refurbished Kindle Fire HD and lifehacked buttons
Reviews.Author: Phillip W. Wilson "Phillip Wilson"
Reviews.Content: Overall very happy that I was able to purchase at a discount. I like it for the Amazon integration. It makes watching my movies, reading and listening to books and shopping very easy. The only complaint I had was power and volume buttons were very hard to find. Solved problem by cutting very small pieces of soft side and loop side of velcro and attached soft to power and vol up and looped to volume down. Solved problem and makes much easier to depress buttons.

Reviews.Title: Books and so much more!
Reviews.Author: donald eichelberger
Reviews.Content: In the past, I rarely read newspapers.  Now that I have my Kindle Fire HD, I scan three a day.  I hadn't read a book in over six months.  Now that I have my Kindle Fire HD, I've read four books in the last 30 days.  And when I'm reading a newspaper or a book, if I'm curious about a word or a name or a place or a situation, I can conveniently jump onto the Internet, satisfy my curiosity, and then jump back to what I was reading.  Music sounds great through the Kindle's speakers.  I was initially skeptical that video would be appealing on the 7" screen.  Wrong!  Because it's HD, the quality is just fine.  But don't take my word for it, get one and find out for yourself.  You won't be disappointed, and even if you are, there's someone close to you who would be very grateful for the gift.  You can't lose!  And if you ever have a problem, contact Amazon's Kindle Customer Service, and a patient and knowledgeable person will be there to provide easy-to-understand responses and easy-to-follow instructions.  Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Great college study tool!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey L. Ridings "Jeff Ridings"
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup and loved the highlighting of my college ebooks ! This is a great college reading and study device.

Reviews.Title: Not Recommended
Reviews.Author: R. Brown
Reviews.Content: I purchased a Kindle Fire HD back in May.  After a couple of months, it started shutting off for no reason.  I called customer service and they said that I needed to take it out of the case that I purchased for it because it was overheating the device.  We did a system reset and that seemed to work....for about a month.  The Kindle started shutting off again.  It was not in a case or on a soft surface.  It would shut off while you were holding it watching Netflix or reading.  I called customer service again and they sent me a new one.  When I received it today, the volume down button and on/off button would not work.  When I pushed them, it would take a screen shot.??I called customer service AGAIN and now they are sending ANOTHER Kindle.  When I stated that I am very dissatisfied with the product and wanted to send it back for a partial refund (it did work for a little while), I was assured that the new Kindle would work and I should not have any problems.  I hope third times a charm.I will not recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: Kyle Soule
Reviews.Content: The default software on the Kindle Fire HD is intrusive, restrictive, and lacking in the ways that mattered to me. The hardware and price point are fantastic, though.Full disclosure: I purchased this device with the intent of using as a general purpose tablet. After significant and risky modification, it is everything I wanted in a tablet (and more)!Amazon appears to be taking steps to restrict buyers from choosing the operating system they wish to run through over-the-air updates (not disablable without rooting). I found their launcher (the carousel) to be intrusive and cumbersome. Every application, book, etc. that you've opened is kept in order (you have some freedom to choose what displays first, though) of access. I did not like this at all nor did my wife, the reader.Google Play cannot be loaded onto the device without rooting, even though the device is Android at its core. Rooting runs the risk of bricking the device and probably voids the warranty.Bottom line: If you are purchasing this device as a tablet, you may be disappointed. If you are okay with being restricted to the Amazon App Store, don't mind not having freedom over the launcher used (unless rooted...but even then custom backgrounds aren't possible on the currently shipped software version), and aren't interested in modifying anything about the device, this review does not pertain to you. If I was in that category, this would have been a 5/5 star review.After modification of the device, this is actually a 5/5 star review...but it isn't an Amazon Kindle anymore, so I cannot give it that rating. I love my tablet now but I did not love it out of the box.

Reviews.Title: I don't just like it, I love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: f.hdispatcher
Reviews.Content: Although it may seem strange, I actually do more with the apps and music playing with my Kindle than I do reading.

Reviews.Title: yay
Reviews.Author: jacqueline arrington
Reviews.Content: I love my new kindle . I find it useful for everything I would use my pc for and its more convenient.

Reviews.Title: second kindle
Reviews.Author: luddy
Reviews.Content: she loves her kindle fire HD 7", with the dual-band Wi-Fi the range is better and she likes the higher resolution.

Reviews.Title: This Should come with a written Instruction Book, but little by Little,I am learing how to use it !!!
Reviews.Author: Pat Wolfe
Reviews.Content: It is taking me Time to figure out how to use the Kindle Fire , as it DOES NOT COME WITH AN INSTRUCTION BOOK !! But I just found an Instruction  Book at Costco. so Hopefully The leaning will go a lot FASTER NOW---PAT W.

Reviews.Title: Saving me $$
Reviews.Author: lea gallardo
Reviews.Content: I realized that I rarely used my smart phone and cancelled the $50 per month data charge and bought this excellent, inexpensive tablet instead.  I work at my computer most of the day so the smartphone was a total waste of money.  Now I can travel with this tablet, which set up completely intuitively.  Let's face it, there is WiFi everywhere at this point.  I already had a Kindle reader which I continue to use because it seems to use far less battery than this tablet.  The beauty however, is that all my Kindle books immediately showed up on the tablet.  Nice work Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle HD.
Reviews.Author: rstarr
Reviews.Content: Bought my first Kindle before the HD model came out. So glad the HD model has a gamer so I am able to use Skype to keep in touch with friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Sally J. Ray
Reviews.Content: Many friends of mine have this and love theirs so I finally got my own!  The only thing I wish I could do is down some of the apps I have on my iPhone.  Other than that, it's great!

Reviews.Title: A little slow
Reviews.Author: Marc Homertgen
Reviews.Content: Its processing speed is a little slower than I expected.  With that said, it is a decent product that I primarily use for reading.

Reviews.Title: Best Valentine's Day Gift Ever!
Reviews.Author: MissyDevoursDelishReads "Missy"
Reviews.Content: My fiance splurged this year for Valentine's Day and shocked me with a Kindle Fire. My jaw dropped to the floor, and let's just say I thouroughly thanked him. :-P I read nonstop, and am a fan of paperbacks, but now thanks to the Kindle Fire (and my sweetheart! <3), I can easily multitask with thousands of books at my fingertips 24/7.  Easy to navigate, crisp and clean visuals, and great speakers. Fast connecting wifi, I browse Amazon and everything in between with ease, I blink and I'm there! Excellent for book lovers just like me...I'm tickled pink!

Reviews.Title: Good reader but frustrating android tablet
Reviews.Author: I. Bloch "BigdogNJ"
Reviews.Content: So here's the thing: I bought the Kindle Fire HD primarily because I wanted a lighter weight, easier to handle ebook reader than my iPad. I like the functionality and flexibility of the native reader app much better than iBooks or the Kindle app for iPad. For this purpose, the Fire HD was a perfect choice. Buying, borrowing, searching and referencing reading material just isn't done better on any tablet. I definitely got my money's worth, especially at the discounted price.If, however, you're looking for an inexpensive Android OS tablet I suggest you look elsewhere. Amazon has so customized and crippled the operating system as to make it unrecognizable. The home screen carousel is pretty useless if you have more than a few apps installed. The app library view would benefit from the ability to create folders or multiple screens. In general, the flexibility and customizability of the Android user interface has been totally blocked in favor of an Amazon centered market interface. The Silk web browser doesn't do Flash for crying out loud.All this would be tolerable if only you could download the darn apps you need. As I write this, I realize that my main frustration is being forced into the vastly incomplete Amazon App Store for all my app purchases. Amazon has banned Kindle users from the wealth of applications that makes Android an attractive OS in the first place. You can't access Google Play and there are tens of thousands of applications there that are not available from Amazon. I've hit this wall too many times to recommend the device overall.I can't say I would have purchased a different e-reader had I known just how limited the tablet functionality would be on the Fire HD, but I probably would not have spent the bucks on this one.

Reviews.Title: King's Approval
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: My son love's his Kindle!!!!!!! Its perfect for road trip or just doing something in the house to pass the time other then sitting in front of the tv all day.  I can even pull up his homework and learning programs from his school's website.  He also loves that most of his favorite games are FREE and even the games that cost aren't expensive.  Thanks so much for making something so light and easy to use reasonable.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: VALERIE MANCINI
Reviews.Content: Easy to use, great tab for audio books, and hd movies get the 32GB you will be glad you didbought a second one for a gift!I also have the kindle paperwhitelove them both!!!!

Reviews.Title: I love it!!
Reviews.Author: pk
Reviews.Content: I like how it is small, works like a tablet and offers the kindle experience. It is light and easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Alot of glitches from beginning
Reviews.Author: Dusty L. Bryson
Reviews.Content: Always losing authentication and constantly being dropped from wifi. I bought this as gift, would have returned it but already spent alot of money on downloaded books.

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: S Goods
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle. It was very easy to start. No problems. The only problem is there are no navigation buttons on the outside of the device that will take you easily to the home page. It is touch screen which is great but when I need to get back to the home page, I have to tape this screen until it shows. It's a hit or miss with what may come up. WHen I tap the screen, usually the highlight comes up. My son doesn't like it for this reason.

Reviews.Title: If you like amazon you will love this
Reviews.Author: Adrosor
Reviews.Content: I've been wanting a smaller tablet type device and this is awesome. My experiences have been with iPhones, ipads an older kindle with keyboard and a current kindle white. I like my touch screens and love amazon. Was tempted to get an iPad mini but when the fire HD went on sale the price was to good to resist.This feels better in my hands than the full sized iPad. The amazon experience is certainly a key benefit if your into shopping, prime videos, Kindle books/magazines, audible and more. I like the spotify app for music but some of the others are not as good as the Apple counterparts. Browser is pretty cool especially for writing reviews and perusing amazon. Screen is responsive and clear.For the price you can't beat it. I don't see it as a productivity tool but it's a great little media machine. Does all the things you can do on the web well too.

Reviews.Title: iPad, eat your heart out!
Reviews.Author: Erica "Erica"
Reviews.Content: Just got this for my 11-year-old son for a birthday present.  What a great gadget!  Had a little issue trying to find the mac address to allow on the wireless network, but connection was easy once I did.  Within minutes, he was grabbing streaming video and books.  I had to turn on parental controls to prevent instant purchases using my Prime account.  The parental controls are AWESOME.  Super easy to enable and modify.  They allow you to limit not only types of content, but also specific content within a type.  There is a downside though... now my two other boys (and Dad) all want one too... guess what everyone is getting for Christmas...

Reviews.Title: My second Kindle
Reviews.Author: Illona Jameson
Reviews.Content: I just want to say that I was deading when I did nothave my kindle. But I want to say that my new kindlewas worth waiting for. I love it can watch my moviesin my bed and listen to my music while in the shower.There is nothing like a kindle

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: SteveTheOcean
Reviews.Content: For what is is - It is OK.It does not have the generality of the application base of an iPad, but if you use it for reading and for the applications it does have, it is well worth the money.I've had a few hardware problems with the sound but Amazon has been very nice about replacing the unit and the current one seems to work fine.I have two complaints1. You can take pictures with it, but as the camera is on the same side of the unit as the display (for video calls, I presume)it is kind of a pain. You can't see what you are taking a picture of.2. I often download movies onto the unit and play them back via HDMI cable on my TV. This works fine except that if I enable subtitiles they show up only on the Kindle screen, not on the television.

Reviews.Title: kindle
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I ♡ my kindle. Not only can I read my book, see the news,  and play plants vs zombies. It winds up being an all purpose tool.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Happy Shopping
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my needs. I mainly read, play a few games, and search the web. Occasionally, I watch movies. Easy to use, and it meets my basic needs.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Darren L.
Reviews.Content: My new best friend.  Great for watching movies and television shows.  Bus rides, plane rides, before bed etc... Highly recommend !

Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: Samantha Davis
Reviews.Content: I really like most things about the Kindle. The only problem is trying to use it at the beach where I do most of my reading in the summer. Couldn't get rid of the glare and reflection. If the brightness could have been increased it might have worked out better. Indoors it's great--reading, watching videos, the sound is amazing--but trying to use it outdoors--not so much.

Reviews.Title: A little disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dennis M.
Reviews.Content: Kindle should at least include some kind of user guide,besides a card telling the user how to turn it on,and charge the battery.The device is of little use to me,untill the book I purchased on how to use it arrives.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Kindle
Reviews.Author: Donald Lang
Reviews.Content: This is my first kindle and I have downloaded most of what I wanted and have 26 gig left for some music and videos.  I have several computers and find the kindle is easier to get on line to check something.  Of course, it takes a good wireless router, which I have.  I have only been using it about two weeks and love it.  I am 65 yoa and just love.  When I am waiting in a doctor's office (which there are a lot of appointments) I am able to read books, play a game, and study.  No wonder my granddaughter loves her Kindle, which we bought her two years ago.  We are about to get her another Kindle Fire HD 7 in this fall, as her Kindle is only an 8 gig.  Watch the sales and get it.

Reviews.Title: Great product, need camera on back
Reviews.Author: Don Drew
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire it does everything you need it to do at your finger tips... Only down fall to the kindle is no camera on the back.

Reviews.Title: Too limited, and useless outside US
Reviews.Author: Alireza
Reviews.Content: If I forget the heavy weight and bad ergonomic design, then I have to say i am really disappointed by this device's limitations and super unfriendly user interface.And this is totally useless outside US or if you have to use VPN for any other reasons.Are you outside US then it is a very bad choice.

Reviews.Title: Love,Love,Love
Reviews.Author: Jenn D
Reviews.Content: Oh how I love my Kindle Fire. I love playing games on it along with reading books. The "special offers" that show up don't bother me one bit,in fact, I barely notice them. The sound is really good on it ,I was pleasantly surprised.I found it to be very easy to set up and its very user friendly. This is the best thing I bought for myself in a long time.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HD
Reviews.Author: pattycake
Reviews.Content: I think the Kindle Fire is better than any tablet, phone or other gadget. You can read, view videos, play games, listen to music, etc. It is really simple to keep charged, and always ready when you are. I love it. I just wish I had bought it sooner.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Brenda Ford
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a gift for my husband but I love it also.  The color is so vibrant and with all the apps, you can do so much with it.

Reviews.Title: Getting used to a Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kathy A.
Reviews.Content: I have many physical books at my house to read and am finding that more and more of the series I love have started slipping an Ebook between the hardcovers and paperbacks, so I reluctantly purchased this Kindle.  I'm still not used to it and am a long way from exclusively using it. I do not like that when I lay in bed and try to read and move the slightest little bit, it switches from landscape to portrait.  Maybe one day I'll figure out how to get it to stop doing that.  I do love that I'm able to watch Prime videos with no problem whatsoever with buffering - unlike my laptop.  I love to play Words with Friends and am able to do it on the Kindle, but have only been able to download the free version.  I have the paid version on my phone and get frustrated with trying to play it on the Kindle.

Reviews.Title: The most wonderful little pal I have ever had
Reviews.Author: Boyd
Reviews.Content: The little Kindle Fire is one  the most usable small computer available. It works on all my applications thus far and is with me daily. Would recommend it highly. Boyd

Reviews.Title: Great present
Reviews.Author: Donna Worshum
Reviews.Content: We bought this for my husband's 50th birthday present. He loves it!  It's his own toy for playing games, surfing the web and watching videos.  The HD feature is everything it's hyped to be.

Reviews.Title: Regret the purchase
Reviews.Author: Cheryl M
